/study/scriptures/pgp/introduction.title: Mbueienyi
text: Bota a Ɔsom Bo Mapã yɛ ndzɛmba etsitsir bi a woeyiyi efi Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo a ɔfa ne gyedzi na ne nkyerɛkyerɛ tsitsir pii mu. Dɛm ndzɛmba yinom no Nkɔnhyɛnyi Joseph Smith, na ɔkyerɛɛ ase na ɔkyerɛwee na wotsintsimii no mu dodowara wɔ Asɔr no ne dawurbɔ nkrataa a ofi ber to ber wɔdze puee guado, wɔ n’aber do no mu.

Ndzɛmba a wodzii kan boaboaa ano no na wɔtoo no dzin Bota a Ɔsom Bo Mapa no, Elder Franklin D. Richards na ɔyɛe wɔ afe 1851 mu, dɛm aber no nna ɔyɛ Abaguafo Duebien no mu kor, na ɔyɛ president so a ɔhwɛ Ngyiresiman mu Asɛmpakã dwumadzi no do. Botae a nna osi enyido ma wɔdze yɛɛ iyi nye dɛ, wɔbɛma aber biara ndzɛmba etsitsir a wɔkenkan a no ho yɛ na ayɛ krado wɔ hɔ a wobotum dze amema nkorɔfo a nna wɔwɔ Joseph Smith n’aber do no. Nkyii, ber a Asɔrmba no dɔree wɔ Europe na America aman mu no, okehiaa dɛ wɔma nsa kã dɛm ndzɛmba yinom. Ɔnam President a Odzi Kan no, na n’Apamfo hɔn mbɔdzembɔ do ma Bota a Ɔsom Bo Mapã yi, wiadze mfɛndzanan ehyiadzi bi a wɔyɛɛ no Salt Lake City no, ɔbɛyɛɛ kyerɛwsɛm a wɔagye ato mu wɔ Asɔr no mu no mu kor wɔ Ɔbɛsɛ 10, 1880 mu.

Wɔayɛ nsɛm no mu nhwehwɛmu mpɛn pii ma wɔdze nsɛm no bi a Asɔr no hia no akã ho. Afe 1878 mu no Moses nwoma mu nsɛm no mu bi a ber a wotsintsiim nwoma no ahyɛse no nna ɔnnkã ho no wɔdze kãa ho. Afe 1902 mu no Bota a Ɔsom Bo Mapã no mu nsɛm no bi a nna wɔakã na wɔasan akã no bio na woetsintsim wɔ Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi mu no, woyii fii mu. Wɔrehyehyɛ nwoma no wɔ etsir na nkyekyɛmu mu no, na wɔdze nsɛm no ne nkyerɛkyerɛmu ahyehyɛ ase no, wɔyɛɛ no 1902 mu. 1921 mu na wodzii kan kyekyɛɛ nkrataafa no mu ebien ebien tsintsiim nsɛm no na wɔdze nkyerɛkyerɛmu nsɛm so kãa ho. Wɔannsesã biribiara bio dze kesii Ebɔbira 1976 mu, a wɔdze nyikyerɛ ebien kãa ho. 1979 mu woyii dɛm nsɛm ebien yinom fii Bota a Ɔsom Bo Mapa no mu na wɔdze kɛhyɛɛ Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi no mu, ɔno na seseiara yehu wɔ afã 137 na 138 no. Seseiara dza woetsintsim no wɔayɛ nsakyer bi wɔ mu ma ɔnye dza wodzii kan tsintsimii no asaa.
Dza odzi do yi nye mbueienyi tsiabaa wɔ nwoma a ɔwɔ hɔ seseiara yi mu:
Moses Nwoma no mu Nyiyimu. Nsɛm bi a woyii fii Genesis mu, Joseph Smith ne Bible nkyerɛase no mu, dza ɔhyɛɛ ase wɔ Obiradzi 1830.

Abraham Nwoma no. Ɔsor nkenyan nkyerɛase bi a woyii fii Abraham ne nkyerɛwee mu. Joseph Smith hyɛɛ nkyerɛase no ase wɔ 1835 mu ber a ne nsa kãa Egyptfo hɔn papyri mu bi no. Nkyerɛase no wɔdze puee guado esiado esiado wɔ Times and Seasons mu, wɔhyɛɛ ase fii Ebɔw 1, 1842 wɔ Nauvoo, Illinois.

Joseph Smith—Matthew. Nsɛm bi a woyii fii Matthew ne dasegye mu a ɔwɔ Joseph Smith ne Bible nkyerɛase no mu (hwɛ Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 45:60–61, ber a onyaa mbrasɛm fi Nyame hɔ dɛ ɔnhyɛ ase nkyerɛ Ahyɛmu Fofor no ase).

Joseph Smith—Abakɔsɛm. Nsɛm bi a woyii fii Joseph Smith ne dasegye na abakɔsɛm mu, dza ɔno na n’akyerɛwfo hyehyɛɛ no wɔ 1838–1839 mu a wɔdze puee guado esiado esiado wɔ Times and Seasons mu wɔ Nauvoo, Illinois, wɔhyɛɛ ase wɔ Ebɔw 15, 1842.

Gyedzi Ho Nsɛmpɔw a ɔwɔ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo no mu. Nsɛm a Joseph Smith dze puee guado wɔ Times and Seasons mu wɔ Ebɔw 1, 1842, nye Asɔr no ho abakɔsɛm tsiabaa bi so, dza dodowara frɛ no Wentworth Krataa no.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/1.title: Moses 1
chapter_summary: Nyankopɔn yi Noho kyerɛ Moses—Wɔsakyer Moses—Satan nye no befimfen—Moses hu wiadze pii a dɔm tse mu—Wiadze a wonntum nnkan na Ɔba no bɔe—Nyankopɔn n’edwuma na n’enyimnyam nye dɛ ɔdze bɛkyebo na onnyiewiei nkwa bɛma nyimpa.
subtitle: (Obiradzi, 1830)

verses.text: Nyankopɔn ne nsɛm a ɔkãa kyerɛɛ Moses wɔ ber a wohwiim Moses kɔr bepɔw tsentsenntsen bi do no,
Na ohun Nyame enyim na enyim, na ɔnye no kasae, na Nyame n’enyimnyam baa Moses do; dɛm ntsi Moses tumii tsimii wɔ n’enyim.
Na Nyankopɔn see Moses dɛ: Hwɛ Emi nye Ewuradze Nyankopɔn Tumfo, Onnyi Ewiei nye me dzin; osiandɛ minnyi nda a ɔwɔ ahyɛse anaa mfe a ɔwɔ ewiei; ana iyi nnyɛ onnyi ewiei?
Na, hwɛ, eyɛ me babanyin; dɛm ntsi hwɛ, na mebɛkyerɛ wo me nsa ano edwindze; mbom nnyɛ ne nyinara, osiandɛ m’edwuma nnyi ewiei, nna me nsɛm so, osiandɛ onngyaa da.
Dɛm ntsi, nyimpa biara nnkotum ehu mo ndwuma nyinara, gyedɛ otum hu m’enyimnyam nyinara; na nyimpa biara nnkotum ehu m’enyimnyam nyinara, na ekyir no ɔatsena honam mu wɔ asaase do.

Na mowɔ edwuma ma wo, Moses, me babanyin, na ɔwo eyɛ nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no ne saso; na nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no na ɔbɛyɛ Agyenkwa no, osiandɛ adom na nokwar ahyɛ no mã; mbom Nyame bi nnyi hɔ kã moho, na ndzɛmba nyina gu m’enyim osiandɛ minyim ne nyinara.
Na afei, hwɛ, iyi nye adze kor a medze rekyerɛ wo, Moses, me babanyin, osiandɛ ewɔ wiadze mu, na afei medze rekyerɛ wo.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Moses hwɛe, na ohun wiadze a wɔbɔɔ no too do no; na Moses hun wiadze na n’ewiei nyinara nye adasamba nyinara a wɔtse ase, na wɔbɔɔ hɔn; dɛm ntsi ɔyɛɛ no ahobow na nwanwa kɛse.
Na Nyankopɔn n’enyim twee fii Moses nkyɛn, dɛm ntsi n’enyimnyam fii Moses do; na ɔkaa Moses no nko; na ber a ɔkaa no nko no, ɔhwee asaase no do.
Na ɔbaa dɛ mber pii guu mu ansaana Moses resan enya ne honam mu ahoɔdzen bio dɛ nyimpa; na ɔsee noho dɛ: Seseiara, osian dɛm adze yi ntsi meehu dɛ nyimpa nnsɛ hwee, adze a mennsusu da.

Mbom seseiara medze mankasa m’enyiwa ehu Nyame; mbom nnyɛ mo honam mu enyi, mbom mo sunsum enyi a, osiandɛ mo honam enyi nnkotum ehu, osiandɛ nkyɛ mekyenkyenee na muwui wɔ n’enyim; mbom nna n’enyimnyam wɔ mo do; na muhun n’enyim, osiandɛ mesakyeree wɔ n’enyim.
Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Moses kãa dɛm nsɛm yinom wiei no, hwɛ Satan bae bɔsɔɔ no hwɛe see dɛ: Moses, nyimpa ba, som me.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Moses hwɛɛ Satan na ɔsee dɛ: Ɔwo nye woana? Na hwɛ, meyɛ Nyame ne ba, na mesɛ nyia Ɔwoo no Kortoo no no; na w’enyimnyam wɔ hen a ɔwɔ dɛ mosom wo?
Na hwɛ, munnkotum ahwɛ Nyame, gyedɛ n’enyimnyam aba mo do, na wɔsakyer me wɔ n’enyim. Mbom mutum hwɛ wo dɛ honammunyi. Ana nokwar dɛ ɔnntse dɛm?

Nhyira nkã me Nyankopɔn ne dzin, osiandɛ no Sunsum nntwee mmfi moho koraa, ɔnntse dɛm a nna w’enyimnyam wɔ hen, osiandɛ ɔyɛ sum dze ma me? Na mubotum akyerɛ soronko a ɔda ɔwo na Nyame ntamu; na Nyankopɔn see me dɛ: Som Nyame, na ɔno nko na som no.
Fi ha fi, Satan; mma ndaadaa me; osiandɛ Nyankopɔn see me dɛ: Ɔwo eyɛ nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no ne saso.
Na ɔmaa me mbrasɛm so ber a ɔfrɛɛ me fii haban a ɔredzɛw no mu no, see dɛ: Frɛ Nyame wɔ nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no ne dzin mu, na som me.
Na bio Moses see dɛ: Minnkegyaa dɛ mebɛfrɛ Nyame, mowɔ ndzɛmba binom a ɔsɛ dɛ mebisa fi no hɔ: osiandɛ n’enyimnyam aba mo do, dɛm ntsi mutum hu soronko a ɔda ɔno na ɔwo ntamu. Fi ha fi, Satan.
Na afei, ber a Moses kãa dɛm nsɛm yinom no, Satan dze ndze kɛse tseatseaa mu wɔ asaase no do, na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ: Emi nye nyia a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no no, som me.

Na ɔbaa dɛ Moses hyɛɛ ase suroo mbordo; na ber a ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ orusuro no, ɔtsee hɛl no wen nkã. Eso, ɔfrɛɛ Nyankopɔn no, onyaa ahoɔdzen, na ɔtseaa mu see dɛ: Fi me nkyɛn fi, Satan, osiandɛ Nyame kor yi nko na mobɔsom no, nyia ɔyɛ enyimnyam Nyame no.
Na afei Satan noho hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔropopo, na asaase wosowee; na Moses nyaa ahoɔdzen, na ɔfrɛɛ Nyankopɔn, see dɛ: Wɔ Wɔwoo no Kortoo no ne dzin mu, fi ha fi, Satan.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Satan dze ndze kɛse tseaa mu a orusu na orutwa ewuo, na ɔrotwɛr ne sẽ, na ofii hɔ kɔree, ofii Moses n’enyim kɔree mpo, na oennhu no.
Na afei Moses gyee dase a ɔfa dɛm adze yi ho no; mbom osian emumuyɛdze ntsi adasamba ennya wɔ hɔn mu.
Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Satan fii Moses n’enyim kɔree no, nna Moses maa n’enyi do wɔ sor, nna Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ahyɛ no mã, dza ɔgye dase wɔ Egya na Ɔba no hɔnho;

Na ɔbɔɔ Nyankopɔn ne dzin no, ohun n’enyimnyam no bio, osiandɛ ɔbaa no do; na ɔtsee ndze a ɔrekã dɛ: Nhyira akã wo, Moses, osiandɛ Emi, Otumfo no, asan mu eyi wo, na wɔbɛma woho ayɛ dzen asen esu pii; na wɔbɛyɛ setsie ama wo mbrasɛm tse dɛ eyɛ Nyame.
Na hwɛ, menye wo wɔ hɔ, kesi wo nkwa nda ewiei mpo; na ebɛgye mo nkorɔfo efi nkowaasom mu, Israel medze a masan mu eyi no mpo.
Na ɔbaa dɛ, ber a ndze no gu do rekasa no, Moses too n’enyi na ohun asaase no, nyew, ne nyinara mpo, na no mu ketseketse mpo nnyi hɔ a oennhu, ɔnam Nyankopɔn no Sunsum do nyaa mu nhunii.
Na ohun hɔn a wɔtse do no so, na ɔkra kor mpo nnyi hɔ a oennhu no; na ɔnam Nyankopɔn no Sunsum do hun hɔn, na hɔn dodow dɔɔ sõ, na wonntum nnkan hɔn tse dɛ anhwea a ogu mpoano mpo.
Na ohun nsaase pii, na asaase kor biara wɔfrɛ no asaase, na dɔm tsetse n’enyi do.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Moses frɛɛ Nyankopɔn see dɛ: Kã kyerɛ me, meserɛ wo, dɛn ntsi na dɛm ndzɛmba yinom tse dɛm, na enam ebɛnadze do yɛɛ hɔn?

Na hwɛ, Ewuradze n’enyimnyam baa Moses do, ntsi Moses gyinaa Nyankopɔn n’enyim, na ɔnye no kasaa enyim na enyim. Na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn see Moses dɛ: Osian mankasa me tsirmpɔw ntsi na mayɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom. Ha na nyansa wɔ na ɔwɔ mo mu.
Na ɔnam m’asɛm no tum do nna mobɔɔ hɔn, ɔno nye me Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no no a adom na nokwar ahyɛ no mã no.
Na wiadze a wonntum nnkan na mobɔe; na mobɔɔ hɔn so wɔ mankasa me tsirmpɔw ho; na menam me Ba no do na mobɔɔ hɔn, nyia ɔyɛ mankasa nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no.
Na mbanyin nyinara mu banyin a odzi kan no mafrɛ no Adam, n’asekyerɛ nye ɔdodow.

Mbom asaase yi, na hɔn a wɔtse do no ho nsɛm nko, na medze ma wo. Na hwɛ, nsaase pii nna wɔnam m’asɛm no tum do etwa mu kɔ. Na pii so wɔ hɔ seseiara, na nyimpa nnkotum akan, mbom ndzɛmba nyinara minyim hɔn dodow, osiandɛ wɔyɛ medze na minyim hɔn.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Moses see Ewuradze dɛ: Hu w’akowaa mbɔbɔr, O Nyankopɔn, na kã dza ɔfa asaase yi, nye dɔm a wɔtse do no ho nsɛm kyerɛ me, nye ɔsorsor no so, na nkyii w’akowaa mo bo bɔdwe.
Na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn see Moses dɛ: Ɔsorsor no, dɔɔ sõ, na nyimpa nnkotum akan hɔn; na emidze minyim hɔn dodow, osiandɛ wɔyɛ medze.
Na sɛ asaase kor twa mu, na no sorsor no twa mu kɔ mpo a kor so bɛba; na mo ndwuma nnyi ewiei, nna me nsɛm so dɛmara.
Na hwɛ, iyi nye m’edwuma na m’enyimnyam—dɛ medze nyimpa ne bɛkyebo na onnyiewiei nkwa bɔbɔ adze.
Na afei, Moses, me babanyin, mebɛkã dza ɔfa asaase a igyina do yi ho asɛm akyerɛ wo; na kyerɛw nsɛm a mebɛkã akyerɛ wo no.

Na da a adasamba bɛfa me nsɛm dɛ ɔnnyɛ hwee na wobeyi nsɛm no mu pii efi nwoma a ebɛkyerɛw no mu no, hwɛ mibeyi obi so a ɔbɔsoɛr tse dɛ ɔwoara; na ɔbɛma adasamba hɔn nsa akã bio—hɔn mu dodowara a wɔbɛgye edzi no.
(Dɛm nsɛm yinom na wɔkãa kyerɛɛ Moses wɔ bepɔw no do, na dɛm dzin no adasamba runnhu da. Na seseiara wɔakã akyerɛ wo. Mma mmfa nnkyerɛ obiara gyedɛ hɔn a wɔgye dzi no. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.)

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/2.title: Moses 2
chapter_summary: Nyankopɔn bɔ ɔsorsor no na asaase—Ndzɛmba nyinara a nkwa wɔ mu no wɔbɔe—Nyankopɔn yɛ nyimpa na ɔma no tum wɔ ndzɛmba nkaa nyinara do.
subtitle: (Obiradzi—Ɔbɛsɛ 1830)

verses.text: Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses, see dɛ: Hwɛ, meda ndzɛmba a ɔfa sor yi, nye dɛm asaase yi edzi kyerɛ wo; kyerɛw nsɛm a merekã yi. Emi nye Ahyɛse na Ewiei no, Otumfo Nyankopɔn no; menam nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no do na mobɔɔ ndzɛmba yinom; nyew, ahyɛse no mobɔɔ sor, nye asaase a igyina do yi.
Na asaase da hɔ hun eso pan; na memaa isum bɛkataa bun enyi; na mo Sunsum twuuw faa nsu no enyi; osiandɛ meyɛ Nyame.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, see dɛ: Ekan mbra; na ekan bae.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hun kan no; nna dɛm kan no oye. Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, tseew kan fii sum no ho.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, frɛɛ ekan no Adzekyee; na isum no, mefrɛɛ no Adzesaa; na menam m’asɛm no tum do yɛɛ iyi, na ɔyɛɛ dɛm ber a mekasaa no; na ewimbir no nye anapa no yɛ da a odzi kan.
Na bio, Emi, Nyankopɔn, see dɛ: Wɔmma wimu mbra nsu no finimfin, na ɔyɛɛ hɔ, dɛm ber a mekasae mpo; na mesee dɛ: Wɔmma esu no ntsew no ho mfi esu no ho; na ɔyɛɛ hɔ dɛm;
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, yɛɛ wimu no na metseew esu no mu, nyew, esu akɛse no a ɔhyɛ wimu no ase no fii esu a ɔwɔ wimu no sor, na ɔyɛɛ hɔ dɛ mbrɛ mekãe no mpo.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, frɛɛ wimu no Ɔsor; na ewimbir no nye anapa no yɛ da a otsia ebien.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, see dɛ: Wɔmma esu a ɔwɔ ɔsor n’ase no ɔmpra nkɔboa fakor, na ɔyɛɛ dɛm; na Emi, Nyankopɔn, see dɛ: Wɔmma wewewdo nyi noho; na ɔyɛɛ dɛm.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, frɛɛ wewewdo no Asaase; na esu no mboano no, mefrɛɛ no Epo; Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hun dɛ ndzɛmba nyinara a mayɛ no oye.

Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, see dɛ: Wɔmma asaase mfifir efuw, nhaban a ɔsow aba, ndua a ɔsow eduaba dɛ mbrɛ no su tse; na dua a ɔsow, dza ɔwɔ n’aba wɔ no mu wɔ asaase no do, na ɔyɛɛ hɔ dɛm mpo ber a mekasae no.
Na asaase fifiir efuw, haban biara a ɔsow aba dɛ mbrɛ no su tse, na dua ɔsow eduaba, dza ɔwɔ n’aba wɔ no mu, dɛ mbrɛ no su tse; na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hun dɛ ndzɛmba nyinara a mayɛ no oye;
Na ewimbir no nye anapa no yɛ da a otsia ebiasa.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, see dɛ: Nkandzea mbra ɔsor wimu no mu, mbeyi adzekyee mfi adzesaa ho, na ɔnyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze, na ɔnyɛ hyɛber nye nda nye mfe;
Na wɔnyɛ nkandzea wɔ ɔsor wimu no mu ma ɔnhyerɛn asaase do; na ɔyɛɛ hɔ dɛm.

Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, yɛɛ nkandzea akɛse ebien; kandzea kɛse no dɛ ɔnhwɛ adzekyee do, na kandzea kakraba no dɛ ɔnhwɛ adzesaa do, na kandzea kɛse no nye ewia, na kandzea kakraba no nye bosoom, na wɔyɛɛ nworaba so dɛ mbrɛ m’asɛm se mpo.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, dze hɔn sisii ɔsor wimu no mu dɛ wɔnhyerɛn asaase do,
Dɛ ewia nhwɛ adzekyee do, na bosoom nhwɛ adzesaa do, na onyi kan mfi sum ho; na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hun dɛ ndzɛmba nyinara a mayɛ no oye;
Na ewimbir no nye anapa no yɛ da a otsia anan.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, see dɛ: Wɔmma esu no ndɔ mbowa a wɔkekã hɔnho a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu menyamenya, na ntumbowa nkyin asaase do wɔ ɔsor wi enyi.

Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, bɔɔ esumbowa akɛse, na esu mbowa a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu a wɔkekã hɔnho a esu no dɔɔ hɔn menyamenya, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee, na ntumbowa nyinara dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee, na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hun dɛ ndzɛmba nyinara a mayɛ no oye.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hyiraa hɔn se dɛ: Hom nwo, na wɔndɔr, na wɔnhyɛ po mu esu mu mã; na ntumbowa ndɔr wɔ asaase do;
Na ewimbir no nye anapa no yɛ da a otsia enum.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, see dɛ: Wɔmma asaase nwo mbowa a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee, anantwi, na mbowa a wɔtsen nye asaase mbowadoma dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee, na ɔyɛɛ dɛm;

Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, yɛɛ asaase mbowadoma dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee, na anantwi dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee, na mbowa a wɔtsen famu nyinara dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee; na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hun dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina oye.

Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, see nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no a ɔnye me wɔ hɔ fi ahyɛse no dɛ: Wɔmma yɛnyɛ nyimpa wɔ hɛn su do wɔ hɛn saso do; na ɔyɛɛ hɔ dɛm. Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, see dɛ: Ma wonya tum wɔ po mu nam do, nye wimu ntumbowa do, nye anantwi do, nye asaase nyinara, nye nketsebowa a wɔtsen asaase do nyinara do.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, bɔɔ nyimpa wɔ mankasa mo su do, wɔ nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no no su do na mobɔɔ no; ɔbanyin nye ɔbaa na mobɔɔ hɔn.

Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hyiraa hɔn na mesee hɔn dɛ: Hom nwo na wɔndɔr, na wɔnhyɛ asaase mã, na wɔnhom do, na hom nnya tum wɔ po mu nam do, nye wimu ntumbowa do, nye biribiara a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu a wɔkekã hɔnho wɔ asaase do nyinara do.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, see nyimpa dɛ: Hwɛ maama hom ahaban biara a ɔsow aba a ɔwɔ asaase nyinara enyi, nye ndua biara a ɔsow eduaba a n’aba wɔ no mu; ɔnyɛ edziban mma hom.
Na asaase mbowadoma biara, nye wimu ntumbowa biara, nye adze biara a ɔtsen wɔ asaase do a maama no nkwa, na mfunoma biara a ho tsew no wondzi; na ɔyɛɛ dɛm, ber a mekaẽ no mpo.
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hun adze biara a mayɛ, na hwɛ, ndzɛmba nyinara a mayɛ no oye papa; na adzesaa nye adzekyee yɛ da a otsĩa esia.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/3.title: Moses 3
chapter_summary: Nyankopɔn bɔɔ ndzɛmba nyinara sunsum mu ansaana wɔreda no su no edzi wɔ asaase do—Ɔbɔɔ ɔbanyin, honam a odzi kan, wɔ asaase do—Ɔbaa yɛ ɔhokãfo ma banyin.
subtitle: (Obiradzi—Ɔbɛsɛ 1830)

verses.text: Dɛm na ɔsor nye asaase wowiee yɛ, nye hɔn mu dɔm nyinara.

Na da a otsĩa esuon no, Emi, Nyankopɔn, wiee m’edwuma yɛ, nye ndzɛmba nyinara a mayɛ no; na megyee m’ahom da a otsĩa esuon no wɔ m’edwuma a mayɛ nyinara mu, na muwiee ndzɛmba nyinara a mayɛ no, na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hun dɛ oye;
Na Emi, Nyankopɔn, hyiraa da a otsĩa esuon no, na metseew ho; osiandɛ ɔno mu na megyee m’ahom wɔ m’edwuma nyinara a Emi, Nyankopɔn mabɔ na mayɛ no.
Na afei, hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, iyinom nye ɔsor nye asaase hɔn santsen ber a wɔbɔɔ hɔn, wɔ da a Emi, Nyankopɔn, yɛɛ ɔsor na asaase no,

Na hamu dua biara ansaana ɔreba asaase do no, na hamu ahaban biara ansaana oribefifir. Osiandɛ Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, na mobɔɔ ndzɛmba nyinara, dza makã ho asɛm no, sunsum mu ansaana wɔreda no su no edzi wɔ asaase enyi do. Osiandɛ Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, memmaa nsu nntɔree nnguu asaase enyi do. Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, mabɔ adasamba nyinara; na nyimpa nnyaa mmbaa a ɔbɔdɔw asaase no; osiandɛ mobɔɔ hɔn wɔ ɔsor; nna honam nnyaa mmbaa asaase do, nye nsu mu, nye wimu so;
Mbom Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, kasae, na nsuwusiw fii asaase do bɔfɔɔw famu nyinara.

Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, dze asaase do huntuma bɔɔ nyimpa, na mohoom nkwahom guu n’ahwentokura mu, na nyimpa bɛyɛɛ ɔkra tseasefo, honam a odzi kan wɔ asaase do, nyimpa a odzi kan so; eso ansaana wɔrobɔ ndzɛmba nyinara; mbom wɔbɔɔ hɔn yɛɛ hɔn sunsum dɛ mbrɛ m’asɛm se.
Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, yɛɛ ture wɔ Eden, wɔ boka afamu, na hɔ na medze ɔbarimba a meyɛɛ no no toe.

Na famu na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, maa ndua biara fii mu fifirii, dza ɔyɛ fɛw wɔ nyimpa enyi do; na nyimpa etum ahwɛ. Na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔkra tseasefo so. Osiandɛ nna ɔyɛ sunsum wɔ da a mobɔɔ no no mu; osiandɛ nna ɔhyɛ bea a Emi, Nyankopɔn, mobɔɔ no no mu, nyew, ndzɛmba nyinara mpo a misiesie dze maa nyimpa; na nyimpa hun dɛ oye dɛ wodzi. Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, duaa nkwadua so wɔ ture no ne finimfin, nye papa na bɔn ho nyimdzee dua no so.
Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, maa esutsen bi fi Eden kɔfɔɔw ture no; na ofi hɔ no na no mu paapaae, na ɔbɛyɛɛ esutsir anan.
Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, dza odzi kan no motoo no dzin Pison, na otwa Havilah asaase nyinara ho hyia, bea a Emi, Ewuradze bɔɔ sika pii guu hɔ no;
Na sika a ɔwɔ dɛm asaase no do no ye; na bdellium nye onyx ɔbo wɔ hɔ.
Na esutsen a otsĩa ebien no ne dzin dze Gihon; ɔno na otwa Ethiopia asaase nyinara ho hyia no.
Na esutsen a otsĩa ebiasa no ne dzin dze Hiddekel; ɔno na otwa mu dze kɔ Assyria boka afamu no. Na esutsen a otsĩa anan no nye Euphrates no.
Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, faa ɔbarimba no, na medze no kɔtoo Eden Ture no mu dɛ onsiesie hɔ, na ɔnhwɛ do.
Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, hyɛɛ nyimpa no mbra, dɛ: Ndua a ɔwɔ ture no mu no, ibotum edzi bi.
Mbom papa na bɔn ho nyimdzee dua no dze mma nndzi bi, eso, ibotum afa dza ɔwoara epɛ ama woho, osiandɛ medze wo pɛ ama wo; mbom kaa dɛ mabra, na da a ibedzi bi no ampaara dɛ ibowu.
Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, see nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no dɛ onnye dɛ ɔbarimba no nko tsena hɔ; dɛm ntsi mebɛyɛ boafo a ɔfata no mama no.

Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, medze dɛtse yɛɛ hamu mbowadoma nyinara, nye wimu ntumbowa nyinara; na mehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbra Adam hɔ, ma ɔnhwɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛfrɛ hɔn; na hɔn so wɔyɛ akra atseasefo; osiandɛ Emi, Nyankopɔn, guu nkwa ahom guu hɔn mu, na mehyɛɛ dɛ dzin biara a Adam dze bɛfrɛ abɔdze biara a nkwa wɔ no mu no, ɔnoara nye ne dzin.
Na Adam totoo anantwi, nyinara, nye wimu ntumbowa, nye hamu mbowadoma nyinara edzin; mbom Adam dze, woennhu ɔboafo a ɔfata no amma no.
Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, maa nda heii tɔɔ Adam no do, na ɔdae, na miyii ne mparba no mu kor na mesiiw honam no hyɛɛ n’ananmu;
Na aparba no a Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, yii fii ɔbarimba no mu no, medze yɛɛ ɔbaa, na medze no brɛɛ ɔbarimba no.
Na Adam see dɛ: Afei minyim dɛ oyi nye me mbiew mu biew, na mo honam mu nam; wɔbɛfrɛ no Ɔbaa, osiandɛ woyii no fii ɔbarimba mu,
Dɛm ntsi na ɔbarimba begya n’egya na ne nã wɔ hɔ, na ɔdze noho akɛfam ne yer ho; na wɔayɛ honankor.
Na hɔn beenu no nyinara dzi adagyaw, ɔbarimba no nye ne yer, na hɔn enyi nntõ.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/4.title: Moses 4
chapter_summary: Mbrɛ osii ma Satan bɛyɛɛ abɔnsam—Ɔsɔ Eve hwɛ—Adam na Eve hwe ase, na owu ba wiadze.
subtitle: (Obiradzi—Ɔbɛsɛ 1830)

verses.text: Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses, see dɛ: Dɛm Satan no, nyia ehyɛɛ no wɔ nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no ne dzin mu no, ɔnoara so nye nyia ɔwɔ hɔ fi ahyɛse no, na ɔbaa m’enyim, see dɛ—Hwɛ, mowɔ ha, soma me, mebɛyɛ wo babanyin, na mobɔpon adasa nyinara, ma ɔkra kor mpo rennyew, na ampaara dɛ mebɛyɛ; dɛm ntsi fa w’enyimnyam ma me.
Mbom, hwɛ, mo Dɔba no, a ɔyɛ mo Dɔfo no a mesaan mu yii no fi ahyɛse no, see me dɛ—Egya, wo pɛ nyɛ hɔ, na enyimnyam no nyɛ wodze afebɔɔ.

Dɛm ntsi, osiandɛ dɛm Satan no tseew etua wɔ mo do no, na ɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔsɛɛ nyimpa ne pɛ no a Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, dze ama no no, na dɛ, memfa mankasa mo tum so mma no no; menam nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no, no tum do maa wɔtoow no kyeen famu;
Na ɔbɛyɛɛ Satan, nyew, abɔnsam mpo, akɔhwi nyinara egya, dɛ ɔndaadaa na ɔmfura adasa hɔn enyi, na ongya hɔn nkɔ ndɔmmum mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛ, dodowara a wonnketsie me ndze mpo.
Na afei abowatsena no yɛ onyitsewfo kyɛn hamu abowa biara a Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn ayɛ.
Na Satan dze hyɛɛ abowatsena n’akoma mu, (osiandɛ ɔatwe dodowara edzi n’ekyir,) na ɔpɛɛ so dɛ ɔbɛdaadaa Eve, osiandɛ nna onnyim Nyankopɔn n’adwen, dɛm ntsi ɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ wiadze.
Na ɔsee ɔbaa no dɛ: Nyew, ana Nyankopɔn ase dɛ—Mma hom nndzi ture yi mu ndua nyinara bi? (Na ɔkasaa duaa abowatsena n’anomu.)
Na ɔbaa no see abowatsena no dɛ: Ture yi mu ndua n’eduaba no yɛwɔ ho kwan dɛ yedzi bi;
Mbom dua a ihu a osi ture ne finimfin no n’eduaba no, na Nyankopɔn ase dɛ—Mma hom nndzi, eso mma hom mmfa hom nsa nnkã, ɔno hom bowu.
Na abowatsena no see ɔbaa no dɛ: Ampaara dɛ hom nnkowu bi;
Osiandɛ Nyankopɔn nyim dɛ da a hom bedzi bi no, hom enyi bobue, na hom bɛyɛ dɛ enyame, na hom ehu papa nye bɔn.
Na ber a ɔbaa no hun dɛ dua no ye dɛ wodzi, na ɔyɛ akɔndɔ, na ɔyɛ dua a ɔbɛma ɔayɛ nyansafo no, ɔtseew n’eduaba no bi, na odzii, na ɔmaa no kun a ɔkã noho so bi, na odzii.
Na hɔn beenu nyinara hɔn enyiwa buebuei, na wohun dɛ wodzi adagyaw. Na wɔpepaam adɔmbadua n’ahataw na wɔyɛɛ nsamenyim maa hɔnho.
Na wɔtsee Ewuradze Nyankopɔn ne ndze, ber a wɔnam ture no mu ewimbibaamu; na Adam nye ne yer no kosumae fii Ewuradze Nyankopɔn n’enyim wɔ ture no mu ndua no mu.
Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, frɛɛ Adam na mesee no dɛ: Erokɔ hen?
Na ɔsee dɛ: Metsee wo ndze wɔ ture no mu, na musuroi, osiandɛ muhun dɛ midzi adagyaw, na musumaa moho.
Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, see Adam dɛ: Woana kãa kyerɛɛ wo dɛ idzi adagyaw? Ana edzi dua a mehyɛɛ wo ho mbra dɛ mma nndzi bi no bi, sɛ dɛm a nna nokwar owu ara na ibowu?
Na ɔbarimba no see dɛ: Ɔbaa no a edze no maa me no, na ehyɛɛ no mbra dɛ ɔnkã moho no, ɔno na ɔmaa me dua no n’eduaba no bi na midzii.
Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, see ɔbaa no dɛ: Ebɛnadze na ayɛ yi? Na ɔbaa no see dɛ: Abowatsena no na ɔdaadaa me, na midzii.

Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, see abowatsena no dɛ: Osiandɛ ayɛ iyi ntsi, ndom bɛkã wo akyɛn ofiembowa nyinara, na hamu mbowadoma nyinara, wo yafun do na ebɛnantsew, na huntuma na ibedzi wo nkwa nda nyinara;
Na medze ɔtan bɔto ɔwo na ɔbaa no ntamu, na w’asefo nye n’asefo ntamu; ɔbɔbɔ wo tsir, na wo so abɔ n’anantsir.
Ɔbaa no, Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, see no dɛ: Mebɛma w’awokõ mu amandzehu adɔɔ sõ kɛse. Ɔfona mu na ebɔwo mba, na ebɛdan wo kun, na ɔbɔhwɛ wo do.

Na Adam dze, Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, see no dɛ: Osiandɛ etsie wo yer ne ndze, na idzii dua n’eduaba a mehyɛɛ wo ho mbra dɛ—Mma nndzi bi no ntsi, ndom bɛkã asaase no wɔ wo ntsi; awerɛhow mu na ibedzidzi do wo nkwa nda nyinara.
Nsoɛ nye nhwirom so na obefifir ama wo, na ibedzi hamu ahaban.
W’enyim mfifir mu na ibedzidzi, kɛpem dɛ ebɛsan akɔ daadze—na ampaara dɛ ibowu—osiandɛ ɔno mu na woyii wo fii; na huntuma na eyɛ, na huntuma mu na ebɛsan akɔ.
Na Adam too ne yer no dzin Eve, osiandɛ ɔno na ɔyɛ atseasefo nyinara hɔn nã; na dɛm na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, dze frɛɛ mbaa nyinara hɔn mu nyia odzi kan, na wɔdɔɔ sõ.
Adam, nye ne yer so, Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, yɛɛ nwoma ntar, na medze hyɛɛ hɔn.

Na Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, see nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no dɛ: Hwɛ, nyimpa no abɛyɛ dɛ hɛn mu kor, onyim papa nye bɔn; na afei bɛyɛ na ɔatsen ne nsa na ɔatsew nkwadua no so bi, na oedzi na ɔatsena ase afebɔɔ.
Dɛm ntsi Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, mebɛma woefir edzi efi Eden Ture no mu dɛ ɔnkɔdɔw daadze a woyii no fii mu no;
Na dɛ mbrɛ Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, tse ase yi, dɛmara so na me nsɛm nnkɛsan aba kwa, osiandɛ sɛ wofi m’anomu pue a otwar dɛ ɔhyɛ mã.
Dɛm ntsi miyii nyimpa no edzi, na medze cherubfo nye gya nkrantsee a onyinanyinam, sii Eden Ture boka afamu dɛ wɔmbɔ nkwadua no ho ban.
(Na nsɛm yinom na mekãa kyerɛɛ m’akowaa Moses, na ɔyɛ nokwar dɛ mbrɛ me pɛ ara mpo, na makã akyerɛ wo. Hwɛ mma mmfa nnkyerɛ nyimpa biara, kɛpem dɛ mebɛse wo, gyedɛ hɔn a wɔgye dzi no nko. Amen.)

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/5.title: Moses 5
chapter_summary: Adam na Eve wo mba—Adam bɔ afɔr na ɔsom Nyankopɔn—Wɔwo Cain na Abel—Cain tsew etua, ɔdɔ Satan kyɛn Nyankopɔn, na ɔbɛyɛ Ɔsɛɛba—Ewudzi na emumuyɛdze tserɛw—Wɔkã asɛmpa fi ahyɛse.
subtitle: (Obiradzi—Bɛsɛ 1830)

verses.text: Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, yii hɔn edzi no, Adam hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrodɔw asaase no do, na ɔrehyɛ hamu mbowadoma nyinara do, na ɔnam n’enyim mfifir mu ridzi n’edziban, dɛ mbrɛ Emi, Ewuradze ahyɛ no no. Na Eve, ne yer so, nye no yɛɛ edwuma.
Na Adam hun ne yer, na ɔwoo mbabanyin na mbabaa maa no, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrodɔr na wɔrehyɛ asaase mã.
Ofi dɛm aber no dze kɔ, Adam ne mbabanyin na ne mbabaa warwaar hɔnho wɔ asaase no do na wɔdɔɔw asaase no, na wɔnyɛɛn nguan, na hɔn so wɔwoo mbabanyin na mbabaa.
Na Adam na ne yer Eve, bɔɔ Ewuradze dzin frɛɛ no, na wɔtsee Ewuradze ne ndze wɔ kwan a ɔdze kɔ Eden Ture no mu, ɔrekasa kyerɛ hɔn, na woennhu no; osiandɛ woesiw hɔn kwan wɔ n’enyim.
Na ɔmaa hɔn mbrasɛm, dɛ wɔnsom Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, na wɔmfa hɔn nguan mu mbakan mbɔ afɔr mma Ewuradze. Na Adam yɛɛ setsie maa Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm.
Na nda pii ekyir no Ewuradze no bɔfoe yii noho kyerɛɛ Adam, see dɛ: Ebɛnadze ntsi na ebɔ afɔr ma Ewuradze? Na Adam see no dɛ: Minnyim, Ewuradze na ɔhyɛɛ me dɛ menyɛ.
Na nkyii bɔfo no kasaa see dɛ: Dɛm adze yi yɛ nyia Egya Woo no Kortoo no no n’afɔrbɔ ne saso, nyia adom na nokwar ahyɛ no mã no.
Dɛm ntsi, adze nyinara a ebɛyɛ no yɛ no wɔ Ɔba no ne dzin mu, na nu woho na bɔ Nyankopɔn ne dzin frɛ no wɔ Ɔba no ne dzin mu daapem.

Na dɛm da no mu na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tɔɔ Adam do, ɔno na ɔgye dase wɔ Egya na Ɔba ho, se dɛ: Emi nye nyia Egya Woo no Kortoo no no fitsi aber yi na afebɔɔ, na osiandɛ ahwe ase ntsi wɔbɔpon wo nye adasamba nyinara, dodowara mpo a wɔbɛpɛ no.

Na dɛm da no mu Adam hyiraa Nyankopɔn na onyaa mãhyɛ na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrehyɛ nkɔm fa asaase do ebusua ebusua nyinara ho, see dɛ: Nhyira nkã Nyankopɔn ne dzin, na osian me mbrato ntsi m’enyiwa ebue, na nkwa ber yi mu mebenya enyigye, na bio honam mu no mubohu Nyankopɔn.

Na ne yer, Eve, tsee nsɛm yinom nyinara na n’enyi gyee, see dɛ: Sɛ nnyɛ hɛn mbrato a nkyɛ yerinnya mbasantsen da, na yerunnhu papa na bɔn, nna hɛn mponee ho dɛwdzi, nye onnyiewiei nkwa a Nyankopɔn dze ma hɔn a wɔyɛ setsie nyinara.
Na Adam na Eve hyiraa Nyankopɔn ne dzin, na wɔkãa biribiara kyerɛɛ hɔn mbabanyin na hɔn mbabaa.

Na Satan bae bɔforaa hɔn mu, see dɛ: Mo so meyɛ Nyame ne ba; na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn, see dɛ: Mma hom nngye nndzi; na wɔanngye enndzi, na wɔdɔɔ Satan koraa kyɛɛn Nyankopɔn. Na nyimpa hyɛɛ ase fi dɛm aber no dze kɔ no, bɛyɛɛ, honandze akɔndɔdze, na mbɔnsamdze.
Na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn nam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no do frɛɛ adasa na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn mbra dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ wonu hɔnho;

Na dodowara a wɔgyee Ɔba no dzii, na wonuu hɔnho fii hɔn bɔn ho no, wɔbɛgye hɔn nkwa; na dodowara a wɔanngye enndzi na woennu hɔnho no, wobobu hɔn fɔ; na nsɛm no fii Nyankopɔn n’anomu puei yɛɛ mbrasɛm a otsim hɔ, dɛm ntsi ɔwɔ dɛ wɔhyɛ mã.

Na Adam na ne yer, Eve, enngyaa dɛ wɔbɛfrɛ Nyankopɔn. Na Adam hun ne yer Eve, na onyinsenii na ɔwoo Cain, na ɔsee dɛ: Menya banyin efi Ewuradze hɔ; dɛm ntsi onnyi dɛ ɔpow ne nsɛm. Mbom hwɛ, Cain enntsie, see dɛ: Woana nye Ewuradze no a ɔwɔ dɛ mitsie no no?
Na onyinseen bio na ɔwoo no nuabanyin Abel. Na Abel yɛɛ aso maa Ewuradze ne ndze. Na Abel hwɛ nguan do, mbom Cain dɔw hamu.
Na Cain dɔɔ Satan kyɛɛn Nyankopɔn. Na Satan hyɛɛ no, see dɛ: Bɔ afɔr ma Ewuradze.
Na mber guu mu no, ɔbaa dɛ Cain dze ekuadze bɔbɔɔ afɔr maa Ewuradze.
Na Abel, ɔno so dze no nguan mu mbakan, na dza wɔadodɔ seradze mu bi bae. Na Ewuradze n’enyi sɔɔ Abel, na n’afɔrbɔ;
Mbom Cain, nye n’afɔrbɔ dze n’enyi annsɔ. Afei Satan nyim iyi, na n’enyi gyee. Na Cain no bo fuuw kɛsenara, na no ntɔn himae.
Na Ewuradze see Cain dɛ: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wo bo efuw yi? Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wo ntɔn ehima yi?

Sɛ eyɛ papa a, wɔbɛgye wo ato mu. Na sɛ annyɛ papa a, bɔn kotow abowano, na Satan pɛ dɛ onya wo; na gyedɛ itsie me mbrasɛm, annyɛ dɛm a mibegyaa wo mu ama no, na ɔbɛyɛ hɔ ama wo dɛ mbrɛ ne pɛ tse. Na ebɔhwɛ no do;
Na ofi aber yi dze kɔ ebɛyɛ n’ator nyina hɔn egya; wɔbɛfrɛ wo Ɔsɛɛbabanyin; osiandɛ ɔwo so ewɔ hɔ ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze.
Na mber bɛba a wɔbɛkã dɛ—Dɛm ebusudze yinom hyɛɛ ase fi Cain do; osiandɛ ɔpoow afotu kɛse no a onyaa fii Nyankopɔn hɔ no; na iyi yɛ ndom a medze bɛba wo do, nna gyedɛ inu woho.
Na Cain no bo fuwii, na oenntsie Ewuradze ne ndze bio, nna oenntsie no nuabanyin Abel so, a ɔnantseew krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu wɔ Ewuradze enyim no.
Na Adam na ne yer dzii awerɛhow wɔ Ewuradze enyim, osian Cain na no nuanom ntsi.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Cain faa no nuanom mbanyin mu kor ne babaa waar no, na wɔdɔɔ Satan kyɛɛn Nyankopɔn.

Na Satan see Cain dɛ: Fa wo menmu dzi nsew kyerɛ me na sɛ ekã a ibowu; na ma wo nuanom no so mfa hɔn etsir ndzi nsew, nye Nyame tseasefo dɛ wɔrennkã; na sɛ wɔkã a ampaara dɛ wobowu; na iyi nye dɛ w’egya nnkɛtse; na ndɛ da yi mibeyi wo nuabanyin Abel ahyɛ wo nsamu.
Na Satan dzii nsew kyerɛɛ Cain dɛ ɔnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ne mbra se no. Na wɔyɛɛ ndzɛmba yinom nyina wɔ nsumaamu.
Na Cain see dɛ: Nokwar meyɛ Mahan, dɛm esumadze kɛse yi no wura, dɛ mibedzi ewu na menya mfaso. Dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ Cain Owura Mahan, na ɔhoahoaa noho wɔ n’emumuyɛdze mu.
Na Cain kɔr hamu, na Cain nye no nuabanyin Abel kasae. Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wɔwɔ hamu hɔ no, Cain soɛɛr no nuabanyin Abel do, na okum no.
Na Cain hoahoaa noho wɔ dza ɔayɛ no ho, see dɛ: moho atɔ me, ampaara dɛ mo nuabanyin no nguan no abɛyɛ medze.
Na Ewuradze see Cain dɛ: Wo nuabanyin Abel, wɔ hen? Na ɔsee dɛ: Minnyim. Ana emi nye mo nuabanyin no hwɛfo?
Na Ewuradze see dɛ: Ebɛnadze na ayɛ yi? Wo nuabanyin no bɔgyaa ndze fi famu su frɛ me.
Na afei ndom bekã wo efi asaase a ɔahan n’anomu regye wo nuabanyin no bɔgyaa wɔ wo nsamu no.
Sɛ edɔw asaase a, ɔdze kɔr yi onnkeyi n’ahoɔdzen ama wo. Ɔkobɔfo nye ɔwonawonafo na ebɛyɛ wɔ asaase do.
Na Cain see Ewuradze dɛ: Satan na ɔsɔɔ me hwɛe osian mo nuabanyin no nguan ntsi. Na mo bo fuwii so; osiandɛ egyee n’afɔrbɔ no na anngye medze no; m’asotwe sõ kyɛn dɛ mubotum asoa.

Hwɛ eyi me edzi ndɛ da yi efi Ewuradze n’enyim, na w’enyim na mubosuma efi; na mebɛyɛ kobɔfo nye wonawonafo wɔ asaase do; na ɔbɛba dɛ, obiara a obohu me no oboku me, osian mo bɔn ntsi, osiandɛ ndzɛmba yinom nnsuma Ewuradze.
Na Emi Ewuradze see no dɛ: Obiara a oboku wo no wobedzi no wer mpɛn esuon. Na Emi Ewuradze yɛɛ asɛnkyerɛdze bi wɔ Cain ho, amma obi hu no a oeennku no.
Na woyii Cain edzi fii Ewuradze n’enyim, na ɔnye ne yer na n’enuanom dodowara kɛtsenaa Nod asaase do wɔ Eden no boka hɔ.
Na Cain hun ne yer, na onyinsenii na ɔwoo Enoch, na ɔwoo mbabanyin na mbabaa pii so. Na ɔkyekyeer kurow, na ɔfrɛɛ kuropɔn no ne dzin Enoch dɛ mbrɛ ne ba no ne dzin tse.
Na wɔwoo Irad maa Enoch, na mbabanyin na mbabaa binom so. Na Irad woo Mahujael, na mbabanyin nye mbabaa binom so. Na Mahujael woo Methusael na mbabanyin nye mbabaa binom so. Na Mathusael woo Lamech.
Na Lamech waar yernom beenu; baako ne dzin dze Adah, na kor so ne dzin dze Zillah.
Na Adah woo Jabal, ɔno nye hɔn a wɔtsena asese mu na wɔhwɛ anantwi do no hɔn egya; na no nuabanyin no ne dzin dze Jubal, ɔno nye asankubɔfo nye mbɛnhɛmfo nyinara hɔn egya.
Na Zillah, ɔno so woo Tubal Cain, ɔyɛ kɔɔber nye daadze edwimfo nyinara hɔn kyerɛkyerɛnyi. Na Tubal Cain n’akyerɛbaa ne dzin dze Naamah.
Na Lamech see ne yernom, Adah nye Zillah dɛ: Hom ntsie me ndze, hom Lamech ne yernom, hom nyɛ aso mma me kasaa; osiandɛ mekum ɔbarimba ma oepira me, na aberantsɛ bi ma ɔahaw me.
Sɛ wobedzi Cain ho wer mpɛn esuon a, nna ampa dɛ Lamech dze, mpɛn eduosuon esuon;

Na Lamech nye Satan dzii ahyɛmu, dɛ mbrɛ Cain yɛɛ no pɛpɛɛpɛr, ma ɔnam do bɛyɛɛ Owura Mahan no, nsumaamudze kɛse no a Satan nye Cain hɛɛn mu no no wura; na Irad, Enoch ne babanyin no, hun hɔn nsumaamudze no na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔreda no edzi akyerɛ Adam ne mbabanyin no;
Dɛm ntsi Lamech no bo fuwii ma okum no, ɔnntse dɛ Cain dze yɛɛ no nuabanyin Abel, ama ɔdze enya mfaso, mbom okum no osian nsewdzi no ntsi.
Na ofi Cain n’aber do nna nsumaamu fɛkuwbɔ no wɔ hɔ, na hɔn dwumadzi no wɔ sum mu, na hɔn mu biara nyim no nua.

Dɛm ntsi Ewuradze maa ndom kãa Lamech na ne fifo, nye hɔn nyinara a wɔnye Satan edzi ahyɛmu no; osiandɛ wonndzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm no do, na Nyame n’enyi anngye ho, na ɔannsom hɔn, na hɔn ndwuma yɛ ebusudze, na wɔhyɛɛ ase tserɛɛw wɔ adasamba nyinara mu. Na ɔwɔ adasamba mu.

Na adasambabaa no hɔn mu no wɔannkã dɛm ndzɛmba yinom, osiandɛ Lamech kãa nsumaamudze no kyerɛɛ ne yernom, na wɔtseew etua wɔ no do, na wɔbɔɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho dawur dze puei, na woennya ehumbɔbɔr;
Dɛm ntsi wɔpoow Lamech, na wɔpaam no, na ɔammba adasamba mu, bɛyɛ na oewu.
Na dɛm na sum mu dwumadzi hyɛɛ ase tserɛɛw wɔ adasamba nyinara mu.
Na Nyankopɔn dze ndom dzendzen doom asaase, na no bo fuuw emumuyɛfo, nye adasamba nyinara a ɔayɛ hɔn no;
Na wɔannyɛ aso amma ne ndze, nna wɔanngye ne Ba a Wɔwoo Kortoo no no enndzi, nyia ɔbɔɔ noho dawur dɛ ɔbɛba mber nkyekyɛmu ntamu, nyia woesiesie no ato hɔ fi wiadze fapem no.
Na dɛm na ɔmaa wɔhyɛɛ ase kãa Asɛmpa no, fi ahyɛse no a wɔnam abɔfo krɔnkrɔn a wɔsomaa hɔn fii Nyankopɔn enyim, na ɔnam nankasa ne ndze do, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn akyɛdze no do bɔɔ ho dawur no.
Na dɛm na ɔmaa wɔnam ayɛdze krɔnkrɔn do, sii ndzɛmba nyinara pi dze maa Adam, na wɔkãa Asɛmpa no, na ɔhyɛɛ ɔmom dɛ ɔnwɔ wiadze mu, nkesi n’ewiei, na dɛm na ɔyɛe. Amen.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/6.title: Moses 6
chapter_summary: Adam n’asefo sie nkaa nwoma—N’asefo atseneneefo no kãa nnuho nsɛm—Nyankopɔn yi Noho kyerɛ Enoch—Enoch kã asɛmpa no—Wɔda nkwagye ho nhyehyɛɛ no edzi kyerɛ Adam—Ne nsa kã ennuma nye asɔfodzi no.
subtitle: (Ɔbrafɛw—Mumu 1830)

verses.text: Na Adam yɛɛ aso maa Nyankopɔn ne ndze, na ɔsee ne mbabanyin dɛ wonnu hɔnho.
Na Adam hun ne yer bio, na ɔwoo babanyin, na ɔtoo no dzin Seth. Na Adam hyɛɛ Nyankopɔn ne dzin enyimnyam; na ɔsee dɛ: Nyankopɔn ama me ba kor so, dze ahyɛ Abel a Cain kum no no ananmu.
Na Nyankopɔn yii noho kyerɛɛ Seth, na ɔanntsew etua, mbom ɔbɔɔ afɔr a ɔsɔ enyi, tse dɛ no nuabanyin Abel nedze no. Na no so woo babanyin, na ɔtoo no dzin Enos.
Na nkyii mbarimba yinom hyɛɛ ase bɔɔ Ewuradze ne dzin, na Ewuradze hyiraa hɔn.
Na wɔdze nkaa nwoma siei, no mu na wɔkyerɛɛw Adam ne kasaa, osiandɛ wɔdze maa dodowara a wɔfrɛɛ Nyankopɔn dɛ wondua sunsum no ne nkenyan do nkyerɛw;
Na wɔnam hɔn do na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn mba dɛ wɔnkenkan na wɔnkyerɛw hɔn kasaa no a no ho tsew na fĩ nnyi ho no.
Afei Asɔfodzi kor yi ara a ɔwɔ hɔ ahyɛse no, bɛtsena hɔ dze ekesi wiadze n’ewiei so.

Afei nkɔnhyɛsɛm yi na Adam kãe, ber a Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no kenyaan no no, na Nyankopɔn ne mba no kyerɛɛw hɔn ebusuasantsen dze siei. Na iyi nye Adam n’ebusuasantsen nwoma no, na ɔsee dɛ: Da a Nyankopɔn bɔɔ nyimpa no, Nyankopɔn ne saso do na ɔyɛɛ no;
Nankasa ne nyimpadua su do, ɔbanyin na ɔbaa, na ɔbɔɔ hɔn, na ohyiraa hɔn, na ɔfrɛɛ hɔn Adam, wɔ da a wɔbɔɔ hɔn na wɔbɛyɛɛ akra atseasefo wɔ asaase a ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn n’ananadzegua no do.
Na Adam dzii mfe ɔha eduasa, na ɔwoo babanyin wɔ ne saso do, wɔ nankasa no su do, na ɔtoo no dzin Seth.
Na Adam ne nda mu no, ber a ɔwoo Seth, n’ekyir no yɛ mfe ahaawɔtwe, na ɔwoo mbabanyin na mbabaa pii;
Na nda a Adam dzii nyinara yɛ mfe ahaakron eduasa, na owui.
Seth dzii mfe ɔha nye enum, na ɔwoo Enos, na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm ne nda nyinara mu, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ ne babanyin Enos wɔ Nyankopɔn n’akwan no mu; dɛm ntsi Enos so hyɛɛ nkɔm.
Na Seth woo Enos n’ekyir no, odzii mfe ahaawɔtwe nye esuon, na ɔwoo mbabanyin na mbabaa pii.

Na adasamba dɔree wɔ asaase enyi nyina do. Na dɛm nda no mu Satan nyaa tum kɛse wɔ nyimpa mu, na ɔdzɛwee wɔ hɔn akoma mu; na ofi dɛm aber no do na akokoeko na bɔgyakã bae; na nyimpa maa ne nsa do tsia nankasa no nua, na odzii ewu, osian nsumaamu ndwuma ntsi, wɔperee hwehwɛɛ tum.
Na Seth ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaakron nye duebien, na owui.

Na Enos dzii mfe eduokron no, na ɔwoo Cainan. Na Enos nye Nyame no nkorɔfo nkaa no fii asaase a wɔfrɛ no Shulon do na wɔbɛtsenaa anohoba asaase do, dza ɔdze nankasa ne babanyin a ɔato no dzin Cainan too do no.
Na Enos woo Cainan no n’ekyir no odzii mfe ahaawɔtwe nye duenum, na ɔwoo mbabanyin nye mbabaa pii. Na Enos ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahakron nye enum, na owui.

Na Cainan dzii mfe eduosuon no, na ɔwoo Mahalaleel; na Cainan woo Mahalaleel no n’ekyir no odzii mfe ahaawɔtwe eduanan, na ɔwoo mbabanyin nye mbabaa. Na Cainan ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaakron nye du, na owui.

Na Mahalaleel dzii mfe eduosia enum, na ɔwoo Jared; na Mahalaleel woo Jared no n’ekyir no odzii mfe ahaawɔtwe nye eduasa, na ɔwoo mbabanyin na mbabaa. Na Mahalaleel ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaawɔtwe eduokron enum, na owui.
Na Jared dzii mfe ɔha eduosia ebien no, na ɔwoo Enoch; na Jared woo Enoch no n’ekyir no, odzii mfe ahaawɔtwe, na ɔwoo mbabanyin nye mbabaa. Na Jared kyerɛkyerɛɛ Enoch Nyame n’akwan nyinara mu.
Na iyi nye Adam ne mbabanyin hɔn ebusuasantsen, nyia ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn ne babanyin no, ɔno na Nyankopɔn nankasa nye no twetwee nkɔmbɔ no.
Nna wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔkã tseneneeyɛ ho nsɛm, na wɔkasaa na wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm, na wɔfrɛɛ nyimpa nyinara, wɔ mbea nyinara, dɛ wonnu hɔnho; na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ adasamba gyedzi.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Jared ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaakron eduosia ebien, na owui.
Na Enoch dzii mfe eduosia enum no, na ɔwoo Methuselah.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Enoch tuu kwan wɔ asaase no do wɔ nkorɔfo no mu; na n’akwantu mu no, Nyankopɔn no Sunsum fi sor, na ɔbɛtsenaa no mu.

Na ɔtsee ndze fi sor, se dɛ: Enoch, mebabanyin, hyɛ nkɔm kyerɛ nkorɔfo yi, na se hɔn dɛ—Hom nnu homho, na dɛm na Ewuradze se: Mo bo efuw nkorɔfo yi, na m’ebufuhyew adzɛw etsia hɔn, osiandɛ hɔn akoma ayɛ dzen, na hɔn aso esisiw, na hɔn enyiwa nntum nnhu ekyir;

Na osian ebusuasantsen pii yinom, ofi da a mobɔɔ hɔn no, wɔafom kwan, na wɔapow me, na wɔaper edzi hɔnankasa hɔn apam ekyir wɔ sum mu; na hɔnankasa hɔn ebusudze mu na wɔahyehyɛ ewudzi, na woenndzi mbrasɛm no a, medze maa hɔn egya, Adam no.
Dɛm ntsi, hɔnankasa akã ntanhun, na ɔnam hɔnankasa hɔn nsewdzi do dze owu aba hɔnankasa hɔn do; na mesiesie hɛl ama hɔn, sɛ woennu hɔnho a;

Na iyi nye ɔmom a, medze ama fi wiadze ahyɛse, dza ofi mankasa m’anomu, ofitsi fapem do, na ofi mo nkowaa hɔn anomu, hom egyanom do na mehyɛɛ ɔmom no, dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze bɔkɔ wiadze, dze ekesi n’ewiei mpo.

Na ber a Enoch tsee dɛm nsɛm yinom no, ɔbɔɔ no mu adze wɔ asaase no do, wɔ Ewuradze enyim, na ɔkasaa wɔ Ewuradze enyim, see dɛ: Ɔyɛ no dɛn na medzi bem wɔ w’enyim yi, na meyɛ abrantsɛ, na mo nkorɔfo nyinara kyir me; na me kasaa yɛ nyaa; ana meyɛ w’akowaa?

Na Ewuradze see Enoch dɛ: Kɔ na kɛyɛ dza mahyɛ wo no, na obiara nnkotum epira wo. Bue w’ano, na wɔbɛhyɛ no mã, na mebɛyɛ wo kasamaafo, osiandɛ honam nyinara hyɛ me nsa, na mebɛyɛ dza mehwɛ a oye ma me.
Se nkorɔfo yi dɛ: Hom nsan mu nyi ndɛ da yi, dɛ wɔbɔsom Ewuradze Nyankopɔn a ɔyɛɛ hom no.

Hwɛ mo Sunsum wɔ wo do, dɛm ntsi wo nsɛm nyinara mebɛgye ato mu, na mbepɔw nyinara boguan efi w’enyim, na esutsen bɛdan efi hɔn kwan do; na ebɛtsena mo mu, na mo so matsena wo mu; dɛm ntsi enye me nnantsew.
Na Ewuradze kasaa kyerɛɛ Enoch, na ɔsee no dɛ: Fa dɛtse yɛ w’enyiwa do, na hohor, na ibohu. Na ɔyɛe.
Na ohun esunsum a Nyankopɔn abɔ; na ohun ndzɛmba so a wonntum mmfa honam enyiwa nnhu; na ofi dɛm aber no dze ba na dɛm kasa yi tahyee wɔ asaase no do dɛ: Adzehunyi na Ewuradze eyi dze ama no nkorɔfo.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Enoch kyiin asaase no do, wɔ nkorɔfo no mu, ogyinaa akoko na mbea a ɔkrɔn do, na ɔdze ndze kɛse tseatseaa mu gyee dase tsiaa hɔn ndwuma; na ɔtoo nyimpa nyinara fintsindua wɔ ɔno ntsi.

Na wɔbae betsiei no, wɔ mbea a ɔkrɔn no do, see asese ahwɛdofo no dɛ: Hom ntweɔn ha na hom nhwɛ asese no do, ber a yɛrokɔ ekyir hɔ akɔhwɛ adzehunyi no, osiandɛ ɔrehyɛ nkɔm, na adze bi a ɔyɛ nwanwa wɔ asaase yi do; nyimpa bɔyafo bi aba hɛn mu.
Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a wotsiee no no, obiara ammfa ne nsa ennsuo no mu; osiandɛ suro kãa hɔn nyinara a wotsiee no no; osiandɛ ɔnye Nyame nantsewee.
Na ɔbarimba bi baa no hɔ, ne dzin dze Mahijah, na ɔsee no dɛ: Kã kyerɛ hɛn pefee woana nye wo, na ifi hen na ebae?
Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Mifi Cainan asaase do bae, hɛn egyanom asaase, asaase a ɔyɛ tsenenee dze besi ndɛ da yi. Na m’egya kyerɛkyerɛɛ me Nyame n’akwan nyinara.

Na ɔbaa dɛ, ber a mutuu kwan fii Cainan asaase do wɔ po no boka no, muhun enyido-adzehu bi; na hwɛ, ɔsorsor na muhunii, na Ewuradze nye me kasae, na ɔmaa me mbrasɛm; dɛm ntsi, osian dɛm adze yi ho, dɛ mibedzi mbrasɛm no do ntsi, na mekã nsɛm yinom to gua.

Na Enoch sɔɔw ne kasaa do, see dɛ: Ewuradze no a ɔnye me kasae no, ɔnoara so nye ɔsor Nyankopɔn no, na ɔyɛ me Nyankopɔn, na hom Nyankopɔn, na hom yɛ m’enuanom, na ebɛnadze ntsi na hom ma homho apam, na hom pow ɔsor Nyankopɔn yi?
Ɔyɛɛ sor, na asaase yɛ n’ananadzegua; na fapem a ɔwɔ hɔ no yɛ nedze. Hwɛ, ɔno na ɔtowee, na dɔmtutuw na ɔdze hɔn aba n’enyi do.
Na owu aba hɛn egyanom do; eso yenyim hɔn, yennkotum etwa ator, na hɔn nyinara mu dza odzii hɔn kan no mpo yenyim no, Adam mpo.
Na nkaa nwoma no yɛakyerɛw ma ɔwɔ hɛn nkyɛn, tse dɛ nhwɛdo a Nyankopɔn nam ne nsatseaba do dze mae no; na wɔdze mae wɔ hɛnankasa hɛn kasaa mu.
Na ber a Enoch kãa Nyankopɔn ne nsɛm no kyerɛe no, nkorɔfo no ho wosowee, na woenntum enngyina n’enyim.
Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Osiandɛ Adam hwee ase ntsi, na yɛwɔ ha yi; na ɔnam n’asehwe do na owu bae; na yenya kyɛfa wɔ awerɛhow na mbusu mu.
Hwɛ Satan aba adasamba mu, na ɔsɔ hɔn hwɛ ama wɔaasom no; na nyimpa abɛyɛ honandze, akɔndɔdze, na mbɔnsamdze, na woesiw hɔn kwan efi Nyankopɔn enyim.
Mbom Nyankopɔn ama hɛn egyanom ehu dɛ otwar dɛ nyimpa nyinara nu hɔnho.
Na ɔdze nankasa ne ndze frɛɛ hɛn egya Adam, see dɛ: Meyɛ Nyankopɔn; Mobɔɔ wiadze, nye nyimpa ansaana wɔreba honam mu.

Na ɔkãa so kyerɛɛ no dɛ: Sɛ ebɛdan aba mo hɔ, na etsie me ndze, na agye edzi, enu woho efi wo mbrato nyinara ho, na woenuma wo, wɔ nsu mpo mu, wɔ me Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no no ne dzin mu, nyia adom na nokwar ahyɛ no mã, Jesus Christ no, dzin kortsee a wɔdze bɛma wɔ ɔsor n’ase, no hɔ na nkwagye befi aba adasamba do, hom nsa bɛkã Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze no, hom bebisa ndzɛmba nyinara wɔ ne dzin mu, na biribiara a hom bebisa no, wɔdze bɛma hɔn.
Na hɛn egya Adam kasaa kyerɛɛ Ewuradze, na ɔsee dɛ: Ebɛnadze ntsi na ɔwɔ dɛ nyimpa nu hɔnho na wonuma hɔn wɔ nsu mu? Na Ewuradze see Adam dɛ: Hwɛ medze wo mbrato wɔ Eden Ture no mu akyɛ wo.
Dɛm ntsi na kasa yi tahyee wɔ nkorɔfo no mu dɛ, Nyankopɔn ne Ba no abɔ werdam dze ama ahyɛse mfom no, iyi ntsi wonnkotum dze awofo hɔn bɔn asoa hɔn mba, osiandɛ wodzi mu fi wiadze ne fapem.

Na Ewuradze kasae kyerɛɛ Adam, see dɛ: Susuampaara dɛ wonyinseen wo mba wɔ bɔn mu no, dɛmara so na sɛ wɔhyɛ ase dɛ worinyin a, bɔn nyin wɔ hɔn akoma mu, na wɔsɔ wenwen hwɛ, ama woeehu papa no bo a ɔsom.
Na wɔdze ama hɔn dɛ wonhu soronko a ɔda papa na bɔn ntamu. Dɛm ntsi wɔyɛ hɔnankasa hɔn do ahwɛfo, na maama hom mbra kor so na mbrasɛm.

Dɛm ntsi hom mfa nkyerɛkyerɛ hom mba, dɛ nyimpa nyinara a wɔwɔ beebiara, wɔ dɛ wonu hɔnho, annyɛ dɛm a wonnkotum enya Nyankopɔn ahenman no ayɛ hɔndze, osiandɛ adze biara a noho nntsew no nnkotum atsena hɔ, anaadɛ ɔatsena n’enyim, osiandɛ, dɛ mbrɛ Adam kãe no, Nyimpa Krɔnkrɔn nye ne dzin, na nyia Ɔwoo no Kortoo no no ne dzin nye Nyimpa Ba, Jesus Christ mpo, Ɔtsɛmbuafo tseneneenyi, nyia ɔbɛba mber nkyekyɛmu ntamu no.
Dɛm ntsi mema wo mbrasɛm, dɛ kyerɛkyerɛ wo mba ndzɛmba yinom a irinngya bi, se dɛ:

Ɔnam mbrato do na asehwe bae, dɛm asehwe no na ɔdze owu ba, na susuampaara dɛ wɔnam nsu do woo hom too wiadze yi mu no, nye bɔgya, nye sunsum a meyɛe, na ɔmaa huntuma bɛyɛɛ ɔkra tseasefo, dɛmara so na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔnam nsu, nye Sunsum mu wɔwo hom fofor to ɔsor ahenman no mu, na wɔnam bɔgya no do tsew homho, nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no no bɔgyaa no mpo, ama wɔaatsew homho efi bɔn nyinara ho, na hom enyi agye onnyiewiei nkwasɛm no ho wɔ wiadze yi mu, nna onnyiewiei nkwa wɔ wiadze a ɔreba no mu, bɛkyebo enyimnyam no mpo;
Na ɔnam nsu do hom dzi mbrasɛm no do; ɔnam Sunsum no do woebu hom bem, na ɔnam bɔgya no do wɔatsew homho;

Dɛm ntsi wɔdze ama dɛ ɔntsena hom mu; ɔsor ho dase no; Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no; bɛkyebo enyimnyam asomdwee ndzɛmba no; ndzɛmba nyinara no nokwar no; dza okenyan ndzɛmba nyinara no, dza ɔyɛ ma ndzɛmba nyinara nya nkwa; dza onyim ndzɛmba nyina, na ɔwɔ tum nyinara tse dɛ nyansa, ehumbɔbɔr, nokwardzi, pɛrpɛrdzi, na atsɛmbu.
Na afei, hwɛ, mese wo dɛ: Iyi nye nkwagye nhyehyɛɛ a ɔwɔ hɔ ma nyimpa nyinara, ɔnam mankasa nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no no bɔgyaa do, nyia ɔbɛba wɔ mber nkyekyɛmu ntamu no.

Na hwɛ, ndzɛmba nyinara wɔ hɔn saso, na wɔbɔɔ ndzɛmba nyinara na wɔyɛe ma wɔaagye moho dase, honam mu ndzɛmba, na sunsum mu ndzɛmba nyinara; ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ sorsor, nye ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ asaase mu, nye ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ asaase n’ase, sor na ase nyinara: ndzɛmba nyinara gye moho dase.

Na ɔbaa dɛ, ber a Ewuradze nye hɛn egya Adam kasae no, Adam sui frɛɛ Ewuradze, na Ewuradze no Sunsum hwiim no na ɔdze no kɔree kɛhyɛɛ nsu mu, na wɔdze no hyɛɛ nsu no ase, na wɔdze no fii nsu no mu puei.
Na dɛm na wonumaa no, na Nyankopɔn no Sunsum sianee baa no do, na dɛm na Sunsum no woo no, na wokenyaan no wɔ mu-nyimpa mu.
Na ɔtsee ndze fi sor, rese dɛ: Wɔdze ogya, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn enuma wo. Iyi nye Egya nye Ɔba hɔn dasee, fitsi aber yi na afebɔɔ;
Na ɔwo idzi onyia no a onnyi nda ahyɛse anaa mfe ewiei ne nhyehyɛɛ no do, fi mfesantsen nyina kesi mfesantsen nyina no.
Hwɛ, ɔwo ayɛ kor wɔ mo mu, Nyankopɔn ne ba, ɔnam dɛm ntsi hɔn nyinara botum aabɛyɛ me mba. Amen.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/7.title: Moses 7
chapter_summary: Enoch kyerɛkyerɛ, odzi nkorɔfo no hɔn kan, na otutu mbepɔw—Ɔkyekyer Zion kuropɔn no—Enoch dzi kan hu Nyimpa Ba no Ne mbae, No werdambɔ afɔrbɔ, nye Ahotseweefo hɔn wusoɛr—Odzi kan hu Nsanananmu Ber no, Mboaboano no, Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no, nye Zion a ɔbɛsan aba no.
subtitle: (Mumu 1830)

verses.text: Na ɔbaa dɛ Enoch sɔɔw ne kasaa no do, see dɛ: Hwɛ, hɛn egya Adam kyerɛkyerɛɛ ndzɛmba yinom, na dodowara agye edzi na wɔabɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ne mba, na dodowara anngye enndzi, na wɔahera wɔ hɔn bɔn mu, na wɔdze suro, rohwɛ kwan, wɔ ahohyehye mu, osian Nyankopɔn n’ebufuhyew a obohue egu hɔn do no ntsi.

Na ofi dɛm mber no dze kɔ no Enoch hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrehyɛ nkɔm, se nkorɔfo no, dɛ: Ber a murutu kwan no, na migyinaa Mahujah bea do no, na musui frɛɛ Ewuradze no, ndze fi sor bae, see dɛ—Dan woho, na kɔ bepɔw Simeon do.
Na ɔbaa dɛ medaan moho na mokɔr bepɔw no do; na ber a migyinaa bepɔw no do no, muhun dɛ sor ebue, na wɔdze enyimnyam efura me;
Na muhun Ewuradze; na ogyinaa m’enyim, na ɔkasae kyerɛɛ me, mpo tsedɛ nyimpa rekasa kyerɛ obi, enyim na enyim; na ɔsee me dɛ: Hwɛ, na medze wiadze bɛkyerɛ wo wɔ mber a ɔyɛ ebusuasantsen pii.
Na ɔbaa dɛ muhun wɔ Shum ne bɔnsa mu, na hwɛ, nyimpa dɔmtutuw a wɔtsetse asese mu, a wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Shum.
Na bio Ewuradze see me dɛ: Hwɛ; na mohwɛe dze kɔr etsifi afamu, na muhun nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Canaan, a wɔtsetse asese mu.

Na Ewuradze see me dɛ: Hyɛ nkɔm; na mehyɛɛ nkɔm, see dɛ: Hwɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Canaan, a wɔdɔɔ sõ, wɔbɔkɔ nye nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Shum akɔkõ, na woekuku hɔn na wɔasɛɛ hɔn korakora; na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Canaan bɛkyekyɛ hɔn mu wɔ asaase no do, na asaase no bɛyɛ kɛsɛɛ na hwee rimmfir do, na nyimpa biara nnkɛtsena hɔ gyedɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Canaan;
Na hwɛ, Ewuradze dze ndom a ɔyɛ ɔhyew kɛse bɛkã asaase no, na no do bɛyɛ kɛsɛɛ dze ekesi afebɔɔ; na nwoma tuntum bɛkataa Canaanmba do, na wobuu hɔn enyimtsia wɔ nyimpa nyina mu.

Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze see me dɛ: Hwɛ; na mohwɛe, na muhun Sharon asaase, nye Enoch asaase, na Omner asaase, nye Heni asaase, nye Shem asaase, nye Haner asaase, nye Hanannihah asaase, nye nyimpa nyinara a wɔtsetse do;
Na Ewuradze see me dɛ: Kɔ dɛm nkorɔfo yi hɔ, na se hɔn dɛ—Hom nnu homho, amma maammfa ndom ammbɔdom hɔn, ma woennwuwu.
Na ɔmaa me mbrasɛm dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ munnuma wɔ Egya no, na Ɔba no dzin mu, nyia adom na nokwar ahyɛ no mã no, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no, nyia ɔgye dase wɔ Egya no nye Ɔba no hɔnho no.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Enoch kɔr do dɛ ɔrefrɛ nkorɔfo no nyinara, gyedɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Canaan no nko, dɛ wonnu hɔnho;

Na dɛm ntsi Enoch ne gyedzi bɛyɛɛ kɛsenara ma odzii Nyankopɔn no nkorɔfo no hɔn enyim, na hɔn atamfo no baa dɛ wɔnye hɔn robɔkõ; na ɔkãa Ewuradze n’asɛm, na asaase wosowee, na mbepɔw tutui, dɛ ma ɔhyɛɛ no mpo; na esutsen no mu nsu danee fii hɔn kwan do; na wɔtsee nwendadze hɔn su fi sar no do; na aman nyinara suroo kɛsenara, tum kɛse wɔ Enoch n’asɛm no mu, tum kɛse wɔ kasa a Nyankopɔn dze maa no no mu.
Po no bun ase so asaase fii bae, Nyankopɔn no nkorɔfo no hɔn atamfo suroo kɛsenara, ntsi woguanee kegyinaa ekyirekyir na wɔkɔr asaase no a ofii po no bun ase bae no do.
Na ahoɔdzenfo a wɔwɔ asaase no do, so, kegyinaa ekyirekyir, na nkorɔfo nyinara a wɔkõe tsiaa Nyankopɔn no, ndom baa hɔn do;
Ofi dɛm aber no dze kɔ no akõkoekõ na bɔgyakã baa hɔn mu; mbom Ewuradze bae na ɔnye no nkorɔfo bɛtsenae, na wɔtsenaa ase wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu.
Ewuradze noho suro baa aman nyinara do, Ewuradze n’enyimnyam yɛɛ kɛse wɔ no nkorɔfo do. Na Ewuradze hyiraa asaase no, na wohyiraa hɔn wɔ mbepɔw no do, nye mbea a ɔkrɔn no do, na wɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm.
Na Ewuradze frɛɛ no nkorɔfo Zion, osiandɛ wonyaa akoma kor na adwen kor, na wɔtsenaa ase wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu; na ohianyi biara nnyi hɔn mu.
Na Enoch sɔɔw ne nsɛmpakã no do wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu dze kyerɛɛ Nyame no nkorɔfo no. Na ɔbaa dɛ ne nda mu no, ɔkyekyeer kuropɔn na wɔfrɛɛ no Krɔnkrɔnyɛ Kuropɔn, Zion mpo.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Enoch nye Ewuradze kasae; na ɔsee Ewuradze dɛ: Ampaara dɛ Zion bɛtsena hɔ dwodwoodwo afebɔɔ. Mbom Ewuradze see Enoch dɛ: Zion na mehyira, na mbom nkorɔfo a wɔaka no medze ndom akã hɔn.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze maa Enoch hun dɔm nyinara a wɔtsetse asaase no do no; na ɔhwɛe; na hwɛ, Zion, dɛm aber no mu ara na wɔfaa no kɔr sor. Na Ewuradze see Enoch dɛ: Hwɛ bea a metse afebɔɔ.
Na Enoch so hwɛɛ nkorɔfo a wɔaka a wɔyɛ Adam ne mbabanyin no; na wɔyɛ Adam n’asefo nyinara a wɔafora gyedɛ Cain n’asefo nko, osiandɛ Cain n’asefo no bir, na woennya kwan wɔ hɔn mu.
Na ɔno ekyir wɔfaa Zion kɔr sor, Enoch hwɛe, na hwɛ, aman nyinara a wɔwɔ asaase no do wɔ n’enyim;
Na ebusuasantsen kodu ebusuasantsen do bae; nna Enoch wɔ sor na wɔamaa no do, mpo wɔ Egya no, na Nyimpa Ba no bo mu; na hwɛ, Satan no tum akata asaase nyinara enyi.
Na ohun abɔfo a worisian fi sor; na ɔtsee ndze kɛse bi dɛ ɔrekã dɛ: Hom ndue, hom ndue hom a hom tsetse asaase no do.
Na ohun Satan; na nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn kɛse bi wɔ ne nsamu, na ɔdze sum kataa asaase nyinara enyi; na ɔhwɛɛ sor na ɔserewee, na n’abɔfoe dzii dɛw.
Na Enoch hun abɔfo a worisian fi sor, a wɔregye Egya na Ɔba no hɔnho dase; na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tɔɔ dodowara do, na sor tum no maa hɔn do kɔr Zion.
Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔsor Nyankopɔn no hwɛɛ nkorɔfo no a wɔaka no, na osui; na Enoch gyee ho dase see dɛ: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ɔsor su, na okyi nyinsuwa dɛ nsu rotɔ gu mbepɔw do yi?
Na Enoch see Ewuradze dɛ: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na itum su, ber a eyɛ krɔnkrɔn, na ifi mbersantsen kesi mbersantsen?

Ana obotum aba dɛ nyimpa botum akan asaase do huntuma, nyew, nsaase ɔpepe ɔpepe tse dɛ iyi, onnkotum ayɛ wɔabɔdze no dodow ahyɛse; na wo ntwamutam da ho tserɛw; na eso ewɔ hɔ, na wo bo mu wɔ hɔ; na idzi pɛrpɛr so; ɔwo eyɛ mbɔbɔrhufo na eyɛ ɔyamuyiefo afebɔɔ;

Na ɔwo afa Zion ato w’ankasa wo bo mu, efi w’abɔdze nyinara mu, ofi mbersantsen kesi mbersantsen; na ɔnnyɛ hwee mbom asomdwee, pɛrpɛrdzi, na nokwardzi nye w’ahengua tsebea; na ehumbɔbɔr bedzi w’enyim na ɔnnkɔbɔ adze; ɔyɛ dɛn na itum su?
Ewuradze see Enoch dɛ: Hwɛ w’enuanom yinom; wɔyɛ mankasa me nsaano edwindze, na medze hɔn nyimdzee maa hɔn, wɔ da a mobɔɔ hɔn no no mu; na Eden Ture no mu, na medze nyimpa ne pɛ maa no;
Na w’enuanom no mase hɔn, na mama hɔn mbrasɛm so, dɛ wɔndodɔ hɔnho nkorkor, na dɛ wɔnyɛ setsie mma emi, hɔn Egya; mbom hwɛ, wonnyi dɔ, na wokyir hɔnankasa hɔn bɔgyaa;
Na m’ebufuw ne gya adzɛw tsia hɔn; na m’ebufuhyew mu na mebɛma nsuyirii aba hɔn do, osiandɛ m’ebufuhyew adzɛw wɔ hɔn do.
Hwɛ, meyɛ Nyankopɔn; Krɔnkrɔn Nyimpa nye me dzin; Ɔpamfo Nyimpa nye me dzin; na Onnyi Ewiei na Onnyiewiei so nye me dzin.

Dɛm ntsi, mobotum atsen me nsa mu ma asõ abɔdze nyinara a mayɛ do; na m’enyiwa botum ehwira hɔn mu so, na me nsaano edwindze nyina mu no, emumuyɛdze kɛse a ɔtse dɛm nnsii da tse dɛ dza ɔwɔ w’enuanom mu yi.

Mbom hwɛ, hɔn bɔn bogu hɔn egyanom etsifi; Satan bɛyɛ hɔn egya, na awerɛhow bɛyɛ hɔn kyɛfa; na ɔsor bosu egu hɔn do, me nsaano edwindze nyinara mpo; dɛm ntsi ana onnyi dɛ ɔsor sũ, ber a ohu dɛ woyinom bohu amandze?
Mbom hwɛ woyinom a w’enyiwa hu hɔn yi bɛhera wɔ nsuyirii mu; na hwɛ, mobɔtow hɔn mu; mesiesie efiadze ama hɔn.

Na nyia masan mu eyi no no atotɔ aserɛ wɔ m’enyim. Dɛm ntsi, obohu amandze dze ama hɔn bɔn; susuampaara dɛ wobonu hɔnho wɔ dɛm da no a nyia Masan Mu Eyi no no bɛsan aba me nkyɛn, nye dɛm da no a wɔbɔkɔ ahohyehye mu no;
Dɛm ntsi, osian iyi ntsi na ɔsor bosu, nyew, nye me nsaano edwindze nyinara.

Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze kasaa kyerɛɛ Enoch, na ɔkãa ndzeyɛe nyinara a adasamba reyɛ no; dɛm ntsi Enoch nyim, na ɔhwɛɛ hɔn emumuyɛdze, nye hɔn awerɛhow, na osui na ɔtseen n’abasa mu, na n’akoma yeyeree yɛɛ tɛtɛɛtɛr tse dɛ mbersantsen; na n’abadaa nunuu no; na mbersantsen nyina wosowee.
Na Enoch hun Noah so, nye n’ebusua; dɛ Noah ne mbabanyin nyinara hɔn asefo benya honam mu nkwagye.
Dɛm ntsi Enoch hun dɛ Noah apam nsu-hɛn; na dɛ Ewuradze n’enyi agye ho, na ɔdze nankasa ne nsa esuo mu; na mbom emumuyɛfo no a wɔaka no nsuyirii bae bɛmeen hɔn.
Na ber a Enoch hun iyi, odzii awerɛhow kɛse, na osui wɔ n’enuanom no ntsi, na ɔsee ɔsor dɛ: Meremma kwan mma biribiara nnkyekye mo werɛ; mbom Ewuradze see Enoch dɛ: Ma w’akoma do, na dzi dɛw; na hwɛ.

Na ɔbaa dɛ Enoch hwɛe; na ofi Noah do no, ohun asaase do ebusua ebusua nyinara; na osui frɛɛ Ewuradze, see dɛ: Ebɛn da na Ewuradze bɛba? Dabɛn na wɔbɛkã Ɔtseneneenyi no no bɔgyaa egu, ama hɔn a wosu nyinara enya ahosan na woenya onnyiewiei nkwa?
Na Ewuradze see dɛ: Ɔbɛyɛ mber nkyekyɛmu ntamu, wɔ emumuyɛdze nye werdzi nda no mu.

Na hwɛ, Enoch hun da no a Nyimpa Ba no reba no, wɔ honam mu mpo; na ne kra enyi gyee, see dɛ: Wɔama Ɔtseneneenyi no do, na woekum Eguamba no fi wiadze ne fapem, na ɔnam gyedzi do mehyɛ Egya no no bo mu, na hwɛ, Zion nye me wɔ hɔ.

Na ɔbaa dɛ Enoch hwɛɛ asaase tɔw no nyina do; na ɔtsee ndze bi fi n’ayamudze mu rese dɛ: Mundue, mundue, adasa hɔn nã, miridzi yaw, mahaw, osian me mba hɔn emumuyɛdze ntsi. Dabɛn na mebɛgye m’ahom, na wɔbɛtsew moho efi efĩfĩdze a ofi mo mu epue yi ho? Dabɛn na mo Bɔadze bɛtsew moho, ma magye m’ahom, na ndzeyɛtsenenee bɛtsena m’enyi do mber kakra?
Na ber a Enoch tsee dɛ asaase rekã mmɔn no, osui, na osui frɛɛ Ewuradze, see dɛ: O Ewuradze, ana irinnya ehumbɔbɔr wɔ asaase do? Ana irinnhyira Noah ne mba?

Na ɔbaa dɛ Enoch sɔɔw no su do frɛɛ Ewuradze, see dɛ: Meserɛ wo, O Ewuradze, wɔ nyia Ewoo no Kortoo no no ne dzin mu, Jesus Christ mpo, dɛ ibohu Noah na n’asefo mbɔbɔr, dɛ nsuyirii nnkɛba abakata asaase do bio da.
Na Ewuradze enntum annhom do, na ɔnye Enoch dzii ahyɛmu, na ɔkãa ntam nye Enoch dzii nsew, dɛ ɔnnkɛma nsuyirii aba bio; ama woetum afrɛ Noah ne mba no;
Na ɔhyɛɛ ɔmom a wonnkotum adan no no mae, dɛ wobohu n’asefo mber nyina wɔ aman nyinara mu mber dodow a asaase yi bɛtsena hɔ no;

Na Ewuradze see dɛ: Nhyiranyi nye nyia n’asefo mu na Messiah no befi aba; osiandɛ ɔsee dɛ—Emi nye Messiah no, Zion ne Hen, Ɔsor Botan, dza ɔtra dɛ mbersantsen; nyia ɔfa abow no mu na odua mo do fow no nnkɔhwe ase da; dɛm ntsi, nhyira nye hɔn a makã hɔnho asɛm no, osiandɛ wɔdze daapem enyigye ndwom bɛba.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Enoch sui frɛɛ Ewuradze, see dɛ: Ber a Nyimpa Ba no bɛba wɔ honam mu no, ana asaase bɛgye n’ahom? Meserɛ wo, kyerɛ me dɛm ndzɛmba yinom.
Na Ewuradze see Enoch dɛ: Hwɛ, na ɔhwɛe na ohun Nyimpa Ba no dɛ wɔama no do wɔ mbeamudua do, dɛ mbrɛ adasa yɛ no;

Na ɔtsee ndze kɛse; na ɔsorsor n’enyim katae; na Nyankopɔn n’abɔdze nyinara sui; na asaase sii nkrum; na mbotan mu paapaae; na ahotseweefo no soɛrsoɛree, na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ahenkyɛw wɔ Nyimpa Ba no n’abanyimfa, wɔdze enyimnyam ahenkyɛw pii hyɛɛ hɔn.
Na esunsum pii a wogu efiadze no puei bae, na wobegyinaa Nyankopɔn n’abanyimfa; na hɔn a wɔaka no wɔdze hɔn ahyɛ sum nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu ekodu atsɛmbu da kɛse no.
Na bio Enoch sui na ɔfrɛɛ Ewuradze, see dɛ: Dabɛn na asaase bɛgye n’ahom?

Na Enoch hun Nyimpa Ba no dɛ ɔrofow kɔ Egya no ne nkyɛn; na ɔfrɛɛ Ewuradze, see dɛ: Ana ennkɛsan aba asaase do bio? Susuampaara dɛ eyɛ Nyame, na minyim wo, na akã ntam akyerɛ me, na ahyɛ me dɛ mimbisa wɔ nyia Ewoo no Kortoo no no ne dzin mu; ɔwo na ayɛ me, na ama me kwan wɔ w’ahengua no ho, na nnyɛ mankasa bi, mbom ɔnam w’ankasa w’adom do; dɛm ntsi, mibisa wo, dɛ eremmba asaase do bio.
Na Ewuradze see Enoch dɛ: Ber a metse ase yi, dɛmara so mpo na mebɛba wɔ nda a odzi ewiei no mu, wɔ emumuyɛdze nye werdzi nda no mu, dze ahyɛ nsew a medzi akyerɛ wo no mã, dza ɔfa Noah ne mba ho no.

Na da no bɛba ma asaase no aagye n’ahom, mbom ansaana dɛm da no bɛba no ɔsorsor bɛhyɛ sum, na nkataenyim kebii bɛkata asaase do; na sor bɔwosow, na asaase so; na amandzehu kɛse bɛba adasamba mu, mbom mo nkorɔfo no dze mobɔkora hɔn do;

Na tseneneeyɛ na mebɛma efi sor aba famu; nokwar na mebɛma efi asaase mu epue, ma wɔagye dase wɔ nyia me Woo no Kortoo no noho; no wusoɛr fi owu mu; nyew, nye adasa nyinara owusoɛr so; na tseneneeyɛ na nokwar na mebɛma woetwuw afa asaase no do tse dɛ nsuyirii, ma wɔaboaboa me mpamufo no ano efi asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyinara mu, dze hɔn aba bea a mibesiesie no, Kuropɔn Krɔnkrɔn, ama mo nkorɔfo aabɔ hɔn asen do, na wɔaahwɛ ber a medze bɛba no kwan; osiandɛ hɔ na me ntamadan no besi, na wɔbɛfrɛ no Zion, Jerusalem Fofor.
Na Ewuradze see Enoch dɛ: Ber no ɔwo na wo kuropɔn nyinara behyia hɔn hɔ, na yɛbɛgye hɔn ato hɛn bo mu, na wobohu hɛn; na yɛbɛbaar hɔn kɔn, na hɔn so bɛbaar hɛn kɔn, na yɛbɛfew hɛn ano nkorkor;
Na hɔ bɛyɛ me tsenabew, na ɔbɛyɛ Zion, dza obefi m’abɔdze nyinara a mayɛ mu aba no; na mfe apem ntamu no asaase no bɛgye n’ahom.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Enoch hun da no a Nyimpa Ba no dze bɛba wɔ nda a odzi ewiei no mu no, dze abɛtsena asaase no do wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu mfe apem ntamu no;

Mbom ansaana dɛm da no bɛba no, ohun abɛbrɛsɛ kɛse wɔ emumuyɛfo no hɔn mu; na ohun po so, dɛ ɔayɛ begyabegya, na adasa hɔn akoma etutu, dze suro rohwɛ Otumfo Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu no kwan, dza ɔbɛba emumuyɛfo do no.
Na Ewuradze dze ndzɛmba nyinara kyerɛɛ Enoch, dze kesi wiadze n’ewiei mpo; na ohun atseneneefo no hɔn da no, hɔn pon dɔn no, na onyaa enyigye ne mãhyɛ.
Na Zion ne nda nyinara wɔ Enoch ne nda mu no yɛ mfe ahaebiasa eduosia-enum.

Na Enoch na no nkorɔfo nyinara nye Nyame nantsewee, na ɔtsenaa Zion ne finimfin; na ɔbaa dɛ nna Zion nnyi hɔ, osiandɛ Nyankopɔn faa no kɔree dze no kɔtoo nankasa no bo mu; na ofi dɛm aber no na wɔkãa dɛ, Zion Eguan.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/8.title: Moses 8
chapter_summary: Methuselah hyɛ nkɔm—Noah na ne mbabanyin kã asɛmpa no—Emumuyɛdze kɛse petse—Woemmbu nnuho frɛ no hwee—Nyankopɔn hyɛ ɔmom dɛ Nsuyirii bɛsɛɛ honam nyinara.
subtitle: (Kwakwar 1831)

verses.text: Na Enoch ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaanan na eduasa.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Methuselah, Enoch ne babanyin no, wɔammfa no, ama Ewuradze n’ahyɛmudzi no aahyɛ mã, dza ɔyɛe maa Enoch no; osiandɛ ɔnye Enoch dzii ahyɛmu nokwar mu dɛ Noah bɛyɛ n’asen mu eduaba.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Methuselah hyɛɛ nkɔm dɛ asaase do ahendzi nyinara befi n’asen (edua Noah mu) mu, na ɔfaa enyimnyam no dze maa noho.
Na ɔkɔm kɛse bi baa asaase no do, na Ewuradze dze ndom yaayaw doom asaase no, na nkorɔfo a wɔtse hɔ no mu pii wuwui.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Methuselah dzii mfe ɔha na eduowɔtwe-esuon no, na ɔwoo Lamech;
Na Methuselah woo Lamech no, n’ekyir no odzii mfe ahaesuon na eduowɔtwe-ebien, na ɔwoo mbabanyin na mbabaa;
Na Methuselah ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaakron eduosia-akron, na owui.
Na Lamech dzii mfe ɔhaeduowɔtwe-ebien no, na ɔwoo babanyin,
Na ɔtoo no dzin Noah see dɛ: Babanyin yi na ɔbɛkyekye hɛn werɛ wɔ hɛn edwuma nye hɛn nsaano berɛ mu, osian asaase a Ewuradze dze ndom akã no ntsi.
Na Lamech woo Noah, n’ekyir no odzii mfe ahaenum eduokron-enum na ɔwoo mbabanyin na mbabaa;
Na Lamech ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaesuon eduosuon esuon, na owui.
Na Noah dzii mfe ahaanan na eduonum no, na ɔwoo Japheth; na mfe eduanan-ebien n’ekyir no ɔwoo Shem a ne nã nye Japheth, na ber a odzii mfe ahaenum no ɔwoo Ham.
Na Noah na ne mbabanyin no yɛɛ aso maa Ewuradze, na wotsiee no, na wɔfrɛɛ hɔn, Nyankopɔn ne mbabanyin.
Na ber a dɛm nyimpa yinom hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrodɔr wɔ asaase enyi do, na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn, nyimpa mbabanyin no hun dɛ dɛm mbabaa no hɔnho yɛ fɛw, na wɔwarwaar hɔn mu dza wɔpɛ.
Na Ewuradze see Noah dɛ: Wo mbabanyin hɔn mbabaa atɔn hɔnho; na hwɛ m’ebufuw adzɛw wɔ nyimpa mbabanyin do, osiandɛ wɔrennyɛ aso mma me ndze.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Noah hyɛɛ nkɔm, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ Nyame ne ndzɛmba no, mpo dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ ahyɛse no.
Na Ewuradze see Noah dɛ: Mo Sunsum nnkɛnye nyimpa edzi aper daa, osiandɛ obohu dɛ honam nyinara bowu; eso ne nda bɛyɛ mfe ɔha na eduonu; na sɛ adasa ennu hɔnho a, mebɛma nsuyirii abakata hɔn do.
Na dɛm nda no mu no nna ahoɔdzemfo pii wɔ asaase no do, na wɔpeer dɛ wobeyi Noah no nkwa efi hɔ; mbom Ewuradze kã Noah ho, na Ewuradze no tum wɔ no do.
Na Ewuradze hyɛɛ Noah sɔfo wɔ nankasa ne nhyehyɛɛ do, na ɔhyɛɛ no dɛ ɔnkɔ nkɔbɔ N’asɛmpa no dawur nkyerɛ adasamba, tse dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze maa Enoch no mpo.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Noah frɛɛ adasamba no dɛ wonnu hɔnho; mbom wɔannyɛ aso amma ne nsɛm.

Na ber a wotsee n’ekyir no so, wɔbaa n’enyim, bɛsee no dɛ: Hwɛ, yɛyɛ Nyame ne mbabanyin; ana yɛmmfefaa adasa hɔn mbabaa mmaa hɛnho? Ana yerinndzidzi na yɛronnom, na yɛronnwarwar na yɛremmfa mma awar? Na hɛn yernom rowowo mba ma hɛn, na hɔn nye akatakyi no, hɔn a wɔtse dɛ tsetsemba no, mbarimba a wɔayɛ atsenkã no. Na wɔannyɛ aso amma Noah ne nsɛm.
Na Nyankopɔn hun dɛ adasa hɔn emumuyɛdze abɛyɛ kɛse wɔ asaase yi do; na dza nyimpa biara dwendwen wɔ n’akoma mu no nna odzi ekyir, na ne nyinara yɛ bɔn ara nko daa.
Na ɔbaa dɛ Noah sɔɔw n’asɛmpa a ɔrekã kyerɛ nkorɔfo no do, see dɛ: Hom nyɛ aso na hom ntsie me nsɛm;

Hom ngye ndzi na hom nnu homho mfi hom bɔn ho na wonnuma hom wɔ Jesus Christ ne dzin mu, Nyame ne ba no dɛ hɛn egyanom mpo, na hom nsa bɛkã Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no, ma wɔada ndzɛmba nyinara edzi akyerɛ hom; na sɛ hom annyɛ iyi a, nsuyirii bɛba abɛkata hom do; naaso woenntsie.
Na Noah nuu noho, na n’akoma dzii yaw dɛ Ewuradze ayɛ nyimpa wɔ asaase do, na yaw kãa n’akoma.

Na Ewuradze see dɛ: Mebɛsɛɛ nyimpa a mabɔ no no efi asaase enyi, nyimpa nye mbowa, nye mbowa a wɔtsen, nye wimu ntumbowa; osiandɛ Noah nuu noho dɛ mabɔ hɔn, na dɛ mayɛ hɔn; na ɔafrɛ me; osiandɛ wɔperee hwehwɛɛ no nkwa.

Na dɛm na Noah nyaa enyimnyam wɔ Ewuradze n’enyim; osiandɛ Noah yɛ nyimpa a odzi pɛrpɛr, na odzi mu wɔ n’ebusuasantsen mu; na ɔnye Nyankopɔn nantsewee, dɛ mbrɛ ne mbabanyin baasa no so yɛe no, Shem, Ham, nye Japheth.
Na asaase no asɛɛ wɔ Nyankopɔn n’enyim, na basabasayɛ ahyɛ do mã.
Na Nyankopɔn hwɛɛ asaase no do, na hwɛ, asɛɛ, osiandɛ honam nyinara asɛɛ no kwan wɔ asaase no do.
Na Nyankopɔn see Noah dɛ: Honam nyinara n’ewiei edu m’enyim, osiandɛ basabasayɛ ahyɛ asaase no do mã, na hwɛ mebɛsɛɛ honam nyinara efi asaase no do.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/1.title: Abraham 1
chapter_summary: Abraham hwehwɛ nhyira a ɔfa patriarch nhyehyɛɛ ho—Asɔfo atorfo tseetsee no wɔ Chaldea—Jehovah gyee no nkwa—Ɔkã Egypt n’ahyɛse na amanbu ho nsɛm.
subtitle: Joseph Smith na Ɔkyerɛɛ ase fii Papyrus do

verses.text: Chaldeafo hɔn asaase do, wɔ m’egyanom hɔn fie, emi, Abraham, hun dɛ ohia dɛ minya bea bi kɛtsena hɔ;

Na, muhun dɛ enyigye kɛsenara na asomdwee na ahomgye wɔ hɔ ma me no, meperee hwehwɛɛ egyanom no hɔn nhyira, na me kyɛfa no a ɔwɔ dɛ wɔhyɛ me sɔfo ma meedzi no mu dwuma no; osiandɛ emi mankasa meyɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee ne kadofo a, mepɛ so dɛ minya nyimdzee kɛse, na meyɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee ne kãdofo mapã, na minya nyimdzee kɛsenara, na meyɛ aman pii hɔn egya, asomdwee hen, na mepɛɛ, dɛ, megye nkyerɛkyerɛ, na midzi Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do no, mebɛyɛɛ ɔdzedzifo a ɔfata, Ɔsɔfo Panyin a, mokura dza odzi wɔ egyanom no.

Wɔdze dza ofi egyanom hɔ no maa me; ofi egyanom no hɔ, fi mber ahyɛse, nyew, ofi ahyɛse no mpo, anaadɛ ansaana wɔrobɔtow asaase ne fapem, dze besi ndɛ mber yi, dza odzi wɔ abakan no ne kyɛfa no mpo, anaadɛ nyimpa a odzii kan no, a ɔyɛ Adam, anaa egya a odzii kan, duaa egyanom no do baa mo hɔ.
Mepeer dɛ me nsa bɛkã m’Asɔfodzi ɔfrɛ no dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn dze frɛɛ egyanom a ɔfa asefo ho no.
M’egyanom a, wɔadan efi hɔn ndzeyɛtsenenee ho nye mbrasɛm krɔnkrɔn no a Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn dze ama hɔn no ho, na wɔadan rosom abosonsɔrfo hɔn enyame no, wɔpoow koraa dɛ wɔbɛyɛ aso ama me ndze;
Osiandɛ nna woesi hɔn akoma pi dɛ wɔbɛyɛ bɔn, nna wɔadan hɔnho koraa dze ama Elkenah nyame, nye Libnah nyame, nye Mahmackrah nyame, nye Korash nyame, nye Pharaoh, Egypthen nyame;

Dɛm ntsi wɔdaan hɔn akoma dze maa abosonsɔrfo afɔrbɔ na wɔdze hɔn mba maa dɛ wɔmfa hɔn mbɔ afɔr mma dɛm ehonyi mmum yinom, na wɔannyɛ aso amma me ndze, mbom wɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ wobeyi me nkwa efi hɔ wɔ Elkenah no sɔfoe nsaano. Elkenah no sɔfoe no yɛ Pharaoh so no sɔfoe.

Afei, dɛm aber yi mu no nna ɔyɛ Pharaoh, Egypthen no no sɔfoe no n’amandze dɛ ɔdze mbanyin, mbaa, na mbofra bɔ afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia no a woesi wɔ Chaldea asaase do hɔ dze ama dɛm abosom ahɔho yinom no.
Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔsɔfo no bɔɔ afɔr maa Pharaoh nyame, nye Shagreel nyame, mpo dɛ mbrɛ Egyptfo no yɛ no. Afei Shagreel nyame no yɛ ewia.
Abofra ne ndaase-afɔr mpo na Pharaoh no sɔfoe no bɔ wɔ afɔrmbukyia no a osi koko a wɔfrɛ no Potiphar Koko no a ɔwɔ Olishem bea petee no no sor hɔ no do.

Afei, dɛm ɔsɔfo yi dze mbaabun baasa abɔ afɔr wɔ dɛm afɔrmbukyia yi do mber kor mu, dɛm mbaabun yi yɛ Onitah ne mbaabun, Ham n’asen mu adehye asefo mu kor. Wɔdze dɛm mbaabun yinom bɔɔ afɔr osian hɔn ɔbrapa ntsi; wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔbɔbɔ hɔn mu adze asom enyame a wɔyɛ dua anaa ɔbo, dɛm ntsi wokum hɔn wɔ afɔrmbukyia yi do, na wɔyɛɛ no dɛ mbrɛ Egyptfo yɛ no.

Na ɔbaa dɛ asɔfo no nam patapaa kwan do kyeer me dɛ worukoku mo so, dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze yɛɛ dɛm mbaabun no wɔ afɔrmbukyia yi do no; ama hom enya nyimdzee wɔ afɔrmbukyia yi ho no, morotwe hom adwen ekegyina ne saso wɔ abakɔsɛm yi ahyɛse no.
Wɔayɛ no dɛ mpadua, ɔtse dɛ dza Chaldeafo wɔ no pɛpɛɛpɛr, na osi Elkenah, Libnah, Mahmackrah, Korasah, enyame no enyim, nye nyame bi so a ɔtse dɛ Pharaoh, Egypthen nedze no.

Mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a hom benya ntseasee wɔ dɛm enyame yinom ho no, maakã mbrɛ hɔn su tse ho asɛm akyerɛ hom wɔ mfonyin mu wɔ ahyɛse hɔ, dɛm mfonyin no no su na Chaldeafo no frɛ no Rahleenos, dza ogyina hɔ ma mfonyin akyerɛw no.

Na ber a wɔmaa hɔn nsa do wɔ mo do no, dɛ wɔdze bosuo mo mu na woeyi mo nkwa efi hɔ no, hwɛ, metseaa mu frɛɛ Ewuradze me Nyankopɔn, na Ewuradze tsiei, na ɔtsee, na ɔmaa minyaa enyido-adzehu hun Otumfo no, na n’enyim ɔbɔfo no begyinaa me nkyɛn, na ntsɛmara osansaan me nkyehoma no;

Na ne ndze baa mo hɔ: Abraham, Abraham, hwɛ, me dzin nye Jehovah, na meetsie wo, na maaba famu dɛ merebɛgye wo, na mafa wo efi w’egya fi, na meyi wo efi w’ebusuafo mu, dze wo akɔ asaase ananabea a innyim do do.

Na iyi ho ntsi wɔadan hɔn akoma efi moho, ma aakɔsom Elkenah nyame, nye Libnah nyame, nye Mahmackrah nyame, nye Korash nyame, nye Pharaoh, Egypthen nyame; dɛm ntsi mesian famu dɛ merebɛsera hɔn na masɛɛ nyia ɔama ne nsa do dze ritsia wo, Abraham, me babanyin, dɛ obeyi wo nkwa efi hɔ no.
Hwɛ, medze me nsa bedzi w’enyim kan, na mafa wo, na medze me dzin ato wo do, w’egya n’Asɔfodzi no mpo, na mo tum bɛkata wo do.
Dɛ mbrɛ meyɛɛ maa Noah no dɛmara so na mebɛyɛ ama wo; mbom wɔnam wo somdwuma ne nyɛe mu no wɔbɛtse me dzin nkã wɔ asaase do afebɔɔ, osiandɛ meyɛ wo Nyame.

Hwɛ, Potiphar no koko no nna ɔwɔ Ur asaase do, wɔ Chaldea. Na Ewuradze bubuu Elkenah n’afɔrmbukyia no nye abosom a wɔwɔ asaase no do no guu famu, na ɔsɛɛ hɔn korakora, na ɔbɔɔ ɔsɔfo no ma owui; na wosuu kɛsenara wɔ Chaldea, nye Pharaoh so ne fi; Pharaoh n’asekyerɛ nye ɔhen a ofi adehye bɔgya ebusua mu.
Afei Egypthen yi yɛ Ham n’asen mu asenyi, na ɔnam n’awoo do yɛ Canaanfo bɔgya mu fafafo.
Ofi asefo yi mu na Egyptfo nyinara fi bae, na ɔnam dɛm kwan yi do na Canaanfo bɔgya kaa asaase no do.
Egypt asaase a wodzii kan hunii no nam ɔbaa do, nyia ɔyɛ Ham ne babaa, nye Egyptus ne babaa, dza Chaldea kasa mu no n’asekyerɛ nye Egypt, dza n’asekyerɛ nye adze a wɔabra;
Ber a ɔbaa yi hun asaase no nna ɔhyɛ nsu ase, ɔno na n’ekyir no ɔmaa ne mbabanyin kɛtsenaa mu; na dɛm ntsi ofi Ham do, dɛm ebusuakuw no a wɔmaa ndom no kaa asaase no do.
Afei Egypt aban a odzii kan no Pharaoh na ɔkyekyeree, Egytus n’abakan babanyin, Ham ne babaa, na ɔnam Ham n’aban kwan do, na patriarch adzedzi do.

Pharaoh ɔyɛ nyimpa tsenenee ntsi, ɔkyekyeer n’ahendzi na obuu no nkorɔfo atsɛn wɔ nyansa na pɛrpɛrdzi mu no nkwa nda nyina mu, na ɔpeer enyiberdo dɛ ɔbɛfa dɛm kwan a egyanom faa do dze buu ɔman wɔ ebusuasantsen a odzii kan no mu no, wɔ patriarch adzedzi do a wodzii kan dzii adze no no nkwa nda mu, wɔ Adam n’adzedziber mu, nye Noah so a, ɔyɛ n’egya, ɔno na ɔdze asaase do nhyira, nye nyansa nhyira hyiraa no, na mbom ɔdze ndoom doom no wɔ Asɔfodzi ho.
Afei, Pharaoh a ofi dɛm asefo no mu no enntum ennya Asɔfodzi mu kyɛfa no, eso Pharaohfo no peer dɛ wodua Ham do gye fi Noah hɔ, dɛm ntsi wɔdze hɔn abosonsom twee m’egya.
Mbom mobɔbɔ mbɔdzen, ekyir yi, makyerɛkyerɛ mber no mu esiado esiado fi mankasa mo do dze kɔ ekyir kesi abɔdze ahyɛse, osiandɛ nkyerɛwee no ebedzi me nsamu, a ɔwɔ mo hɔ dze besi dɛm mber yi mu.
Afei, ekyir no a wɔbɔɔ Elkenah no sɔfoe ma owui no, dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a wɔkãa kyerɛɛ me a ɔfa Chaldea asaase ho dɛ ɔkɔm bɛba asaase no do no baa mu pɛpɛɛpɛr.
Dɛ mbrɛ wɔase no, ɔkɔm baa Chaldea asaase nyinara do, na m’egya tseetsee ara yie osian ɔkɔm no ntsi, na onuu noho wɔ bɔn a osusui tsiaa me dɛ obeyi mo nkwa efi hɔ no ho.

Mbom egyanom hɔnho nkyerɛwee no, dza ɔfa patriarchfo mpo ho no a ɔfa Asɔfodzi kyɛfa ho no, Ewuradze me Nyankopɔn no dze esie yie wɔ mankasa me nsamu; dɛm ntsi nyimdzee a ɔfa abɔdze n’ahyɛse, nye sor abɔdze so, nye nworaba, dɛ mbrɛ woyii kyerɛɛ egyanom no, medze esie dze ebodu ndɛ da yi, na mobɔbɔ mbɔdzen makyerɛw dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a ɔwɔ nkyerɛwee no mu no bi, ama wɔaayɛ mfaso dze ama m’asefo a wɔbɛba m’ekyir no.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/2.title: Abraham 2
chapter_summary: Abraham fi Ur dɛ ɔrokɔ Canaan—Jehovah yi noho kyerɛ no wɔ Haran—Asɛmpa no mu nhyira nyinara no wɔdze bɔɔ n’asefo anohoba na ɔnam n’asefo do dze ama obiara—Ɔkɔ Canaan na ɔtoa do kɔ Egypt.

verses.text: Afei Ewuradze Nyankopɔn maa ɔkɔm no ano yɛɛ dzen wɔ Ur asaase do araa ma Haran, mo nuabanyin wui; mbom Terah, m’egya, daa ho tsenaa Chaldeefo hɔn Ur asaase no do.
Na ɔbaa dɛ emi, Abraham, waar Sarai, na Nahor, mo nuabanyin, waar Milcah, nyia ɔyɛ Haran ne babaa no.
Afei Ewuradze see me dɛ: Abraham, fi wo man mu, na fi w’ebusua mu, na fi w’egya fie, kɔ asaase a mebɛkyerɛ wo no do.

Dɛm ntsi mifii Ur asaase no a ɔyɛ Chaldeefo dze no do, dɛ morokɔ Canaan asaase do; na mefaa Lot, mo nuabanyin ne babanyin, nye ne yer, nye me yer Sarai; na m’egya so dzii m’ekyir, kɔr asaase no a yɛtoo ne dzin Haran no do.
Na ɔkɔm no n’ano bɔɔ adze kakra; na m’egya kaa Haran na ɔtsenaa hɔ, osiandɛ nyɛmbowa pii wɔ Haran; na m’egya daan noho bio kɔr n’abosonsom mu, dɛm ntsi ɔkɔr do tsenaa Haran.

Mbom emi, Abraham, nye Lot, mo nuabanyin ne babanyin no, bɔɔ mpaa maa Ewuradze, na Ewuradze yii noho kyerɛɛ me, na ɔsee me dɛ: Soɛr na fa Lot kã wo ho; na mowɔ siantsir a miriyi wo efi Haran, na mebɛyɛ wo sɔfo ma asoa me dzin dze aakɔ ananabea a medze bɛma w’asefo a wobedzi w’ekyir no, dɛ daapem enyadze, sɛ wɔyɛ aso ma me ndze a.

Na Emi nye Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn; Metse sor; na asaase yɛ m’ananadzegua; Metsen me nsa wɔ po do a, otsie me ndze, mema mframa na ogya bɛyɛ me tseaseanam; Mese mbepɔw dɛ—Tutu fi ha—na hwɛ, ekyinehyia-mframa whim hɔn kɔ, ntsɛmara, awerɛfir mu.
Me dzin dze Jehovah, na minyim ewiei fi ahyɛse; dɛm ntsi me nsa bɛkata wo do.

Na mebɛyɛ wo ɔman kɛse, na mibehyira wo mbordo, na mama wo dzin ayɛ kɛse wɔ aman nyinara mu, na ebɛyɛ nhyira dze ama w’asefo a wobedzi w’ekyir no, ama hɔn nsamu no woesuo ɔsomdwuma yi nye Asɔfodzi no mu dze akɔ aman nyinara;
Na mobodua wo dzin do ehyira hɔn; na dodow biara a wɔbɛgye Asɛmpa yi no wɔdze wo dzin bɛfrɛ hɔn, na wɔbɛyɛ hɔn w’asefo, na wɔbɔsoɛr egyina na woehyira wo, dɛ hɔn egya.

Na mibehyira hɔn a wohyira wo, na medze ndom akã hɔn a wɔdom wo no; na wo mu (ɔno nye dɛ, wɔ w’Asɔfodzi mu) na w’asefo mu (ɔno nye dɛ, w’Asɔfodzi), na mobɔ wo anohoba dɛ dɛm ndzinoa yi bɔkɔ do wɔ wo mu, nye w’asefo a wobedzi w’ekyir (ɔno nye dɛ, w’asefo ankasa, anaadɛ wo nyimpadua mu asefo) mu na asaase do ebusua ebusua nyinara wobehyira hɔn, wɔdze Asɛmpa no ne nhyira mpo, dza ɔyɛ nkwagye ne nhyira no, onnyiewiei nkwa mpo.
Afei, ekyir no Ewuradze gyaa dɛ ɔrekasa kyerɛ me no, na oyii n’enyi fii mo do, mekãa wɔ m’akoma mu dɛ: W’akowaa maper ahwehwɛ wo enyiber do; afei mehu wo;
Ɔwo esomaa wo bɔfoe dɛ ɔmbɛgye me mfi Elkenah enyame nsamu, obeye ama me dɛ mebɛyɛ aso ama wo ndze, dɛm ntsi ma w’akowaa nsoɛr nkɔ asomdwee mu.
Dɛm ntsi emi, Abraham, mokɔree dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze ase me no, na Lot kã moho; na emi, Abraham, nna meedzi mfe eduosia na ebien ber a mifii Haran no.

Na mefaa Sarai, nyia mowaar no wɔ ber a nna mowɔ Ur a ɔwɔ Chaldea no, nye Lot, mo nuabanyin ne babanyin, nye hɛn ahodze nyinara a yɛaboa ano, nye akra a yenyaa wɔ Haran, na yesii mu dɛ yɛrokɔ Canaan asaase do, na yɛtsenaa asese mu wɔ hɛn akwantu mu;
Dɛm ntsi, mbersantsen yɛɛ hɛn akatado, na hɛn botan na hɛn nkwagye, ber a yetuu kwan fii Haran faa Jershon kwan do dɛ yɛrokɔ Canaan asaase do no.
Afei emi, Abraham, sii afɔrmbukyia wɔ Jershon asaase do, na mobɔɔ afɔr maa Ewuradze, na mobɔɔ mpaa ama ɔkɔm no adan efi m’egya fie, amma wɔannhera.

Na nkyii yetwaa mu wɔ Jershon asaase no do kɔr Sechem bea do; ɔwɔ Moreh asaase petee no do, nna yedu Canaanfo asaase no n’ahe do dada, na mobɔɔ afɔr wɔ Moreh asaase petee no do hɔ, na medze m’ahom nyinara frɛɛ Ewuradze, osiandɛ nna yɛaba abosonsom man yi do dada.
Na Ewuradze yii noho kyerɛɛ me wɔ me mpaabɔ ho mbuae ntsi, na ɔsee me dɛ: W’asefo na medze asaase yi bɛma hɔn.

Na emi, Abraham, mosoɛree fii afɔrmbukyia no a mesi ama Ewuradze no ho, na mifii hɔ kɔr bepɔw bi a ɔwɔ Bethel no boka, na mobɔɔ m’asese wɔ hɔ, Bethel wɔ anee, na Hai wɔ boka; na hɔ na misii afɔrmbukyia kor so maa Ewuradze, na mobɔɔ Ewuradze ne dzin bio frɛɛ no.

Na emi, Abraham, tuu kwan, sɔɔw do kɔr anaafo; nna ɔkɔm da ho wɔ asaase no do; na emi, Abraham, sii m’adwen pi dɛ mobɔkɔ Egpt, dɛ mobɔkɔ akɛtsena hɔ ahɔhotsena, osiandɛ nna ɔkɔm no ano ayɛ dzen dodow.
Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a aka kakra ma mahɛn Egypt no, Ewuradze see me dɛ: Hwɛ, Sarai, wo yer, yɛ ɔbaa a noho yɛ fɛw;
Dɛm ntsi ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ Egyptfo no hu no a, wɔbɛse dɛ—ɔyɛ ne yer; na woboku wo, mbom wɔbɛgye ɔno nkwa; dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ nyɛ iyi:
Ma ɔnkã nkyerɛ Egyptfo no dɛ, ɔyɛ w’akyerɛbaa, na wo kra bɛtsena ase.

Na ɔbaa dɛ emi, Abraham, kãa kyerɛɛ Sarai, me yer no, dza Ewuradze akã akyerɛ me no nyinara—Dɛm ntsi kã kyerɛ hɔn, meserɛ wo, dɛ m’akyerɛbaa nye wo, ama eesi me yie wɔ ɔwo ntsi, na me kra bɛtsena ase osian ɔwo ntsi.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/3.title: Abraham 3
chapter_summary: Abraham nam Urim na Thummim do sũa ewia, bosoom, na nworaba ho nsɛm—Ewuradze da esunsum hɔn onnyiewiei su edzi kyerɛ no—Osũa ndzɛmba a ɔfa ansaana nyimpa rebɛba asaase do ho nsɛm, nyimpa ne dwuma soronko a ɔbɛba ebedzi wɔ asaase do ansaana wɔbɔwo no, Abɔdze, Ɔpomfo ne nsanmu nyii no, na nyimpa asetsena a otsĩa ebien no.

verses.text: Na emi, Abraham, nyaa Urim na Thummim no, dza Ewuradze me Nyankopɔn dze maa me wɔ Chaldeefo hɔn Ur hɔ;
Na muhun nworaba, na wɔsõsõ yie, na hɔn mu kor bɛn Nyankopɔn n’ahengua no papaapa; na pii so wɔ hɔ a wɔsõsõe a wɔbɛn no;

Na Ewuradze see me dɛ: Woyinom na wɔhwɛ ndzɛmba do; na dza ɔsõ no ne dzin dze Kolob, osiandɛ ɔbɛn me, na Emi nye Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn no: Medze iyi esi hɔ dɛ ɔnhwɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ dɛm nhyehyɛɛ kor noara mu no do tse dɛ mbrɛ igyina do yi.

Na Ewuradze see me dɛ, ɔnam Urim na Thummim no do, na Kolob bedzii Ewuradze ne nhyehyɛɛ ekyir, dɛ mbrɛ ne mber na hyɛber no tse wɔ no ho nkyinii ho, dɛ no ho nkyinii kor yɛɛ da kor maa Ewuradze tse dɛ mbrɛ ne nkanee ho nhyehyɛɛ tse, na ɔyɛ mfe apem dɛ mber wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ ama bea a igyina do yi. Iyi nye Ewuradze ne mber a ɔfa do kan, tse dɛ Kolob ne nkanee.

Na Ewuradze see me dɛ: Sor abɔdze a ɔyɛ kandzea kakraba no, ne kan no suar kyɛn dza ɔhwɛ adzekyee do no, dza ɔhwɛ adzesaa do no sõ mpo kyɛn anaa ɔyɛ kɛse sen dza igyina do no ne mber nkanee, osiandɛ okyin noho nyaa dodow; ɔtse dɛm osiandɛ ogyina asaase a igyina do yi no sor, dɛm ntsi ne mber nkanee no nndɔɔ sõ dɛ ne nda, na n’abosoom, na ne mfe.

Na Ewuradze see me dɛ: Afei, Abraham, dɛm nokwar ebien yi wɔ hɔ, hwɛ w’enyiwa ehu; wɔdze ama wo ama eehu mber ne nkanee, na mber a wɔahyehyɛ ama no, nyew, asaase a igyina do yi ne mber a wɔahyehyɛ ama no, nye kan kɛse a wɔama ɔhwɛ adzekyee do no ne mber a wɔahyehyɛ, nye kan kakraba no a wɔama ɔhwɛ adzesaa do no ne mber a wɔahyehyɛ.
Afei mber a wɔahyehyɛ ama kan kakraba no yɛ mber tsentsen wɔ ne nkanee mu kyɛn asaase a igyina do yi ne mber nkanee.
Na ber a dɛm nokwar ebien yinom wɔ hɔ no, nokwar bi so bɔwɔ hɔn sor, ɔnye dɛ, sor abɔdze bi so wɔ hɔ a ne mber nkanee no bɛda ho ayɛ tsentsen;

Na dɛm na mber nkanee wɔ sor abɔdze kor so a ɔbɔ do bɛyɛ, kɛpem dɛ ibodu Kolob, dɛm Kolob yi tse dɛ Ewuradze ne mber nkanee; dɛm Kolob yi wɔ bea ɔbɛn Nyankopɔn n’ahengua, ama wɔaahwɛ dɛm sor abɔdze yinom a wɔkã dɛm nhyehyɛe kor noara ho no do tse dɛ dza igyina do yi.
Na wɔdze ama wo dɛ hu mber a wɔdze ama nworaba nyinara a wɔwɔ hɔ dɛ wɔmma kan no hɔn mber a wɔahyehyɛ no mu, kodu dɛ ebɛbɛn Nyankopɔn n’ahengua no ho.
Dɛm na emi, Abraham, nye Ewuradze kasae, enyim na enyim, dɛ nyimpa rekasa kyerɛ ne nyɛnko; na ɔkãa ndwuma a ɔdze ne nsa ayɛ kyerɛɛ me;

Na ɔsee me dɛ: Me babanyin, me babanyin (na ɔtseen ne nsamu), hwɛ mebɛkyerɛ wo ndzɛmba yinom nyinara. Na ɔdze ne nsa too m’enyiwa do, na muhun dɛm ndzɛmba no a ɔdze ne nsa ayɛ no na ɔdɔɔ sõ; na wɔyɛɛ mbɔho mbɔho wɔ m’enyiwa do, na menntum ennhu n’ewiei.

Na ɔsee me dɛ: Iyi nye Shinehah a ɔyɛ ewia no. Na ɔsee me dɛ: Kolob, ɔno nye nworaba. Na ɔsee me dɛ: Olea, ɔno nye bosoom. Na ɔsee me dɛ: Kokaubeam, ɔno kyerɛ nworaba pii, anaadɛ kan akɛse nyinara, dza wɔwɔ wimu wɔ sor.

Na ɔyɛ adzesaaber mu, ber a Ewuradze kãa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ me: Mebɛma adɔr mbordo, na w’asefo a wodzi w’ekyir no bɛyɛ dɛ iyinom; na dɛ innkotum akan anhwea no dodow a, dɛmara so na w’asefo hɔn dodow bɛyɛ.
Na Ewuradze see me dɛ: Abraham, medze ndzɛmba yinom rekyerɛ wo ansaana hom akɔ Egypt, ama hom aabɔ nsɛm yinom nyina ho dawur.
Sɛ ndzɛmba ebien yi wɔ hɔ, na sɛ kor bɔ kor no do a, nna ndzɛmba akɛse bɔwɔ hɔ a ɔbɔ hɔn do; dɛm ntsi Kolob sõ koraa kyɛn Kokaubeam a ehu nyinara, osiandɛ ɔbɛn me.

Nkyii, sɛ ndzɛmba ebien wɔ hɔ, kor bɔ kor no do, na bosoom bɔ asaase do a, nna ɔbɛyɛ dɛ sor abɔdze anaadɛ nworaba bɔwɔ hɔ a ɔbɔ no do, na biribiara nnyi hɔ a sɛ Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn dze ahyɛ n’akoma mu dɛ ɔbɛyɛ no, gyedɛ ɔyɛ.

Dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse no, ɔyɛɛ nworaba kɛse no; eso, dɛmara, sɛ esunsum ebien wɔ hɔ, kor wɔ nyansa mbordo kyɛn kor no, naaso dɛm esunsum ebien yinom, ɔwɔ mu dɛ kor wɔ nyansa mbordo kyɛn kor, wonnyi ahyɛse; wɔwɔ hɔ dada, wonnyi ewiei, na wɔbɛtsena hɔ daa, osiandɛ wɔyɛ gnolaum, anaadɛ onnyiewiei.

Na Ewuradze see me dɛ: Nokwar ebien yinom wɔ hɔ, dɛ wɔyɛ esunsum ebien, kor wɔ nyansa mbordo kyɛn kor; na kor so wɔ hɔ a ɔwɔ nyansa kyɛn hɔn; Emi nye Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn, Mowɔ nyansa mbordo kyɛn hɔn nyinara.
Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn somaa no bɔfoe dɛ ɔmbɛgye wo mfi Elkenah no sɔfoe no nsamu.
