Metse hɔn nyinara hɔn finimfin; dɛm ntsi, seseira maba famu ha wɔ wo nkyɛn dɛ merebɛda ndwuma a medze me nsa ayɛ edzi akyerɛ wo, iyi mu na me nyansaa bɔ hɔn nyinara hɔn dze do, osiandɛ midzi hen wɔ ɔsorsor, nye asaase a ɔwɔ ase do, wɔ nyansa na nyimdzee mu, wɔ sunsum mu enyansafo nyinara a edze w’enyiwa ehu fi ahyɛse no; mebaa famu wɔ ahyɛse no wɔ sunsum mu enyansafo nyinara a edze w’enyiwa ehu mu.
Nkyii Ewuradze dze sunsum mu enyansafo nyinara a wɔhyehyɛɛ hɔn ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze no akyerɛ emi, Abraham; na iyinom nyinara hɔn mu no ekunyin na akɛse pii wɔ mu;

Na Nyankopɔn hun dɛ akra yinom no woye, na ɔsoɛree gyinaa hɔn finimfin, na ɔsee dɛ: Iyinom na mebɛyɛ hɔn m’ahemfo; na ogyinaa hɔn a wɔyɛ esunsum no hɔn mu, na ohun dɛ woye; na ɔsee me dɛ: Abraham, eyɛ hɔn mu kor; wɔsaan mu yii wo ansaana wɔrobɔwo wo.
Nna kor bi gyinaa hɔn mu a ɔtse dɛ Nyankopɔn, na ɔsee hɔn a wɔkã noho no dɛ: Yɛbɔkɔ famu, osiandɛ bea wɔ hɔ, na yɛbɛfa ndzɛmba yinom, na yɛdze ayɛ asaase ama iyinom aatsena do;
Na yɛbɔsɔ hɔn ahwɛ, dɛ sɛ wɔbɛyɛ ndzɛmba nyinara a Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn bɛhyɛ hɔn ho mbra no;

Na hɔn a wosie hɔn asetsena a odzi kan no wɔdze enyimnyam bi bɛkã hɔn ho, na hɔn a wonnsie hɔn asetsena a odzi kan no nnkenya enyimnyam wɔ dɛm ahenman kor noara mu dɛ hɔn a wosie hɔn asetsena a odzi kan no; na hɔn a wosie hɔn asetsena a otsĩa ebien no wɔdze enyimnyam bogu hɔn etsir do afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.

Na Ewuradze see dɛ: Woana na mobɔsoma no? Na kor bi a ɔtse dɛ Nyimpa Ba no yii ano dɛ: Emi nye yi, soma me. Na kor so yii ano na ɔsee dɛ: Emi nye yi soma me. Na Ewuradze see dɛ: Mobɔsoma dza odzi kan no.
Na nyia otsĩa ebien no no bo fuwii, na oennsie ne asetsena a odzi kan no; na, dɛm da no, dodowara kãa no do.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/4.title: Abraham 4
chapter_summary: Enyame no hyehyɛ asaase no mbɔe nye ndzɛmba a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu a wɔwɔ do nyinara—Hɔn nhyehyɛɛ wɔ nda esia a wɔdze bɔbɔ wiadze no wɔdze to gua.

verses.text: Na nkyii Ewuradze see dɛ: Wɔmma yɛnkɔ famu. Na wɔkɔr famu ahyɛse no, na hɔn, Enyame no, hyehyɛɛ na wɔyɛɛ ɔsorsor na asaase.
Na asaase, ber a wowiee yɛ no, nna ɔda hɔ pan na hwee nnyi do, osiandɛ nna wɔnnyɛɛ biribiara kã asaase no ho; na sum agye bun enyi, na Enyame no hɔn Sunsum butuuw esu no enyi.
Na (Enyame no) see dɛ: Ekan mbra; na ekan bae.
Na (Enyame no) hun ekan no, na ɔhyerɛn; na wɔkyekyɛɛ kan no mu, anaadɛ wɔmaa ekan no tseew noho fii sum noho.

Na Enyame no frɛɛ kan no Adzekyee, na sum no wɔfrɛɛ no Adzesaa. Na ɔbaa dɛ ofi ewimbir dze kesi anapa no wɔfrɛɛ no adzesaa; na ofi anapa dze kesi ewimbir no wɔfrɛɛ no adzekyee; na iyi nye dza odzi kan, anaadɛ ahyɛse, dza wɔfrɛɛ no adzekyee na adzesaa.
Na Enyame no kãa so dɛ: Wɔmma wimu mbra esu no finimfin na ɔbɛtsew esu no efi esu no ho.
Na Enyame no hyɛɛ wimu mbra, dɛ esu a ɔwɔ wimu no n’ase no ntsew no ho mfi esu a ɔwɔ wimu no no sor no ho; na ɔyɛɛ dɛm so dɛ mbrɛ wɔhyɛɛ hɔn no.

Na Enyame no frɛɛ wimu no, Ɔsor. Na ɔbaa dɛ ofi ewimbir dze kesi anapa no wɔfrɛɛ no adzesaa; na ɔbaa dɛ ofi anapa dze kesi ewimbir no wɔfrɛɛ no adzekyee; na iyi nye mber a otsĩa ebien a wɔfrɛɛ no adzesaa na adzekyee.
Na Enyame no hyɛɛ hɔn see dɛ: Wɔmma esu a ɔwɔ sor n’ase no ɔmpra nkɔboa fakor na wɔmma wewewdo nyi no ho; na ɔyɛɛ dɛm so dɛ mbrɛ wɔhyɛɛ hɔn no;
Na Enyame no frɛɛ wewewdo no, Asaase; na esu no no mboano no wɔfrɛɛ no Esu Kɛse; na Enyame no hun dɛ woedzi do.

Na Enyame no see dɛ: Wɔmma yensiesie asaase no ma omfifir efuw; nhaban a ɔsow aba; na dua a ɔsow eduaba dɛ mbrɛ no su tse, dza n’aba wɔ no mu a ɔsow dɛ mbrɛ nankasa no su tse wɔ asaase no do; na ɔyɛɛ dɛm so, tse dɛ mbrɛ wɔhyɛɛ ho mbra no.

Na Enyame no hyehyɛɛ asaase no dɛ omfifir efuw mfi nankasa n’aba mu, na haban nsow haban mfi nankasa n’aba mu, ɔnsow aba dɛ mbrɛ no su tse; na asaase mfir dua mfi nankasa n’aba mu, ɔnsow eduaba a, n’aba botum asow nankasa ne saso, dɛ mbrɛ no su tse; na Enyame no hun dɛ woedzi do.
Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔkaan nda no; ofi ewimbir kesi anapa no wɔfrɛɛ no adzesaa; na ɔbaa dɛ, ofi anapa kesi ewimbir no wɔfrɛɛ no adzekyee; na ɔyɛɛ mpɛn ebiasa.
Na Enyame no hyehyɛɛ kandzea a ɔwɔ ɔsor wimu no dɛ onyi adzekyee mfi adzesaa ho; na wɔhyehyɛɛ dɛ wɔnyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye hyɛber, nye nda na mfe;
Na wɔhyehyɛɛ hɔn ma wɔayɛ kandzea wɔ ɔsor wimu no mu ma wɔahyerɛn asaase do; na ɔyɛɛ dɛm.
Na Enyame no hyehyɛɛ nkandzea akɛse ebien no, kan kɛse no dɛ ɔnhwɛ adzekyee do, na kan kakraba no dɛ ɔnhwɛ adzesaa do; na wɔdze nworaba so kãa kan kakraba no so ho.
Na Enyame no dze hɔn sisii ɔsor wimu no mu dɛ wɔnhyerɛn asaase no do, na wɔnhwɛ adzekyee na adzesaa do, na wonyi kan mfi sum ho.
Na Enyame no hwɛɛ dɛm ndzɛmba no a wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ho mbra no do kesii dɛ wodzii do.
Na ɔbaa dɛ ofi ewimbir kesi anapa yɛɛ adzesaa; na ɔbaa dɛ ofi anapa kesi ewimbir yɛɛ adzekyee; nna ɔyɛɛ mpɛn anan.
Na Enyame no see dɛ: Wɔmma yensiesie esu no ma wɔndɔ mbowa menyamenya a wɔkekã hɔnho a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu; na ntumbowa, ama woekyin asaase do wɔ ɔsor wimu.

Na Enyame no siesiee esu no ma wɔadɔ esumbowa akɛse, na mbowa a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu a wɔkekã hɔnho a esu no bɔdɔ hɔn menyamenya dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee; na ntumbowa biara dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee. Na Enyame no hun dɛ wobedzi do ama hɔn, na dɛ hɔn nhyehyɛɛ no ye.
Na Enyame no see dɛ: Yebehyira hɔn na yɛama wɔawo na wɔadɔr, na wɔahyɛ po anaadɛ esu kɛse no mã; na yɛama ntumbowa adɔr wɔ asaase do.
Na ɔbaa dɛ ofi ewimbir kesi anapa na wɔfrɛɛ no adzesaa; na ɔbaa dɛ ofi anapa kesi ewimbir na wɔfrɛɛ no adzekyee; nna ɔyɛɛ mpɛn enum.
Na Enyame no siesiee asaase no ma ɔadɔr mbowa a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee, anantwi nye mbowa a wɔtsen, nye mbowadoma dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee; na ɔyɛɛ dɛm, dɛ mbrɛ wɔkãe no.
Na Enyame no hyehyɛɛ dɛ asaase no ndɔr mbowadoma dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee, na anantwi dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee, nye adze biara a ɔtsen asaase do dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee; na Enyame no hun dɛ wobedzi do.

Na Enyame no faa apam wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn mu na wɔsee dɛ: Wɔmma yɛnkɔ famu na yɛmbɔ nyimpa wɔ hɛnankasa hɛn saso do, dɛ mbrɛ hɛn su tsetsee; na yɛbɛma hɔn tum wɔ po mu nam do, nye wimu ntumbowa do, nye anantwi do, nye asaase nyina do, nye abowa biara a ɔtsen asaase do.
Dɛm ntsi Enyame no kɔr famu dɛ wɔrokɔbɔ nyimpa wɔ hɔn saso do, Enyame no hɔn saso do na wɔrekɛyɛ no, ɔbanyin na ɔbaa na wɔrekɛyɛ hɔn.

Na Enyame no see dɛ: Yebehyira hɔn. Na Enyame no see dɛ: Yɛbɛma wɔawo na wɔadɔr, na wɔahyɛ asaase do mã, na wɔahom do, na woenya tum wɔ po mu nam do, nye wimu ntumbowa do, nye adze biara a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu a wɔkekã hɔnho wɔ asaase do.

Na Enyame no see dɛ: Hwɛ, yɛbɛma hɔn haban a ɔsow aba nyinara a ɔbɛba asaase nyinara enyi, nye ndua nyinara a ɔbɔsow eduaba wɔ do; nyew, dua do eduaba a ɔsow aba no yɛdze bɛma hɔn; ɔbɛyɛ edziban ama hɔn.
Na asaase mbowadoma biara, nye wimu ntumbowa biara, nye adze biara a ɔtsen wɔ asaase no do, hwɛ, yɛbɛma hɔn nkwa, na yɛbɛma hɔn mfunoma biara ma woeedzi, na wɔbɛhyehyɛ ndzɛmba yinom nyinara dɛm.

Na Enyame no see dɛ: Yɛbɛyɛ biribiara a yɛakã no, na yeahyehyɛ hɔn; na hwɛ, wɔbɛyɛ setsie papaapa. Na ɔbaa dɛ ofi ewimbir kesi anapa na wɔfrɛɛ no adzesaa; na ɔbaa dɛ ofi anapa kesi ewimbir no wɔfrɛɛ no adzekyee; na wɔkaan mber a otsia esia.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/5.title: Abraham 5
chapter_summary: Enyame no wie Hɔn abɔdze ho nhyehyɛɛ ndzɛmba nyinara—Wowie Abɔdze no dɛ mbrɛ Hɔn nhyehyɛɛ no tse—Adam to abowadoma biara a nkwa wɔ no mu no dzin.

verses.text: Na dɛm na yebowie ɔsor nye asaase, nye abɔdze tutuw nyinara.
Na Enyame no see hɔnho dɛ: Mber a otsia esuon no yebowie hɛn edwuma yɛ, dza yɛpaam too hɔ no; na yɛbɛgye hɛn ahom wɔ mber a otsia esuon no mu efi hɛn edwuma nyinara a yɛapam no ho no.

Na Enyame no wiee mber a otsia esuon no, osiandɛ mber a otsia esuon no wɔbɛgye hɔn ahom efi hɔn edwuma nyinara a wɔapam (Enyame no) dɛ wɔbɛyɛ no; na wɔtseew ho. Na dɛm nye hɔn adwen ber a wɔfaa hɔnho apam dɛ wɔbɔbɔ ɔsor nye asaase no.
Na Enyame no baa famu na wɔbɔɔ ɔsor na asaase ebusuasantsen yinom, ber a wɔbɔɔ hɔn wɔ da a Enyame no bɔɔ ɔsor na asaase no,

Ɔfa dza wɔkãa nyinara wɔ dua biara a ɔwɔ hamu ansaana ɔreba asaase no do ho, nye haban biara a ɔwɔ hamu ansaana orifir no; osiandɛ nna Enyame no mmaa nsu nntɔree nnguu asaase no do ber a wɔpaam dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom no, nna wɔmmbɔɔ nyimpa dɛ ɔmbɔdɔw.
Mbom nsuwusiw fii asaase do, na ɔfɔɔw asaase enyi nyinara.
Na Enyame no dze asaase do huntuma bɔɔ nyimpa, na wɔfaa no sunsum (ɔno yɛ, nyimpa no no sunsum), na wɔdze hyɛɛ no mu; na woguu nkwahom guu n’ahwentokura mu, na nyimpa bɛyɛɛ ɔkra tseasefo.
Na Enyame no yɛɛ ture wɔ Eden, wɔ boka afamu, hɔ na wɔdze nyimpa no toe, nyia wɔdze no sunsum hyɛɛ no mu no.
Na asaase no do na Enyame no maa ndua biara a ɔyɛ fɛw na oye dɛ wodzi fifirii fii mu bae; nkwadua no so wɔ ture no ne finimfin, papa na bɔn ho nyimdzee dua no.
Na esutsen bi fi Eden, kɔree kɔfɔɔw ture no, na ofi hɔ no na no mu paapaae na ɔbɛyɛɛ nsutsir anan.
Na Enyame no faa ɔbarimba no na wɔdze no kɔtoo Eden Ture no mu, dɛ onsiesie hɔ na ɔnhwɛ do.
Na Enyame no hyɛɛ nyimpa no mbra, see dɛ: Ture yi mu ndua biara dzi bi.

Mbom papa na bɔn ho nyimdzee dua no dze, mma nndzi bi; na ber a ibedzi bi no, ampaara dɛ ibowu. Afei emi Abraham, hun iyi dɛ ma Ewuradze ne mber no tse, dɛ mbrɛ Kolob ne mber tse; na dɛm mber no nna Enyame no mmfaa mber ne nkanee no mmaa Adam.
Na Enyame no see dɛ: Wɔmma yɛnyɛ boafo a ɔfata mma ɔbarimba no, na onnyi dɛ ɔbarimba no nko tsena, dɛm ntsi yɛbɛyɛ boafo a ɔfata ama no.
Na Enyame no maa nda heii tɔɔ Adam no do; na ɔdae, na woyii ne mparba mu kor, na wosiiw honam hyɛɛ n’ananmu;
Na mparba no a Enyame no yii fii ɔbarimba no mu no, wɔdze bɔɔ ɔbaa, na wɔdze no brɛɛ ɔbarimba no.
Na Adam see dɛ: Oyi yɛ me mbiew mu mbiew, na mo honam mu honam; afei wɔbɛfrɛ no Ɔbaa, osiandɛ woyii no fi ɔbarimba mu.
Dɛm ntsi ɔbarimba begya n’egya nye ne nã wɔ hɔ, na ɔdze noho akɛfam ne yer ho, na wɔayɛ honankor.
Na hɔn beenu no nyinara dzi adagyaw, ɔbarimba no nye ne yer no, na hɔn enyi nntõ.

Na Enyame no dze dɛtse yɛɛ hamu mbowadoma biara, nye wimu ntumbowa biara, na wɔdze hɔn brɛɛ Adam dɛ ɔnhwɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛfrɛ hɔn; na adze biara a Adam dze frɛɛ abɔdze biara a nkwa wɔ no mu no, ɔnoara nye ne dzin.
Na Adam totoo anantwi nyinara, nye wimu ntumbowa; nye hamu mbowadoma biara dzin. Nna Adam dze woenya ɔboafo a ɔfata no ama no.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-1.title: Mfonyin 1
/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-1.book_title: Mfonyin a Wɔfae fii Abraham Nwoma no mu
subtitle: Nkanee 1
text: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu
Mfonyin 1. Ewuradze no Bɔfoe.
Mfonyin 2. Wɔakyekyer Abraham ato afɔrmbukyia do.
Mfonyin 3. Elkenah sɔfo bosonsɔrnyi no reper dɛ ɔdze Abraham bɔbɔ afɔr.
Mfonyin 4. Afɔrmbukyia a asɔfo abosonsɔrfo no bɔ afɔr do no, osi Elkenah, Libnah, Mahmackrah, Korash, nye Pharaoh enyame enyim.
Mfonyin 5. Elkenah nyame ohonyi no.
Mfonyin 6. Libnah nyame ohonyi no.
Mfonyin 7. Mahmackrah nyame ohonyi no.
Mfonyin 8. Korash nyame ohonyi no.
Mfonyin 9. Pharaoh nyame ohonyi no.
Mfonyin 10. Abraham wɔ Egypt.
Mfonyin 11. Wɔyɛe dze akyerɛ ɔsor fadum no dɛ mbrɛ Egyptfo tse ase no.

Mfonyin 12. Raukeeyang, n’asekyerɛ nye wimu, anaadɛ ɔsor a ɔwɔ hɛn etsifi yi; mbom dɛ mbrɛ iyi tse wɔ asɛm yi ho no, Egyptfo no dze kyerɛ Shaumau, a n’asekyerɛ nye adze a ɔkrɔn, anaadɛ ɔsorsor, tse dɛ Hebrew kasa, Shaumahyeem.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-2.title: Mfonyin 2
/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-2.book_title: Mfonyin a Wɔfae fii Abraham Nwoma no mu
subtitle: Nkanee 2
text: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu

Mfo. 1. Kolob, n’asekyerɛ nye abɔdze a odzi kan, ɔbɛn celestial, anaadɛ Nyankopɔn ne tsenabew papaapa. Ɔsor amambu mu panyin, ɔno nye mber ne nkanee mu nsusui no mu dza odzi ekyir. Nsusui tse dɛ celestial mber, ne celestial mber n’asekyerɛ nye da kor a ɔyɛ basafa. Da kor wɔ Kolob mu yɛ mfe apem wɔ asaase yi do, dza Egyptfo frɛ no Jah-oh-eh.

Mfo. 2. Dzi Kolob do, Egyptfo frɛ no Oliblish, ɔno so dzi sor abɔdze amambu panyin no n’ekyir, ɔbɛn celestial anaadɛ bea a Nyankopɔn tse; okitsa tum ne saafee so, ɔkã sor abɔdze nkaa no ho; dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn yii kyerɛɛ Abraham no, ber a ɔbɔɔ afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do, dza osii maa Ewuradze no.

Mfo. 3. Wɔyɛɛ no dɛ ogyina hɔ ma Nyankopɔn a, ɔtse n’ahengua do, a tum na tumdzi ahyɛ no mã; onnyiewiei kan ahenkyɛw hyɛ ne tsir; ɔkyerɛ Asɔfodzi Krɔnkrɔn no ne Nkasafua-mapã no so, dɛ mbrɛ woyii kyerɛɛ Adam wɔ Eden Ture no mu no, nye Seth, Noah, Melchizedek, Abraham so, nye hɔn a woyii Asɔfodzi no kyerɛɛ hɔn nyinara.

Mfo. 4. Ɔkyerɛ Hebrew kasafua Raukeeyang ase, dza ogyina hɔ ma wimu, anaadɛ ɔsorsor wimu; ɔyɛ Egyptfo hɔn akyerɛw a ogyina hɔ ma apem; ɔkyerɛ Oliblish ne mber no nsusui, a ɔnye Kolob ne nkyinho nye ne mber nsusui yɛ pɛr.

Mfo. 5. Egyptfo frɛ no Enish-go-on-dosh; iyi yɛ sor abɔdze a wɔhwɛ sor abɔdze nkaa no do no hɔn mu kor so, na Egyptfo no see dɛ ɔyɛ Ewia, na ɔsera ne kan fi Kolob hɔ a odua Kae-e-vanrash a ɔyɛ Saafee nwanwa no, anaadɛ, dza yɛbɛkã dɛ, ɔyɛ ɔhwɛdo tum, dza ɔhwɛ sor abɔdze anaadɛ nworaba duenum binom a wotsim fakor no, nye Floeese anaadɛ Bosoom so, Asaase nye Ewia wɔ hɔnho a wokyin afe afe mu no. Sor abɔdze yi dua Kli-flos-is-es, anaadɛ Hah-ko-kau-beam, nworaba no a wɔdze nkanee 22 na 23 egyina hɔ ama hɔn no, nya kan fi Kolob ne nkyinho no mu.
Mfo. 6. Gyina hɔ ma asaase yi wɔ ne mfɛndzanan no mu.
Mfo. 7. Gyina hɔ ma Nyankopɔn a ɔtse n’ahengua do, fi sor riyi Asɔfodzi nwanwa noho Nkasafua-etsitsir mapã no kyerɛ; nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ho asɛnkyerɛdze no so tse dɛ ebubur dze rekyerɛ Abraham.
Mfo. 8. Kyerɛ nkyerɛwee bi a wonnkotum eyi akyerɛ wiadze; mbom wobohu no wɔ Nyankopɔn ne Temple Krɔnkrɔn no mu.
Mfo. 9. Onnyi dɛ woyi kyerɛ wɔ dɛm aber yi mu.
Mfo. 10. Iyi so dɛmara.
Mfo. 11. Iyi so dɛmara. Sɛ wiadze botum ehu akyerɛw yinom a, ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.
Mfonyin 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, na 21 no wɔdze bɛma wɔ Ewuradze nankasa ne ber ano.
Dza wɔakyerɛ ase wɔ sor yi wɔdze ama dɛ mbrɛ yɛwɔ ho kwan dɛ yɛdze ma wɔ dɛm aber yi mu.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-3.title: Mfonyin 3
/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-3.book_title: Mfonyin a Wɔfae fii Abraham Nwoma no mu
subtitle: Nkanee 3
text: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu

Mfo. 1. Abraham a ɔtse Pharaoh n’ahengua do, osian ɔhen no n’enyidzii ntsi, ahenkyɛw hyɛ no, ogyina hɔ ma Asɔfodzi no, iyi kyerɛ President tsitsir na n’Apamfo a ɔwɔ Sor no; okitsa pɛrpɛrdzi na atsɛmbu ahempoma wɔ ne nsamu.
Mfo. 2. Ɔhen Pharaoh, nyia ne dzin no wɔdze akyerɛwmba akyerɛw wɔ n’etsifi no.
Mfo. 3. Ɔkyerɛ Abraham ber a ɔwɔ Egypt tse dɛ dza wɔakã ho asɛm wɔ Mfonyin 10 a odzi kan mu no so.
Mfo. 4. Pharaoh ne babanyin, Egypt Hen, dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw wɔ ne nsa no sor no.
Mfo. 5. Shulem, ɔhen no no nkowaa etsitsir mu kor, dɛ mbrɛ akyerɛwmba wɔ ne nsa no sor dze egyina hɔ ama no.
Mfo. 6. Olimlah, ɔhenbabanyin no dɔnkɔnyi.
Abraham reyi atsɛn wɔ, Bosoom na Nworaba hɔn fapem ho kyerɛ ɔhen no no nkorɔfo.

/study/scriptures/pgp/js-m/1.title: Joseph Smith—Matthew 1
chapter_summary: Jesus dzi kan kã Jerusalem ne nsɛe a ɔbɛba ntsɛmara ho asɛm—Ɔkã Onyimpa Ba no Ne Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien so ho asɛm, nye emumuyɛfo hɔn nsɛe.

verses.text: Na mese hom dɛ, ofitsi sesei dze kɔ hom runnhu me na wobohu dɛ emi nye nyia nkɔnhyɛfo no kyerɛɛw noho nsɛm no, akɛpem dɛ hom bɛse dɛ: Nhyira nye nyia ɔnam Ewuradze ne dzin mu reba no, wɔ ɔsor nsuwusiw mu, na abɔfo krɔnkrɔn nyinara kã noho. Afei n’esuafo no nyaa ntseasee dɛ ɔbɛba asaase do bio, ekyir no a wɔahyɛ no enyimnyam na wɔahyɛ no ahenkyɛw wɔ Nyankopɔn n’abanyimfa hɔ no.

Na Jesus fiir edzi, na ofii temple no mu kɔree; na n’esuafo no baa ne nkyɛn dɛ woribetsie no, wɔsee no dɛ: Owura, kyerɛ hɛn dza ɔfa temple no n’adan no ho, dɛ mbrɛ ekãa dɛ—wobodwuruw egu famu, na woegyaa no efituo ama hom.
Na Jesus see hɔn dɛ: Ana hom nnhu ndzɛmba yinom nyina, na hom nntse ase? Nokwar mese hom dɛ, wonnkegya ɔbo kor a ɔda kor do wɔ temple yi do a wonnkodwuruw egu famu.

Na Jesus gyaa hɔn hɔ, na ɔkɔr Ngo Bepɔw no do. Na ber a ɔko Ngo Bepɔw no do no, esuafo no baa ne nkyɛn kokoa mu, bɛsee no dɛ: Kyerɛ hɛn aber a dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a akã a ɔfa temple no na Jewfo hɔn ɔsɛɛ ho no bɛyɛ hɔ; na wo mbae nye wiadze n’ewiei ho asɛnkyerɛdze bɛyɛ dɛn, anaadɛ emumuyɛfo hɔn nsɛɛe a ɔyɛ wiadze n’ewiei no?
Na Jesus buae, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hom nhwɛ yie amma obi aanndaadaa hom;
Na dodowara bɛba wɔ me dzin mu, ase dɛ—Emi nye Christ—na wɔbɛdaadaa pii;
Nkyii wobeyi hom ama ma wɔatsetsee hom, na woeku hom, na aman nyina bɛtan hom wɔ me dzin ntsi;
Na nkyii ɔbɔto dodowara fintsidua, na wobeyiyi hɔnho ama, na wɔatentan hɔnho;
Na nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo pii bɔsoɛr na wɔadaadaa dodowara;
Na osiandɛ emumuyɛ bɔdɔɔ sõ ntsi, dodowara hɔn dɔ bɛyɛ nwin;
Mbom nyia obetsim ekodu ewiei no, ɔno na wɔbɛgye no nkwa.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom, hu amamfoyɛ ekyiwadze no a Daniel nkɔnhyɛnyi no kãa ho asɛm no a ɔfa Jerusalem ne nsɛɛe ho no a, hom ngyina krɔnkrɔn bea hɔ; nyia ɔkenkan no wɔmma ɔntse ase.
Afei wɔmma hɔn a wɔwɔ Judea nguan nkɔ mbepɔw do;
Wɔmma nyia ɔwɔ dan etsifi nguan, na mma ɔnnsan mmbɛfa biribiara mmfi ne fie;
Eso mma nyia ɔwɔ haban mu nnsan n’ekyir mmbɛfa ne tam;
Na hɔn a wɔafa efur, nye hɔn a wɔma enumfo wɔ da no mu no ndue;
Dɛm ntsi, hom nsɔr mma Ewuradze amma hom enguan ammba awɔwber mu anaa ahomgyeda;

Dɛm aber no, ahohiahia kɛse bɛba Jewfo, nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Jerusalem no do, dza Nyankopɔn nnsomaa mma bi mmbaa Israel do da, ofitsi hɔn ahenman n’ahyɛse dze bodu aber yi; dabida, eso ɔronnsoma mma ɔmmba Israel do bio da.
Ndzɛmba nyinara a aba hɔn do no yɛ awerɛhow a ɔbɛba hɔn do no n’ahyɛse.
Na gyedɛ wotwa nda no do tsia, annyɛ dɛm a honam biara nnkenya nkwa; mbom hɔn a wɔapamu eyi hɔn no ntsi, dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛmudzi no tse no ntsi, wobotwa dɛm nda no do tsia.

Hwɛ makã dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a ɔfa Jewfo no ho akyerɛ hom; na bio, dɛm nda no mu ahohiahia a ɔbɛba Jerusalem do n’ekyir no, sɛ obi se hom dɛ, Hwɛ Christ no wɔ ha, anaaso ɔwɔ hɔ no a, mma hom nngye nndzi;

Na dɛm nda no mu Christ atorfo nye nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo bɔsoɛr na wɔakyerɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze akɛse nye ahobowdze, ma sɛ ɔbɛyɛ a mpamufo no mpo wɔaadaadaa hɔn, hɔn a wɔapamu eyi hɔn dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛmudzi no tse no.

Hwɛ, mekã dɛm ndzɛmba yinom kyerɛ hom osian mpamufo no ntsi; na hom bɛtse akõkoekõ, nye akosɛm nkã; hom nhwɛ mma ɔnnhaw hom, na dza makã akyerɛ hom nyina otwar dɛ ɔba; mbom nna ewiei no nnyaa nndurii.
Hwɛ, makã akyerɛ hom dada;
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ wɔse hom dɛ: Hwɛ, ɔwɔ sar no do a; mma hom nnkɔ: Hwɛ, ɔwɔ nsumaa bea a; mma hom nngye nndzi;
Na dɛ mbrɛ anapa kan fi boka, na ɔhyerɛn mpo kɔ anee, na ɔkata asaase nyina do no, dɛmara na Nyimpa Ba no ne mbae no so bɛyɛ.
Na afei, mekã hom abɛbusɛm bi. Hwɛ, beebiara mbrɛ fun wɔ no, hɔ na nkɔr boaboa hɔn ano; dɛmara so na wɔbɔboaboa m’apamufo hɔn ano efi asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyina mu.
Na wɔbɛtse akõkoekõ, nye akosɛm nkã.
Hwɛ mekasa osian hɔn a mapamu eyi hɔn no ntsi; osiandɛ ɔman bɔsoɛr ɔman do, na ahenman asoɛr ahenman do; na ɔkɔm nye atsetsee, nye asaase wosow bɛba mbeambea.
Na bio, osiandɛ emumuyɛ bɔdɔɔ sõ ntsi nyimpa hɔn dɔ bɛyɛ nwin; mbom nyia wonnkedzi no do konyim no, ɔno na wɔbɛgye no nkwa.
Na bio, Ahenman ho Asɛmpa yi wɔbɛkã wɔ wiadze nyina mu dze edzi dase akyerɛ aman nyinara, na nkyii ewiei no bɛba, anaadɛ emumuyɛfo no hɔn nsɛɛe no;
Na bio, amamfoyɛ ekyiwadze no a Daniel nkɔnhyɛnyi no kãa ho asɛm no bɛhyɛ mã.
Na ntsɛmara nda no mu ahohiahia no ekyir no, ewia bɛhyɛ sum, na bosoom nnkɛma ne kan, na nworaba fi sor bɔtotɔ, na sor etum bɔwosow.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ebusuasantsen yi a wɔbɛda ndzɛmba yinom edzi wɔ mu no nnkotwa mu akɔ kodu dɛ dza makã akyerɛ hom nyinara bɛhyɛ mã.
Ɔwɔ mu dɛ nda no bɛba a ɔsor nye asaase botwa mu akɔ; eso me nsɛm nnkotwa mu akɔ, mbom ne nyinara bɛhyɛ mã.

Na, dɛ mbrɛ makã dada no, dɛm nda no mu ahohiahia no ekyir no, na ɔsorsor etum bɔwosow no, nkyii na Nyimpa Ba no n’asɛnkyerɛdze bopue wɔ sor, na afei asaase do ebusuakuw nyinara botwa ewuoo; na wobohu Nyimpa Ba no dɛ ɔdze tum na enyimnyam kɛse reba wɔ sor nsuwusiw mu;

Na nyia ɔma m’asɛm som no bo no, wɔnnkɛdaadaa no, osiandɛ Nyimpa Ba no bɛba, na ɔdze totorobɛnto a ne ndze sõ bɔsoma n’abɔfoe no dɛ wondzi ne kan, na wɔabɔboaboa ne mpamufo no a wɔaka no efi mframa anan no mu, efi sor n’ewiei kor dze ekesi kor so.
Afei hom nsũa adɔmbadua ho bɛ no—Sɛ n’abaw yɛ momon, na ɔhyɛ ase dɛ oriyi ahaban a, hom nyim dɛ ɔhyewber abɛn.
Dɛmara so na hɔn a mapamu eyi no, ber a wobohu ndzɛmba yinom no, wobohu dɛ abɛn, edu abowano mpo.
Mbom ɔfa da no nye dɔn no obiara nnyim; oho, nnyɛ Nyankopɔn a ɔwɔ sor n’abɔfoe, mbom m’Egya nko.
Mbom dɛ mbrɛ Noah ne nda no mu no yɛe no, dɛmara so na ɔbɛyɛ wɔ Nyimpa Ba ne mbae no;
Na dɛmara na ɔbɛyɛ hɔn, dɛ mbrɛ nda no a odzi nsuyirii no kan no; da no ansaana Noah kɛhɛɛn hɛn-adaka no mu no nna woridzidzi na wɔronom, wɔrowarwar na wɔrema awar.
Nna wonnyim araa dze kodur dɛ nsuyirii no bae, bɛfaa hɔn nyinara kɔree; mbrɛ Nyimpa Ba ne mbae no bɛyɛ ara nye no.
Nna dza wɔakyerɛw no bɛhyɛ mã dɛ, nda a odzi ekyir no mu no nyimpa beenu wɔ haban mu a wɔbɛfa baako na woegya baako;
Beenu bɛyam wɔ ewuyambo do a, wɔbɛfa baako na woegya baako;
Na dza mekã kyerɛ kor no, mekã kyerɛ nyimpa nyinara; dɛm ntsi hom nweɔn, osiandɛ hom nnyim dɔn kor a hom Ewuradze bɛba.
Mbom hom nhu iyi dɛ, sɛ ofiwura no nyim dɔn kor a owifo no bɛba a, nkyɛ ɔweɔnee, na ɔamma woemmbobubu ne dan, enndua mu, mbom nkyɛ ɔyɛɛ krado.
Dɛm ntsi hom so hom nyɛ krado, osiandɛ dɔn a hom nnsusu mu na Nyimpa Ba no reba.
Woana, mbɔ, nye akowaa nokwafo na nyansafo a no wura dze no esi ne fikuw do, dɛ ɔmma hɔn edziban wɔ ber a ɔsɛ mu?
Nhyira akã dɛm akowaa no a, sɛ no wura ba a, obohu no dɛ ɔreyɛ dɛm; na nokwar mese hom dɛ, ɔdze no besi n’adze a ɔwɔ nyinara do.
Mbom sɛ dɛm akowaa bɔn no se wɔ n’akoma mu dɛ: Mo wura rikyim ne mbae,
Na ɔhyɛ ase bobɔ no mfɛfo-nkowaa no, na ɔnye asabokwafo dzidzi na ɔnom,
Akowaa no wura bɛba da a n’enyi nnda no kwan, ɔnye dɔn a onnyim mu.
Na obotwa no mu esinesin, na ɔama ɔnye enyidosomkyerɛfo edzi afora; na hɔ na osu nye asetwɛr wɔ.
Na dɛm na emumuyɛfo hɔn ewiei bɛyɛ, dɛ mbrɛ Moses no nkɔnhyɛ se: Wobotwa hɔn akyen efi nkorɔfo no mu; mbom wiadze n’ewiei no nnyae nndurii, mbom ɔbɛba ntsɛmara.

/study/scriptures/pgp/js-h/1.title: Joseph Smith—Abakɔsɛm 1
chapter_summary: Joseph Smith kã ne nanaanom, n’ebusuafo ho nsɛm, nye bea a nna wɔtse ahyɛse no—Nyamesom ho nhuanyan soronko bi tahye wɔ New York anee hɔ—Ɔper hwehwɛ nyansa dɛ mbrɛ James kyerɛ no—Egya na Ɔba no puee, na wɔfrɛ Joseph wɔ ne nkɔnhyɛ ɔsomdwuma mu. (Nkyekyɛmu 1–20.)
subtitle: Nsɛm bi a Wɔfae fii Joseph Smith Nkɔnhyɛnyi no N’abakɔsɛm no mu

verses.text: Osian nkorɔfo a wɔpɛ dɛ wodzi bɔn hɔn nsɛm a wɔdze rikyima, dze resɛɛ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo no ne kankɔ na no mpontu, nsɛm a dɛm nkorɔfo yi rekã na wɔrekyerɛw dɛ wɔdze resɛɛ Asɔr no ne dzin, ne kankɔ na no mpontu wɔ wiadze mu ntsi—na wɔama merekyerɛw abakɔsɛm yi, dze asakyer nkorɔfo hɔn adwen, ama hɔn a wɔreper hwehwɛ nokwar no eehu nokwar, dɛ mbrɛ woeesi no ho, dza ɔfa mankasa moho na Asɔr no ho, susuampaara dɛ mowɔ nokwar no wɔ mo hɔ.

Abakɔsɛm yi mu na mebɛkã ndzɛmba horow a osisii a ɔfa Asɔr yi ho, wɔ nokwar nye tseneneeyɛ mu, tse dɛ mbrɛ osisii, anaa tse dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse mber yi mu, a ɔyɛ sesei [1838] mfe awɔtwe fi ber a wɔtseew dɛm Asɔr yi.

Wɔwoo me wɔ hɛn Ewuradze n’afe mpemahaawɔtwe enum mu wɔ Mumu ne da a otsĩa eduonu ebiasa mu, wɔ Sharon kurow mu, wɔ Windsor mansin mu, wɔ Vermont man mu. … M’egya, Joseph Smith Panyin, fii Vermont Ɔman mu kɛtsenaa Palmyra, wɔ Ontario (seseiara wɔfrɛ no Wayne) mansin, a ɔwɔ New York man mu, ber a nna medzi mfe du, anaa bɛyɛ dɛm no. M’egya dur Palmyra no, ne mfe bɛyɛ anan ekyir no, ɔnye n’ebusua tui kɔr Manchester wɔ Ontario mansin kor noara mu—

N’ebusua hɔn dodow yɛ akra dubiako, hɔn edzin nye, m’egya, Joseph Smith; me nã Lucy Smith (ansaana ɔrobɔwar no nna ne dzin dze Mack, Solomon Mack ne babaa); mo nuanom mbanyin, Alvin (ɔno owuu Ɔberɛfɛw 19, 1823, ber a nna oedzi mfe 26), Hyrum, emi, Samuel Harrison, William, Don Carlos; nye me nkyerɛbaa, Sophronia, Catherine, na Lucy.

Yetui kɛtsenaa Manchester no ne mfe ebien mu no nyamesom ho nhuanyan soronko bi tahyee wɔ bea a yɛtse no. Ɔhyɛɛ ase wɔ Methodist asɔrmba mu, na annkyɛr na asɔrasɔr a wɔwɔ dɛm mantam no mu no suoo mu. Nokwar, ɔtahyee wɔ ɔman no ne mansin nyinara do, na nyimpa dɔm tutui kãa hɔnho boaa ano kɔdɔm asɔr horow, dɛm no dze basabasayɛ na mpaapaamu kɛse baa nyimpa no mu, binom yɛɛ dede ara yie wɔ ho, binom se, “Hwɛ ha!” na binom so se “Hwɛ hɔ!” Binom kɔr Methodist asɔr afã, binom so kɔr Presbyterian afã, na binom so kɔr Baptist afã.

Na eso dɔ kɛse a hɔn a wɔsakyeer hɔn kɔr asɔr horow mu kyerɛɛ wɔ hɔn nsakyer ber mu no, na asɔfo no dwuma a wodzii no enyiberdo kyerɛe na ahokekã soronko a wɔdze maa nyamesom ho nkãtse yi no, aama wɔdze asakyer obiara no, dɛ mber a nna wɔkã dɛ wɔmma wɔndɔm asɔr biara a wɔpɛ; naaso ber a hɔn a wɔsakyeer hɔn no hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrebɔ apetse no, na binom rokɔ kuw kor mu, na binom so rokɔ kuw kor so mu no, wohun dɛ nkãtse pa a asɔfo no na hɔn a wɔsakyeer hɔn no kyerɛe no yɛ ndaadaa na ɔnnyɛ nokwar; osiandɛ basabasayɛ kɛse sii na adwensɛɛ bae—ɔsɔfo kõ tsia ɔsɔfo, nna hɔn a wɔasakyer hɔn no tsiaa hɔnho; dɛm ntsi nkãtse pa nyinara a nna wɔwɔ ma hɔnho nkorkor no; sɛ nna wɔwɔ bi dze a, ɔyeew koraa osian kasa a wɔkasaa dze tsiaa hɔnho na hɔn gyedzi ho ekyingye ntsi.

Aber yi mu nna mowɔ me mfe duenum mu. M’egya n’ebusua no sakyeree kɔr Presbyterian gyedzi no mu, na hɔn mu baanan kɔdɔɔm hɔn, hɔn nye, me nã, Lucy; mo nuanom mbanyin Hyrum na Samuel Harrison; nye m’akyerɛba Sophronia.

Ber a dɛm nhuanyan kɛse no rokɔ do no, mehyɛɛ ase dwendween papaapa na midzii atseetsee ara yie; mbom nna ɔwɔ mu dɛ nkã a metse no no mu dɔ dze, naaso motwee moho koraa fii ekuwekuw yinom ho, mbom aber biara a mutumii no mokɔr hɔn nhyiamu dodowara bi. Mber kakra guu mu no, me pɛ hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekɛhɛn Methodist asɔr mu, na minyaa pɛ dɛ mobɔkɔ akɔdɔm hɔn; mbom nna adwensɛɛ na aperper kɛse a ɔrokɔ do wɔ asɔr horow no mu ntsi, nna ɔyɛ dzen ma obi a osuar tse dɛ emi, na m’adwen mu mmbuei biara wɔ nyimpa na ndzɛmba ho dɛ mibenya adwen a osi pi dze akyerɛ nyia nedze ye na nyia nedze muo.

Ɔtɔ mber bi a nna m’adwen ehuanyan ara yie koraa, osian nkekamu na basabasayɛ kɛse a ɔrokɔ do no ntsi. Presbyterianfo no nna wotsia Baptistfo na Methodistfo no papaapa, na wɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen dze hɔn adwen ne nyimdzee na dɔkɔdɔkɔsɛm dze daa hɔn mfom edzi, anaadɛ, annyɛ yie koraa no, dze maa ma nkorɔfo eehu dɛ wɔafom. Baptistfo na Methodistfo so hɔn afamu no, dze enyimpi kor yi ara dɛ wɔbɛda hɔn nkyerɛkyerɛ no edzi, na wɔakyerɛ dɛ nkaafo ne dze no nyina nyɛ nokwar.

Kasatsia na basabasayɛ nye adwen a ɔnnsaa ntsi no, mibisaa moho mpɛn pii dɛ: Ebɛnadze na ɔsɛ dɛ meyɛ? Ekuwekuw yinom nyina mu muana na nedze ye; anaadɛ, ne nyinara nntsen? Sɛ no mu kor na oye a, nna no mu muana, na mibesi dɛn na mehu?

Ber a miridzi atseetsee wɔ akansi a nsɔr horow yinom resi ho no, da kor bi merekenkan James Nwoma no, ne tsir kor, nkyekyɛmu enum, a ɔkã dɛ: Sɛ hom mu biara ne nyansaa tɔ sin a, ma ombisa Nyankopɔn a ɔdze ma nyimpa nyinara kwa, na ɔnnkã enyim no; na ɔdze bɛma no.

Dɛm kyerɛsɛm yi no tum nnkitsaa nyimpa biara n’akoma pɛn kyɛn dza iyi dze yɛɛ me dɛm ber yi mu. Ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze ahoɔdzen kɛse bi hwiraa m’akoma mu nyina. Modweendween ho mpɛn pii, minyim dɛ sɛ obi hia nyansa efi Nyame hɔ a, nna emi a, na dza ɔwɔ dɛ meyɛ no minnyim, na gyedɛ mutum nya nyansa mbordo kyɛn dza nna mowɔ no, ɔno munnkotum ehu; osiandɛ asɔr horow no mu akyerɛkyerɛfo no tsee kyerɛwsɛm mu asɛnsin kor no ara ase wɔ kwan a ɔson koraa do a ɔdze sɛɛ awerɛhyɛmu biara a ɔwɔ dɛ yɛhwɛ Bible mu dze nya asɛmbisa no ho mbuae.

Ekyir no meyɛɛ adwen dɛ otwar dɛ mokɔ do tsena sum nye adwensɛɛ mu dɛmara anaa meyɛ dɛ mbrɛ James akyerɛ no, ɔno nye dɛ, mibisa Nyame. Ekyir no misii m’adwen pi dɛ “mimbisa Nyame,” ɔnam dɛ meyɛɛ adwen dɛ sɛ ɔdze nyansa ma hɔn a hɔn nyansa tɔ sin a, na ɔdze bɛma kwa, na ɔrennkã enyim a, nna mebɛyɛ ahwɛ.

Dɛm ntsi ber a m’adwen sii pi dɛ mimbisa Nyame no, mokɔr kwaa bi mu dɛ morokɔbɔ mbɔdzen ayɛ. Ɔyɛ anapa a wimu atsew ara yie, wɔ afe apem ahaawɔtwe eduonu mu. Iyi nye aber a odzi kan wɔ me bra mu a mabɔ mbɔdzen ayɛ dɛm adze no, osiandɛ wɔ me dadwen yi nyinara mu no nna mummbuee m’ano mmbɔɔ mpaa da.

Ber a mudur bea a nna mayɛ m’adwen dada dɛ mobɔkɔ no, mohwehwɛɛ moho nyina na muhun dɛ monko na mowɔ hɔ no, mubuu ntwɛr na mehyɛɛ ase dɛ merekã m’akoma mu nsɛm akyerɛ Nyame. Mehyɛɛ ase no annkyɛr koraa, nna tum bi bɛhyɛɛ mo do, a odzii mo do konyim koraa, na nna ɔwɔ nhyɛdo huhu bi a ɔkyekyeer me tɛkyerɛma ntsi nna munntum nnkasa. Sum kebii twaa moho hyiae, na aber no mu no ɔyɛɛ me dɛ mbrɛ woegyaa mo mu ama ɔsɛɛ awerɛfir mu.

Mbom medze m’ahoɔdzen nyina bɔɔ mpaa frɛɛ Nyame dɛ ɔngye me mfi dɛm ɔtamfo yi a ɔabɛhyɛ mo do yi no tum nsa, aber no mu ara a meyɛɛ krado dɛ mebɛhɛn abagura ne bun mu no na meegyaa moho ama ɔsɛɛ no—ɔnnyɛ ɔsɛɛ a medze m’adwen bubui, mbom ɔyɛ nyimpa ankasa bi a ofi wiadze a enyi nntum nnhu no no tum, a ɔwɔ ahobow tum bi a menntsee bi nkã da wɔ nyimpa biara mu pɛn—aber yi ara mu a nna suro kɛse ekitsa me no, muhun kan fadum bi a ɔhyerɛn sen ewia, wɔ m’etsifi papaapa, a osiaan berɛww kɛpeem dɛ ɔtɔɔ mo do.

Opuei no annkyɛr koraa nna ɔgyee me fii ɔtamfo no a ɔakyekyer me no nsamu. Ber a kan no tɔr mo do no muhun Nyimpa-su beenu bi a hɔn hyerɛn na hɔn enyimnyam no murunntum nnkã ho asɛm, dɛ wɔsensɛn mo sor wɔ wimu. Hɔn mu kor bɔɔ me dzin na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me, ɔtseen ne nsa wɔ kor no do—Na ɔkãa dɛ, Oyi nye mo Dɔba no. Tsie No!

Mo botae a ɔnam do ma mirikebisa Ewuradze, asɔr horow no no mu dza oye, ama meetum ehu dza monkɔdɔm. Dɛm ntsi, aber a minyaa ahoɔdzen, a mubotum dze akasa no, nkyii mibisaa Nyimpa-su a wɔsensɛn m’etsifi wɔ kan no mu no asɔr no mu dza oye (osiandɛ dɛm aber yi nna ɔnnhɛn m’akoma mu dɛ hɔn nyinara nntsen)—na no mu dza ɔwɔ dɛ mokɔdɔm.

Ɔsee me dɛ mma monnkɔdɔm no mu biara osiandɛ ne nyinara nntsen; Nyimpa a ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me no see dɛ dza wɔgye dzi no yɛ ekyiwadze wɔ n’enyi do; na dɛ dɛm nkorɔfo a wɔfrɛ hɔnho nyamesomfo no nyinara aprɔw; na dɛ: “wɔdze hɔn anofamfa twe bɛn me, na mbom hɔn akoma dze ɔnye me ntamu twe kɛse, wɔkyerɛkyerɛ nyimpa ne mbrasɛm dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛ kyerɛwsɛm nkyerɛkyerɛ, na wɔyɛ dɛ wɔwɔ nyamesompa, na mbom wɔpow no tum no.”

Ɔsee me bio dɛ mma monnkɔdɔm hɔn mu biara; na ɔkãa nsɛm pii a murunntum nnkyerɛw no aber yi mu. Ber a m’enyi baa moho do bio no, mohwɛe no nna m’ekyir da famu, na m’enyi rohwɛ sor. Ber a kan no kɔree no, nna minnyi ahoɔdzen; mbom annkyɛr na minyaa ahom kakra, mokɔr fie. Na ber a motweer bea a ɔbɛn mbukyia no ho no, me nã bisaa me dɛ ebɛnadze yɛ me. Mubuaa dɛ, “Mma nnhaw woho, moho ye—moho ye koraa” Nkyii mekãa kyerɛɛ me nã dɛ, “Mankasa mehu dɛ Presbyterian asɔr no nnyɛ nokwar.” Ɔyɛ dɛ ɔtamfo no nyim dɛ, mo mbafober yi mu no, nna wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ dada dɛ mebɛyɛ ɔhawfo na ebufuhyɛnyi wɔ n’ahenman ho; ɔnntse dɛm a nna nkyɛ ɔyɛ dɛn yɛ na sum mu etumfo bɔbɔ mu etsia me? Ebɛnadze ntsi na ɔkotsia na atseetsee bɔsoɛr mo do, wɔ mo mbafober mpo mu?

Minyaa enyido-adzehu yi ma nda kakra twaa mu no, mihyiaa Methodist asɛnkãfo no hɔn mu kor, a nna ɔkã nyamesom ho nhuanyan a makã ho asɛm dada no ho ma ɔyɛ dzen; na, ber a menye no ridzi nyamesom ho nkɔmbɔ no, mekãa enyido-adzehu a menyaa no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no. Dza ɔyɛe no yɛɛ me ahobow; ɔammfa dza mekãa enyido-adzehu no no annyɛ hwee, mbom ɔyɛɛ no ebufuw so kɛse, ɔkãa dɛ ne nyinara fi abɔnsam, na dɛ ndzɛmba a ɔtsetse dɛm dɛ enyido-adzehu anaa nyikyerɛ biara nnyi hɔ dɛm nda yinom mu; na dɛ ndzɛmba a ɔtsetse dɛm nyinara gyaae wɔ asomafo no hɔn aber do, na biribiara nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛm a ɔbɛba bio.

Annkyɛr biara na muhun dɛ, nkorɔfo a wɔfrɛ hɔnho nyamesomfo no ehuanyan adwembɔn kɛse etsia me wɔ nsɛm a mekae no ho, na iyi na ɔama wɔretseetsee me pii, na dɛm atseetsee no kɔr do yɛɛ kɛse; meyɛ abofra a mennsɛ bi; nna medzi mfe duanan dze rokɔ duenum ara pɛr, minnyi dzibew biara nna meyɛ abofra so a mennsɛ bi wɔ wiadze yi mu, naaso nyimpa a wɔyɛ edzibewdzifo faa no dɛ meyɛ obi a moho hia kɛse ntsi wonunuu ɔmamfo hɔn adwen araa ma wotsiaa me na wɔtseetsee me yayaayaw; dɛm atseetsee yi fii asɔr horow no nyinara mu bae—hɔn nyinara yɛɛ kor dɛ wɔretseetsee me.

Iyi maa modwendwenee ara yie ofitsi dɛm aber no na mpɛn pii, na nna ɔyɛ me nwanwa dɛ abofra a mennsɛ bi, a medzi mfe duanan na kakra a nna obi a da biara meberɛ ansaana menya biribi kakra a mibedzi, ɔyɛɛ me nwanwa so dɛ wɔbɔdwen dɛ meyɛ obi a moho hia ma hɔn araa ma ɔbɛma wɔatseetsee me yaayaa na woegu m’enyim ase. Mbom kansa sɛ ɔyɛɛ me hu anaa ɔnntse dɛm mpo a, dɛm na ɔtse, na osian dɛm ntsi, nna ɔtaa ma mo werɛ how dodow.

Mbom, mbrɛ ɔtse biara no, ɔyɛ nokwar dɛ meehu enyido-adzehu. Ofitsi dɛm aber no meyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Paul yɛe wɔ aber a oriyi n’ano wɔ Ɔhen Agrippa n’enyim, na ɔkãa enyido-adzehu a ohunii a ɔkyerɛ dɛ ohun kan na ɔtsee ndze ho asɛm no; naaso nyimpa kumaa bi na wɔgyee no dzii; binom see dɛ onndzi nokwar, binom so see dɛ ɔabɔ dam; na wosii no atwetwe na wɔyaaw no. Mbom iyi nyinara annsesã nokwar a ɔkyerɛ dɛ oehu enyido-adzehu no. Ohun enyido-adzehu, onyim dɛ ohunii, na atseetsee a ɔwɔ wiadze nyinara mpo nnkotum asesã dɛm nokwar no; na sɛ wɔtseetsee no kɔ owu mpo mu a, onyim, na obohu so dze ekodu n’ahom gye a odzi ewiei mpo do, dɛ oehu kan na ɔtsee ndze dɛ ɔrekasa kyerɛ no, na wiadzemba nyinara nnkotum ama ɔadwen anaa ɔagye edzi dɛ oennhu.

Dɛmara na ɔtse wɔ m’afamu. Mehu kan ankasa, na dɛm kan no ne finimfin no muhun Nyimpa-su beenu, na wɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me ampa; na sɛ kaansa wɔtaan me na wɔtseetsee me dɛ mekãa dɛ mehu enyido-adzehu mpo a, ɔda ho yɛ nokwar; na ber a wɔretseetsee me, wɔreyaw me, na wɔrekã nsɛmbɔn nyina to mo do akɔhwi mu, osiandɛ makã dɛm no, ogyaa me ma mekãa wɔ m’akoma mu dɛ: Ebɛnadze ntsi na wɔtseetsee me dɛ merekã nokwar no ntsi? Mehu enyido-adzehu ankasa; na emi nye woana a mubotum mesiw Nyame kwan, anaadɛ ebɛnadze ntsi na wiadzemba dwen dɛ wɔyɛ me ma maapow dza mehu ankasa no? Mehu enyido-adzehu; minyim dɛm, na minyim so dɛ Nyame nyim, na munnkotum apow, na munnkotum ayɛ so, no koraa no minyim dɛ sɛ meyɛ dɛm a mobɔfom Nyame, na maaba afɔbu ase.

Afei m’adwen amee wɔ dza modwenee a ɔfa asɔr horow a ɔwɔ wiadze no ho. Minyim dɛ onnyi dɛ mokɔdɔm hɔn mu biara, mbom ɔwɔ dɛ mokɔ do tsena dɛ mbrɛ metse dada no kɛpem dɛ Nyame bɛkyerɛ me dza menyɛ. Mehu dɛ James ne dasegye no yɛ nokwar—dɛ nyimpa a ne nyansaa tɔ sin no botum ebisa Nyame, enya nyansa, na Nyame rennka n’enyim.

Mokɔr do yɛɛ m’edwuma dɛ ma meyɛ dada no kɛpeem Fankwa ne da a otsia eduonu biako wɔ mfe apem ahaawɔtwe eduonu-ebiasa mu a, aber nyina nna nyimpa horow, hɔn a wɔyɛ nyamesomfo na hɔn a wɔnnyɛ nyamesomfo retseetsee me pii, osiandɛ mokɔr do sii do kãa dɛ mehu enyido-adzehu.

Mber kakra ntamu, ofitsi aber a muhun enyido-adzehu dze kesi afe apem ɔhaawɔtwe eduonu-ebiasa mu no—ber a wɔbraa me dɛ mma monnkɔdɔm dɛm aber no mu asɔr ahorow no mu biara no, nna musuar so, na hɔn a nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ m’anyɛnkofo na wɔkã m’akoma to me yamu no na wɔtseetsee me, na sɛ wosusu mpo dɛ obi adaada me a, ɔwɔ dɛ nkyɛ wɔbɔ mbɔdzen twe me ekyir wɔ ɔdɔ kwan do-wogyaa me too nsɔhwe ahorow nyina mu; ma menye nyimpa horow nyina dzii afora, na dɛm no maa mohwee mfom pii a ɔnnfata mu, na mekyerɛɛ ɔbabunyɛ ho mberɛwyɛ, na mfom nketsenketse a ɔwɔ nyimpa awoo su ho; na ɔyɛ me yaw dɛ mebɛkã dɛ dɛm mfom yi dze me kɔr nsɔhwɛ pii mu a ɔnnyɛ wɔ Nyame enyim. Sɛ mekã dɛm bɔn yi a, onnyi dɛ obiara susu dɛ midzi fɔ wɔ bɔn kɛse anaa ndzeyɛbɔn bi ho. Dɛ mebɛyɛ bɔn a ɔtse dɛm nnyɛ adze a ɔyɛ m’awoo su dabiara da. Mbom mofoom wɔ atwetwesi ho, na odu mber bi a nna medze moho akɔbɔ paserewyifo ho nye ndzɛmba a ɔtsetse dɛm ne nyɛe ho, dɛm nnyɛ su a ɔfata obi a Nyame afrɛ no no tse dɛ emi. Mbom iyi nnkɛyɛ obi a ɔkaa me mberantsɛber mu, na onyim dɛ meyɛ obi a m’enyigye moho dada no nwanwa.

Osian ndzɛmba yinom ntsi, mber pii na muhu dɛ midzi fɔ wɔ me mberɛwyɛ na m’esintɔ ho; Fankwa ne da a otsĩa eduonu-biako n’ewimbir no a ɔyɛ da a midzii kan bɔɔ dzin no, n’anafua no a nna makɔ mpa do no, mehyɛɛ ase dɛ morobɔ mpaa na morototɔ serɛ Otumfo Nyankopɔn ma ɔdze mo bɔn na mo mfom nyinara akyɛ me, na dɛ ɔmma munhu me gyinabew wɔ n’enyim; nna mowɔ awerɛhyɛmu kɛse dɛ mbrɛ obesi biara no mibenya nyikyerɛ dɛ mbrɛ menya bi dada no.

Aber a mugu do robɔ mpaa ma Nyame no, muhun kan bi dɛ orupue me dan no mu, na ɔkɔr do hyerɛnee araa kɛpeem dɛ dan no mu yɛɛ kann kyɛn ewiaber mpo. Annkyɛr na nyimpa-su bi puee me mpa ne nkyɛn, nna ɔsensɛn hɔ a ne nan nnkã famu.

Ɔhyɛ bataker fufuufuw bi. Ɔhoa kyɛn adzefufuw biara a mehu no wɔ asaase yi do pɛn; na menngye nndzi dɛ biribi wɔ asaase yi do a wobotum ayɛ ma ahoa na ahyerɛn dɛm. Ne nsaho na n’abasa, fitsi ne nsakɔn dze kɔ sor kakra no da hɔ kwa a biribiara nnkata ho. N’anamɔn na ne nanho so da hɔ kwa, n’anankoroma dze kɔ sor kakra no so da hɔ kwa. Ne tsir na no kɔn ho so da hɔ kwa. Muhun dɛ ɔnnhyɛ atar biara bio ka bataker no ho osiandɛ nna no mu ebue ma mutumii hun n’akoko.

Nnyɛ n’atar no nko na ɔhoa mbordo, mbom ɔnoara so mbrɛ noho si hyerɛn no ano nnkotum akyerɛkyerɛ mu, na no hwɛbea hyerɛn dɛ enyinam. Dan no mu hyerɛnee na mbom nna ɔnnto kan a etwa ne nyimpadua no ho ehyia no. Muhun no ahyɛse no suro kitsaa me, mbom annkyɛr na suro no fii hɔ ntsɛmara.

Ɔdze me dzin frɛɛ me na ɔsee dɛ ɔyɛ ɔbɔfo a wɔsomaa no fii Nyame nkyɛn dɛ ɔmbra mo hɔ, na wɔfrɛ no Moroni; na Nyame wɔ dwumadzi bi dze ma me; na aman ebusuakuw, na kasa horow nyina mu no binom bɛkã dza oye wɔ me dzin ho na binom so akã dza omuo so. Dza ɔkyerɛ nye dɛ nyimpakuw ahorow nyina mu no binom bɔbɔ me dzin pa na binom so abɔ me dzin bɔn.

Ɔsee me dɛ wɔdze nwoma bi a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ sika mprɛtse do esie. Na nwoma no kã tsetse nkorɔfo a wɔtsenaa asaase tɔw yi do na bea a wofi baa ho asɛm. Ɔsee bio dɛ Asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no a Agyenkwa no dze maa tsetsemba no wɔ nwoma no mu;

Bio so dɛ, wɔdze abo ebien a ogu dwetɛ egyen mu akã mprɛtse no ho esie—na dɛm abo yi a ɔfam akatabo ho no na ɔyɛ dza wɔfrɛ no Urim na Thummim no—na dɛm abo yi na hɔn a wɔwɔ no ɔboaa wɔ tsetseberdo anaa nkaano no ma wɔyɛɛ “adzehufo” na Nyankopɔn yɛɛ iyi kãa ho ama wɔdze aakyerɛ nwoma no ase.

Owiee nsɛm yinom kã ekyir no, ɔhyɛɛ ase kãa Ahyɛmu Dadaw no mu nkɔnhyɛsɛm no. Odzii kan serɛe kãa Malachi tsir ebiasa no mu nsɛm bi; na ɔserɛe kãa dɛm nkɔnhyɛ noara so ne tsir anan anaadɛ ne tsir a odzi ewiei no, mbom nna ɔsor dza ɔwɔ hɛn Bible mu no kakra. Nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ ɔserɛ kã nkyekyɛmu a odzi kan no dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ hɛn nwoma no mu no, dza ɔserɛe kae nye dɛ:

Na hwɛ, da no reba a ɔbɛyɛ hyew dɛ fononoo, na hɔn a wɔyɛ ntsɛn nyinara, nyew, nye hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛdze nyinara no bɛhyew dɛ eburonan; na hɔn a wɔbɛba no bɛhyew hɔn, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse, amma hɔn ndwow anaa hɔn abaw annka.
Na bio, ɔserɛe kãa nkyekyɛmu enum no so dɛ: Hwɛ menam Elijah nkɔnhyɛnyi no ne nsa do bɛda Asɔfodzi no edzi akyerɛ wo, ansaana Ewuradze ne da kɛse no a ɔyɛ hu no aba.

Ɔsesãa nkyekyɛmu a odzi do no mu nsɛm no so na ɔserɛe kãa dɛ: Na ɔdze anohoba a wɔdze bɔɔ egyanom no bɛhyɛ mba hɔn akoma mu, na mba no hɔn akoma bɛdan akɔ hɔn egyanom hɔ. Sɛ annyɛ dɛm a, ber a Ewuradze bɛba no asaase no bɛsɛɛ koraa.

Ɔserɛe kãa Isaiah tsir dubiako so kãa iyinom ho, see dɛ ɔnnkɛkyɛr na iyi ahyɛ mã. Ɔserɛe kãa Asomafo Ndwuma no ne tsir ebiasa no so, nkyekyɛmu eduonu-ebien na eduonu-ebiasa no pɛpɛɛpɛr dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ Ahyɛmu Fofor no mu no. Ɔsee dɛ dɛm nkɔnhyɛnyi no nye Christ; mbom da no nnyaa mbae a hɔn a wonnketsie ne ndze no wobotwa hɔn efi nkorɔfo no mu, mbom ɔnnkɛkyɛr na da no aba.

Ɔserɛe kãa Joel ne tsir ebien no, fitsi nkyekyɛmu eduonu-awɔtwe dze kɛpem n’ewiei no. Ɔsee so dɛ dɛm nkɔnhyɛ yi so nnyaa nnhyɛɛ mã, na ɔnnkɛkyɛr na ahyɛ mã. Na ɔkyerɛɛ mu so dɛ ɔnnkɛkyɛr na Amanamamfo no hɔn mãhyɛ no aba mu. Ɔserɛe kãa kyerɛwsɛm mu nsɛm pii, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ mu a murunntum nnkã no wɔ ha.

Bio, ɔsee me dɛ, sɛ me nsa kã mprɛtse a ɔakã ho asɛm no a—na ber no nnyaa nnsõe a ɔdze bɛma me—mma memmfa nnkyerɛ obiara; ɔno nye akokyɛm nye Urim na Thummim no; kã nkorɔfo a ɔbɛhyɛ me dɛ memfa nkyerɛ hɔn no nko ho; sɛ meyɛ a wɔbɛsɛɛ me. Ber a ɔnye me rotwetwe mprɛtse no ho nkɔmbɔ no, wobuee enyido-adzehu no wɔ m’adwen mu ma muhun bea pɔkyee a mprɛtse no hyɛ, dɛm ntsi ber a mokɔr bea no do no muhunii.

Ɔkãa dɛm ndzɛmba yinom kyerɛɛ me ekyir no, muhun dɛ kan a ɔwɔ dan no mu no rotwe bɛn ne nyimpadua no. Ɔkɔr do yɛɛ dɛmara kɛpeem aber a dan no mu yɛɛ sum dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse dada no kã dza oetwa ehyia noho no nko. Nna awerɛfir mu ara muhun dɛ, ma ɔyɛ dɛ, kwan bi ebue wɔ sor, na ɔfaa mu kɔree a mennhu no bio. Iyi ekyir no, dan no mu yɛɛ sum dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ ber a kan a ofi sor no mmpuee hɔ no.

Medaa hɔ komm dwendween anwanwadze kɛse a osii na nsɛm a ɔsomafo nwanwanyi no kãa kyerɛɛ me no ho; ber a mugu do rodwendwen no, awerɛfir mu ara muhun dɛ me dan no mu ahyɛ ase reyɛ kann bio. Annkyɛr koraa na muhun dɛ dɛm ɔsomafo a ofi sor no gyina me mpa ne nkyɛn bio.

Ɔhyɛɛ ase bio kãa dɛm asɛm kor no ara a ɔkãa no ahyɛse no kyerɛɛ me, a ɔannsesã biribiara. Ɔno ekyir, ɔkãa atsɛmbu kɛse a ɔreba asaase yi do ɔnam ɔkɔm na akõkoekõ na ahokyer dze amamfoyɛ kɛse bɛba ho asɛm kyerɛɛ me; na dɛm atsɛmbu kɛse yi bɛba asaase yi do wɔ dɛm mbasantsen yi do. Ɔkãa iyinom kyerɛɛ me ekyir no, ɔfowee kɔr sor dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ no ahyɛse no.

Dɛm aber yi nsɛm no tɔɔ m’adwen do ara ma nda efi m’enyiwa mu. Dza mehu na matse no maa medaa hɔ ahobow mu. Na dza ɔyɛɛ me ahobow kɛse mpo nye dɛ muhun dɛ ɔsomafo kor no ara wɔ me mpa nkyɛn na metsee dɛ orisi nsɛm a ɔkãa kyerɛɛ me no do bio. Ɔbɔɔ me kɔkɔ dɛ Satan bɛpɛ dɛ ɔsɔ me hwɛ (ɔnam dɛ m’egya n’ebusua yɛ abɔbɔfo ntsi) ama maagye mprɛtse no dze enya mo ho. Ɔbɔɔ me kɔkɔ dɛ mma minnya adwen fofor biara wɔ mprɛtse no ho kã dɛ medze bɛhyɛ Nyame enyimnyam, na mma memmfa botae biara nnsi m’enyi do kã n’ahenman ne nkyekyeree ho, annyɛ dɛm a me nsa rennkã.

Ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebiasa ekyir no, ɔfowee kɔr sor bio dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ no ahyɛse no na ɔkaa monko a nna meda hɔ rodwendwen anwanwadze a mehu no seseiara no ho. Ɔsomafo no fowee fii me nkyɛn ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebiasa no annkyɛr koraa na akokɔ bɔnee na muhun dɛ adze akye, iyi kyerɛɛ dɛ hɛn kokoa mu mpɛnsampɛnsamu no gyee hɛn anafua no nyinara.

Ɔyɛɛ kakra no, mosoɛree wɔ me mpa do, na, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse no, mokɔr me daadaa dwumadzi do; mbom ber a mobɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ mereyɛ edwuma dɛ mbrɛ meyɛ no dada no, muhun dɛ mayɛ mberɛw na dɛm ntsi menntum annyɛ hwee koraa. M’egya, a menye no reyɛ edwuma no hun dɛ biribi rehaw me, na ɔsee me dɛ monkɔ fie. Mefaa kwan dɛ morokɔ fie; mbom aber a mehyɛɛ ase dɛ morofow ban a wɔdze agye haban a yɛwɔ mu no ho no, m’ahom nyina pae na mohwee famu a munntum nkekã moho na m’enyi do siiw me mber kakra.

Adze a odzi kan a mekaa nye ndze a ɔrekasa kyerɛ me na ɔdze me dzin refrɛ me. Memaa m’enyi do wɔ sor, na muhun ɔsomafo kor no ara dɛ ogyina m’etsifi na kan etwa noho ehyia dɛ mbrɛ muhun no ahyɛse no. Ɔsanee sii nsɛm a ɔkãa no anafua no nyinara do. Ɔhyɛɛ me dɛ monkɔ m’egya hɔ na menkɛkã enyido-adzehu na mbrasɛm no a menya no nkyerɛ no.

Midzii do. Mesanee kɔr m’egya hɔ wɔ haban no mu kɛkãa dza ɔfa nyikyerɛ no ho nyinara kyerɛɛ no. Obuaa me dɛ ofi Nyame na ɔsee me dɛ monkɔ nkɛyɛ dza ɔsomafo no ahyɛ me dɛ menyɛ no. Mifii haban no mu na mokɔr bea no a ɔsomafo no akã akyerɛ me dɛ mprɛtse no hyɛ no. Ɔnam dɛ enyido-adzehu a menya no yɛ pefee ntsi, ber a mudur hɔ ara nna muhunii.

Koko a ɔsõ ara yie bi si Manchester ekuroba a ɔwɔ Ontario mansin a ɔwɔ New York mu no nkyɛn. Ɔno nye koko a ɔwar kyɛn akoko a ɔwɔ bea no do nyina. Mprɛtse no wɔ ɔbo adaka mu hyɛ ɔbo kɛse bi ase wɔ dɛm koko yi n’anee afamu wɔ bea a odzi kɔ no sor no a ne finimfin yɛ kɛse na no sor yɛ korkorba. Odzi kɔ ne nkyɛnkyɛn no yɛ tseatseaba na dɛtse akata do ma dɛm ntsi odzi kɔ ne finimfin no nko na opue sor.

Modwurudwuruuw dɛtse no wiei no, mohwehwɛɛ poma bi dze hyɛɛ boba no ase. Medze ahoɔdzen kakra ara maa bobaa no do kɔr sor. Mohwɛɛ adaka no mu na nokwar muhun mprɛtse, Urim na Thummim no na akatabo no dɛ mbrɛ ɔsomafo no akã no ara pɛr. Adaka a ɔwɔ mu no wɔatow abo dze dza ɔfam ayɛ. Wɔdze abo ebien abeabea adaka no ase. Dɛm abo ebien yi do na mprɛtse no na ndzɛmba nkaa no gu.

Mobɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ mibeyi mprɛtse no epue na ɔsomafo no amma me kwan. Ɔsee me bio dɛ mber nnsõe a medze pue, nna nnyɛ n’aber nye no gyedɛ mfe anan etwa mu ana; mbom ɔsee me dɛ afrenhyia pɛpɛɛpɛr mensan mbra koko no ho na obehyia me wɔ hɔ; na dɛ menyɛ dɛm afe biara nkɛpem dɛ aber bɔsõ ma me nsa akã mprɛtse no.

Afe biara ewiei no mokɔr koko no ho dɛ mbrɛ ɔhyɛɛ me no; mihyiaa dɛm ɔsomafo kor no ara wɔ hɔ na aber biara minyaa nkyerɛkyerɛ na nyimdzee fii no hɔ wɔ kokoa mu mpɛnsampɛnsamu kor biara mu no, ɔkãa dza Ewuradze rebɛyɛ, na mbrɛ obesi ahyehyɛ n’ahendzi wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu.

Osiandɛ biribiara nnyi m’egya ne nsamu ntsi, okehiaa dɛ yedzi paa, yɛdze hɛn nsa yɛ edwuma ma nkorɔfo nda nda, na sɛ ɔyɛ so a edwuma biara a hɛn nsa bɛkã no yɛyɛ. Ɔtɔ mber bi a yɛbɛn fie, obodu aber bi so no nna yɛkɔ ekyirekyir, na osian edwuma a yɛyɛ no daabaa no ntsi yetumii nyaa biribi dze hwɛɛ hɛnho.

Afe 1823 mu no m’egya n’ebusua hun amandze ara yie osian mo nuabanyin panyin, Alvin no wu ntsi. Afe 1825, Ɔbɛsɛ bosoom mu na panyin nyimdzefo bi a wɔfrɛ no Josiah Stoal, a ɔtsenaa Chenango mansin, a ɔwɔ New York ɔman mu, faa me edwuma mu. Nna ɔatse ɔfa Spainfo a wobue dwetɛ mona wɔ Harmony, a ɔwɔ Susquehanna mansin a ɔwɔ Pennsylvania ɔman mu; na ansaana ɔrebɛfa me edwuma mu no nna otutu famu, ama, kyerɛkyerɛ, sɛ obohu dwetɛ mona no a. Ekyir no a ɔmaa menye no kɛtsenae no, ɔfaa me nye n’edwumafo nkaa no, dɛ yentu dwetɛ mona no, hɔ na mokɔr do yɛɛ edwuma dze rokɔ bosoom a, yennhu hwee wɔ hɛn dwumadzi no mu, na ewiei no menye ɔpanyin nyimdzeefo no kasae araa ma yegyaa dɛ yeretutu hwehwɛ dwetɛ mona no. Iyi ntsi na nkorɔfo kãa dɛ mutu mona hwehwɛ sika no.

Ber a ɔfaa me edwuma mu no, ɔyɛɛ nhyehyɛɛ bi a ɔmaa mutumii nye Owura Isaac Hale a ofi dɛm bea no do kɛtsenae a midzidzi ne nsamu; Hɔ na midzii kan hun me yer (ne babaa) Emma Hale. Sanda ne da a otsĩa duawɔtwe wɔ afe 1827 mu, ber a nna meda ho yɛ Owura Stoal n’edwuma no na yɛwaree.

Osiandɛ mokɔr do kãa dɛ mehu enyido-adzehu ntsi, atseetsee no kɔr do kãa mo do, na me yer n’egya n’ebusua no ammpɛ koraa dɛ yɛwar. Dɛm ntsi okehiaa dɛ menye no fi hɔ kɔ beebi fofor; ntsi yɛkɔr Squire Tarbill fie kɔwaree, wɔ South Bainbridge, a ɔwɔ Chenango mansin mu, wɔ New York. Mowaree no ankyɛr koraa na migyaa Owura Stoal n’edwuma no yɛ, na yɛkɔr m’egya hɔ nye no kɛyɛɛ ekuadwuma dɛm hyɛber no mu.

Afei ber a ɔwɔ dɛ me nsa kã mprɛtse, Urim na Thummim na akatabo no sõe. Fankwa ne da a otsĩa eduonu-ebien, wɔ afe apem aha awɔtwe eduonu esuon mu no mokɔɔr bea no a ndzɛmba no hyɛ no, dɛ mbrɛ afe biara meyɛ no, na dɛm ɔsomafo kor no ara a ofi sor no dze maa me, nye bɔhyɛ yi: dɛ noho asodzi da mo do; na sɛ mannhwɛ no yie ma ɔyew anaa mubu enyi gu do a, Ewuradze botwa me akyen; mbom sɛ mobɔ mbɔdzen biara a mobotum dze sie kɛpem aber a ɔno, ɔsomafo no bɛba abɛgye a, ɔno Ewuradze bɔkora do.

Annkyɛr biara na muhun siantsir a ɔnam do ma ɔsomafo no hyɛɛ me dzendzenndzen dɛ monhwɛ mprɛtse no do yie no, na siantsir a ɔmaa ɔsee dɛ sɛ muwie dza wɔdze ahyɛ me nsa dɛ menyɛ no a ɔbɛba abɛgye akɔ no. Nkorɔfo tsee dɛ mprɛtse no wɔ mo hɔ no ara, wɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen biara a wobotum dɛ wɔbɛgye efi me nkyɛn. Enyitsew kwan biara a nyimpa fa do a nsa kã a ɔbɛyɛ yie biara no wɔfaa do. Afei atseetsee no yɛɛ yaayaw kyɛɛn ma nkyɛ ɔtse no, na dɔmtutuw yɛɛ krado dabiara dɛ wɔbɛgye efi mo hɔ. Mbom ɔnam Nyame ne nyansaa do, ɔkaa me nsamu dwodwoodwo, kodur dɛ muwiee dza wɔdze hyɛɛ me nsa dɛ menyɛ wɔ ho no. Dɛ mbrɛ nhyehyɛɛ no tse no, ɔsomafo no bae ma medze sanee maa no, na ɔwɔ ne nkyɛn bodu ndɛ a ɔyɛ Esusow Aketseaba ne da a otsĩa ebien wɔ afe 1838 mu yi.

Nhuanyan no kɔr do ara dze kesi dɛ atsesɛm dze ne tɛkyerɛma apem no kɔr do aber nyina kãa atorsɛm too m’egya n’ebusua do, nye mankasa so mo do. Sɛ mese merekã no mu nkyɛmu apem a nkyɛ ɔbɛyɛ nwoma pii mu amaama. Atseetsee no kɔr do araa ma nna munntum nngyina ano ntsi okehiaa dɛ mifi Manchester, na menye me yer kɔ Susquehanna mansin a ɔwɔ Pennsylvania ɔman mu. Ber a yerisiesie hɛnho akɔ no—nna ohia akã hɛn papaapa, na atseetsee no so ayɛ dur ara yie ama hɛn ma nna ɔnnyɛ hɛn dɛ hɛn asetsena mu bɛyɛ yie da—hɛn amandzehu mu no yenyaa nyɛnko bi a wɔfrɛ no Martin Harris, ɔno na ɔbaa hɛn nkyɛn na ɔmaa hɛn dolla eduonum dze boaa hɛn wɔ akwantu no mu. Owura Harris tse Palmyra kurow mu, wɔ Wayne mansin a, ɔwɔ New York ɔman mu, na ɔyɛ okuafo a odzi mu ara yie.

Ɔnam mboa yi ne mber pa ntsi ɔmaa mutumii dur bea a mabɔ me tsirmu pɔw dɛ merekɛtsena wɔ Pennsylvania no; mudur hɔ ara pɛr na mehyɛɛ ase dɛ morohwɛ akyerɛw akyerɛwmba a ɔwɔ mprɛtse no do no egu nkrataa do. Mekyerɛɛw no mu dodowara, na ɔnam Urim na Thummim no ntsi mekyerɛɛ no mu bi ase, meyɛɛ iyi fi ber a mudur me yer n’egya fie, wɔ Mumu bosoom no mu dze kesi Kwakwar bosoom a odzi do no mu.

Kwakwar bosoom yi mu no, na Owura Martin Harris a mabɔ ne dzin dada no baa beebi a yɛwɔ no, ɔgyee akyerɛwmba no a makyerɛw efi mprɛtse no do no, na ɔdze sii mu dɛ ɔrokɔ New York kuropɔn no mu. Na dza osii ɔno no do na akyerɛwmba no a makyerɛw no ho no, mekã nsɛm a nankasa kãe a ɔfa dza osii, kyerɛɛ me wɔ ber a ɔsaan n’ekyir bae no, ɔno na odzi do yi:

“Mokɔr New York kuropɔn mu, na medze akyerɛwmba a wɔakyerɛ ase no maa Ɔbemfo Charles Anthon, a ɔayɛ atsenkã wɔ kasa ahorow suahun mu ara yie. Ɔbemfo Anthon kãa dɛ dza wɔakyerɛ ase no dzi mu, odzi mu koraa kyɛn Egyptfo hɔn kasa a wɔakyerɛ ase ma oehu pɛn. Nkyii medze dza wɔnnkyerɛɛ ase no so kyerɛɛ no, na ɔsee dɛ ɔyɛ Egyptfo, Chaldeafo, Assyriafo, na Arabfo hɔn kasaa; na ɔsee dɛ akyerɛwmba nyina yɛ nokwar. Ɔmaa me dasegye-krataa a, ɔdze kyerɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Palmyra dɛ akyerɛwmba no yɛ nokwar, na dza wɔakyerɛ ase no so dzi mu. Megyee dasegye-krataa no na medze hyɛɛ mo kotoku mu, na ber a miribefi fie hɔ ara no, nna Owura Anthon frɛɛ me ekyir, na obisaa me dɛ aberantsɛ no yɛɛ dɛn hun dɛ sika mprɛtse no hyɛ bea a ohunii wɔ no. Miyii no ano dɛ Nyame no bɔfoe na ɔdaa no edzi kyerɛɛ no.

“Afei ɔkãa kyerɛɛ me dɛ, ‘Ma monhwɛ dasegye-krataa no’. Dɛm ntsi miyii fii mo kotoku mu na medze maa no, ber a ɔgyee no ɔtsetseew mu esinesin, na ɔsee dɛ abɔfo hɔn som biara nnyi hɔ dɛm aber yi mu, na sɛ medze mprɛtse no brɛ no a ɔbɛkyerɛ ase. Memaa ɔtsee ase dɛ mprɛtse no mu bi wɔ hɔ a wɔasɔw ano, na wɔabra me dɛ mma memmfa mmba. Oyii ano dɛ, ‘Murunntum nnkenkan nwoma a wɔasɔw ano’. Mifii ne nkyɛn na mokɔr Okunyin Mitchell nkyɛn ma no so hwɛe na ɔgyee dza Ɔbemfo Anthon akã a ɔfa akyerɛw no na ne nkyerɛase ho no too mu.”

Ebɔbira ne da a otsĩa enum, wɔ afe 1829 mu na Oliver Cowdery baa me fie, kɛpem dɛm aber no mu nna munnhun no da. Ɔkãa kyerɛɛ me dɛ nna ɔyɛ kyerɛkyerɛnyi wɔ skuul bi a ɔbɛn beebi a m’egya tse no, na ɔnam dɛ m’egya wɔ mbofra wɔ skuul no mu ntsi, ɔkɔree kɛtsenaa m’egya ne fie kakra, ber a ɔwɔ hɔ no ebusua no kãa mbrɛ me nsa sii kãa mprɛtse no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no, dɛm ntsi ɔaba dɛ ɔnye me robɔtwetwe ho nkɔmbɔ.
Owura Cowdery bae no ne nda ebien ekyir no a (ɔyɛ Ebɔbira ne da a otsĩa esuon no) mehyɛɛ ase dɛ merekyerɛ Mormon Nwoma no ase, na ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrekyerɛw ma me.

Yɛkɔr do yɛɛ nkyerɛase edwuma no, kɛpeem (Esusow Aketseaba bosoom mu wɔ afe 1829), da kor bi yɛkɔr kwaa bi mu dɛ yɛrokɔbɔ mpaa na yebisa Ewuradze dza ɔfa enuma a wɔdze kɔ bɔnfakyɛ mu ho asɛm a yehu wɔ mprɛtse no do wɔ dza yɛakyerɛ ase no mu. Aber a yegu do robɔ mpaa na yɛrefrɛ Ewuradze no, ɔsomafo bi nam kan mununkum mu fii sor sianee, na ɔdze ne nsa guu hɛn do na ɔhyɛɛ hɛn asɔfo see dɛ:

Me mfɛfo asomfo, wɔ Messiah ne dzin mu medze Aaron Asɔfodzi no ma hom, dza okitsa abɔfo hɔn som, nye nnuhu asɛmpa no nnuho, na nsumuhyɛ enuma a wɔdze kɔ bɔnfakyɛ mu no ne nsaafee; na wonnkeyi iyi efi asaase do bio da, kesi dɛ Levi ne mbabanyin bɔbɔ afɔr bio ama Ewuradze wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu.

Ɔsee dɛ Aaron Asɔfodzi yi nnyi tum a wɔdze nsa gu nyimpa do ma onya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze no, mbom ekyir yi na wɔdze tum yi bɛma hɛn; na ɔhyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yenkonuma hɛnho, ɔkyerɛɛ hɛn dza yɛnyɛ dɛ munnuma Oliver Cowdery, na n’ekyir no no so nnuma me.

Dɛm ntsi yɛkɔree na yekonumaa hɛnho. Midzii kan numaa no, na n’ekyir no ɔno so numaa me—ekyir no medze me nsa guu ne tsir do na medze Aaron Asɔfodzi no hyɛɛ no sɔfo, na n’ekyir no no so dze ne nsa guu mo do na ɔdze Asɔfodzi kor no ara so hyɛɛ me sɔfo—na dɛm na ɔhyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnyɛ.*

Ɔsomafo no a ɔbaa hɛn nkyɛn aber yi na ɔdze dɛm Asɔfodzi yi maa hɛn no, kãa kyerɛɛ hɛn dɛ ne dzin dze John, na ɔnoara so nye John Onumanyi no a ne dzin wɔ Ahyɛmu Fofor no mu no, na dɛ Peter, James na John na wɔkyerɛɛ no dɛ ɔmbɛyɛ dza ɔyɛe no, hɔn na wokitsa Melchizedek Asɔfodzi ho nsaafee no, dɛm Asɔfodzi no, ɔkãa dɛ, n’aber du a, wɔdze bɛma hɛn, na dɛ wɔmfrɛ me Asɔr no ne Elder a odzi kan, no ɔno (Oliver Cowdery) so wɔmfrɛ no Asɔr no ne Elder a otsĩa ebien. Esusow Aketseaba ne da a otsĩa duenum wɔ afe 1829 mu, nna dɛm ɔsomafo yi hyɛɛ hɛn asɔfo wɔ ne nsa ase, na wonumaa hɛn.

Ber a yenumaa wiei ma yerifi nsu no mu epue ara, na yenyaa enyimnyam nhyira kɛse suahun fii Ɔsor Egya no hɔ. Munumaa Oliver Cowdery wiei ara pɛr na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tɔɔ no do, na ɔsoɛree na ogyinae na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ ndzɛmba pii ho a ɔnnkɛkyɛr na ɔaba. Na bio, ɔno so numaa me wiei ara pɛr, na mo so minyaa nkɔnhyɛ sunsum, ber a mosoɛree gyinae no, mehyɛɛ nkɔm a ɔfa Asɔr yi ne nkyekyeree na no mpontu ho, nye ndzɛmba pii a ɔfa Asɔr no ho, nye dɛm ebusuasantsen yi hɔn nkorɔfo ho. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no hyɛɛ hɛn mã, na yedzii dɛw wɔ hɛn nkwagye Nyame no mu.

Afei hɛn adwen mu tsewee, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no buee kyerɛwsɛm no n’enyi kyerɛɛ hɛn ma yɛtsee ase yie, na ɔdaa no mu esumasɛm ne nkyerɛase ankasa na ne siantsir wɔ kwan a nkyɛ yennkenya da anaa yɛnndwen ho, no edzi kyerɛɛ hɛn. Ɔwɔ mu dɛ hɛn nsa akã Asɔfodzi no na yeenuma hɛnho dze, naaso osian atseetsee a nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ apaamu hɔ dze tseetsee hɛn ntsi, okehiaa dɛ yɛyɛ biribiara nsumamu wɔ dɛm aber no mu.

Ofi ber to ber no so, nkorɔfo a wɔfrɛ hɔnho nyamesomfo no nunuu dɔm no adwen ma wotsiaa hɛn dɛ wobotu ahyɛ hɛn do. Na wɔyɛɛ hɔn adwen dɛ wobotu ahyɛ hɛn do no na me yer n’egya n’ebusua hɔn atsenkã ho na ɔbɔɔ hɛnho ban fii hɔn ho (ɔnam Nyame n’adom do) nna wotsiaa dɔm no, na wɔnye me bɛyɛɛ nyɛnko ntsi wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔma me kwan ma mokɔ do yɛ nkyerɛase edwuma a wɔnntseetsee me, na dɛm ntsi wɔbɔɔ anohoba dɛ wɔdze hɔn tum nyinara bɔbɔ hɛnho ban wɔ biribiara a ɔmmfa mbra kwan do, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ahom botum.

/study/scriptures/pgp/a-of-f/1.title: Gyedzi ho Nsɛmpɔw 1
/study/scriptures/pgp/a-of-f/1.book_title: Gyedzi ho Nsɛmpɔw No A Ɔwɔ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo no mu

verses.text: Yɛgye Nyankopɔn, Onnyiewiei Egya no, na Ne Ba, Jesus Christ, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no dzi.
Yɛgye dzi dɛ wɔbɛtsẽa nyimpa wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn bɔn ho, na nnyɛ wɔ Adam ne mbrato ho.
Yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔnam Christ no Werdambɔ do adasamba nyinara botum enya nkwa, ber a wɔyɛ setsie ma mbra no na Asɛmpa n’ayɛdze no.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ fapem na Asɛmpa n’ayɛdze a odzi kan no nye: odzi kan, Gyedzi wɔ Ewuradze Jesus Christ mu; otsĩa ebien, Nnuho; otsĩa ebiasa, Nsumuhyɛ enuma a ɔwɔ hɔ ma bɔnfakyɛ; otsĩa anan, Wɔdze nsa rugu wo do ama Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze no.
Yɛgye dzi dɛ otwar dɛ Nyame frɛ nyimpa wɔ nkɔnhyɛ do, na wɔ nsa a hɔn a wɔwɔ tumdzi dze gu no do, ma ɔdze akã Asɛmpa no na ɔayɛ ayɛdze a ɔkã ho no.
Yɛgye nhyehyɛɛ kor no ara a ɔwɔ Tsetseberdo Asɔr no mu a, wɔyɛ asomafo, nkɔnhyɛfo, asɔfo, akyerɛkyerɛfo, nsɛmpakãfo na dza ɔkekãho no dzi.
Yɛgye kasa horow akyɛdze, nkɔnhyɛ, nyikyerɛ, enyido-adzehu, ayarsa, kasa horow ne nkyerɛase, na ma ɔkekãho no dzi.
Yɛgye Bible no dzi dɛ ɔyɛ Nyame n’asɛm wɔ aber a wɔakyerɛ ase yie; yɛgye Mormon Nwoma no so dzi dɛ ɔyɛ Nyame n’asɛm.
Yɛgye dza Nyame eyi akyerɛ nyina, na dza seseiara Oyi kyerɛ nyina dzi, na yɛgye dzi dɛ Ɔbɔkɔ do eyi ndzɛmba akɛse a no ho hia tsitsir pii a ɔfa Nyame N’ahenman ho no akyerɛ.

Yɛgye dza wɔakã a ɔkyerɛ dɛ wɔbɛkã Israelmba aboa ano, na Ebusuakuw Du no nsanananmu no dzi; Zion (Jerusalem Fofor no) wɔbɛkyekyer no wɔ America asaase tɔw no do; Christ Noara bedzi hen wɔ asaase do; na, wɔbɛyɛ asaase yi fofor na oenya ne paradise enyimnyam no.
Yɛgye ndzinoa no to mu dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ yɛsom Otumfo Nyame wɔ kwan a hɛn tsibowa kã kyerɛ hɛn, na yɛma nyimpa nyinara ndzinoa kor noara bi dɛ wɔnsom dɛ mbrɛ wɔpɛ, bea a wɔpɛ, anaa dza wɔpɛ.
Yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ yɛbrɛ hɛnho adze ma ahemfo, presidentfo, ahwɛdofo na atsɛmbuafo, yɛyɛ setsie ma hɔn, yedzi hɔn nyi na yedzi mbra no do.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ yɛyɛ anokwafo, yedzi nokwar, yɛyɛ ahosie, yɛyɛ etuhoakyɛ, yɛbɔ ɔbra pa na yɛyɛ papa ma nyimpa nyinara; nokwar, dza yebotum akã nye dɛ yedzi Paul n’afotu no do—Yegye ndzɛmba nyina dzi, yɛwɔ adze nyina mu enyidado, yɛasɔw ndzɛmba pii na yɛwɔ enyidado dɛ yebotum asɔw ndzɛmba nyina. Sɛ ɔbra pa, dza ɔyɛ fɛw anaa ɔwɔ dzin pa anaa ɔsɛ nkamfo a, ndzɛmba yinom na yɛhwehwɛ ekyir kwan.
